productName: On 10-Step Korean Skin Care Routine Set (Normal Skin Type)
review: All products seem to work good, but the serum and essence leave a sticky or tacky feeling on my face after.

productName: On 10-Step Korean Skin Care Routine Set (Normal Skin Type)
review: Have honestly only used this set so far for three days, but can already see the difference in my skin's overall appearance. Definitely a well curated set for normal skin types!

productName: On 10-Step Korean Skin Care Routine Set (Normal Skin Type)
review: I must admit to slacking on my skincare this past year. So I decided to get back into this month with a designated routine. This set is amazing for those with Normal Skin. I seriously cannot love the oil cleansing pads enough! They are my favorite product in this set. My skin has no reaction to them and just feels amazingly clean afterwards. PRO TIP: Take a page straight out of Charlotte Cho's Book and massage your face at this point before rinsing it off. Literally the reason why it's my favorite step.

productName: On 10-Step Korean Skin Care Routine Set (Normal Skin Type)
review: The Egg-Zyme cleanser is the only product I'm debating on switching out. (Routines are not a one size fits all and I knew going in I might have to swap out a product or two). This cleanser just makes my face feel SQUEAKY clean but a bit too tight. It also has a slight small that some may find irritating on the skin. They clay mask also feels good. If you've tried the Aztec clay mask that was trendy, this has a similar feel.

productName: On 10-Step Korean Skin Care Routine Set (Normal Skin Type)
reviewTitles: Good but one of my products got swapped
review: I love the Toner Pads, but I might be biased due to the Vitamin C and its smell. The Essence and Serum are nice -- but might swap them out for another product only to pick one that's targeted for a specific skin concern. And it's hard not to love a good sheet mask but I feel like you can swap for a cute face mask if you want.

productName: On 10-Step Korean Skin Care Routine Set (Normal Skin Type)
review: I would recommend this kit for anyone that doesn't really know how to start a Korean skin care regime. all of the products are very high quality and I immediately noticed a difference in my skin texture! my only complaint would be that this kit only comes with one face mask, I was hoping for a set of five or ten.

I've only been able to use this mask twice so far and I have sensitive combination skin for reference (oil on my chin/jaw/hairline but dry forehead and cheeks). I was really excited to use this because I'm going through a flare up of hormonal acne and my pores are looking rough since the summer months are coming up where I live and it's humid. I love the way my skin looks after using this mask, I can't use it everywhere unfortunately because it burns really badly on my cheeks and forehead but the parts I can use it on when it's removed look so flawless. My complexion is even and the acne, while it isn't gone, is certainly dulled down significantly considering a single use. My second time using it I did decide to sleep in it to see if time made a difference and leaving it on overnight on problematic areas was beneficial. I asked a question about the sensitivity on here and support was very quick to get in touch with me and they were extremely kind. I couldn't return the product due to a site error and they helped me find an alternative mask for sensitive skin types, guided me on continuing to use this mask since I did like it's results and even gave me a gift card for the site issue/skin reaction which wasn't necessary but very kind of them.

I urge you to try the product if you have really oily skin because it's working great in my oil spots where breakouts happen. Also, to address other reviews I read: yes there's a decently strong fragrance but I think it's strong simply because it's being applied on your face (near your nose too) and the smell is pretty floral/clean and the mask does cause intense skin tightening but I kind of like my mask to do that so I know it's dry and getting everything out of my skin (it is a clay mask, after all).
Best friend to oily skin with large pores. Calms and clears up skin immediately and with a wonderful aroma too :) definitely recommend.

I only use this on certain parts of my face like my nose & chin, sometimes my forehead (T-Zone). My skin feels tight and clean, a feeling that doesn't feel normal or right. I am not a fan of having my skin feel unnaturally tight.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error and I‚Äôm sorry that this mask did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences:)

reviewTitles: Great Moisturizer That Doesn't Feel Oily
review: I have been using this for several months, and it's a great moisturizer if you have sensitive or acne-prone skin. I was dealing with some hormonal acne just on my chin (normal skin type on rest of my face), and this leaves my skin hydrated without causing breakouts. I also have pretty sensitive skin and this is gentle with no harsh components. It has a slightly stretchy texture, but smells nice and a little goes a long way. I'm on my third jar of it, and would definitely recommend it for people with oily or combination or sensitive skin.

I like the way my skin feels after I use this. I have oily skin so this moisturizes my skin without making it greasy. There are 2 draw backs for me. One was the fact that it feels sticky as if you're putting glue on you face. The second was the smell. It's not super strong but I'm not a fan of the scent.

I did not look at the photo of the mask above, and was very surprised by the herbs-in-goo consistency when I first opened it. (That was my bad, so no points docked there... Just suggesting that you check the pic yourself!) It's kinda messy to apply and it kinda feels like it's going to slide off my face. Also: when I washed it off I always get nervous that all the leafy bits are going to clog my sink.

Ignoring all that, I still just don't love the product. Perhaps my skin type (combination, a little acne prone, minor redness, not very sensitive) isn't the target market and that's why I didn't see or feel any difference. I'll use up this mask because it doesn't negatively effect my skin, but I won't be repurchasing either.

I would highly recommend this product. It has a nice tea/herbal smell to it and is not offensive at all. There is no added fragrance, the smell comes straight from the herbs within the mask. I have sensitive, somewhat oily skin and this product is very soothing and calming and definitely helps with redness. It leaves my face feeling smooth, calm and happy. I have used it several times and still have a lot left, so it is definitely worth the price. If you have concerns with sensitivity and redness, I highly recommend this product. I will say though, application and washing off can be quite messy due to the watery and herbal nature of this mask.

reviewTitles: Like a cup of tea for your face
review: Smells and feels great. It‚Äôs a bit messier than I expected ‚Äî it‚Äôs really just bits of leaf in gel. It doesn‚Äôt dry or stiffen such as other masks I‚Äôve used. It remains wet until I wash it off. So, I‚Äôm not sure how much it‚Äôs really pulling out of my skin, or how much exfoliating or purifying it does. However, my skin looks nice and feels nice and soft post-rinse, and following it up with toner/essence/vitamin c is producing a nice, even result and my pores and rosacea seem reduced. Overall, it doesn‚Äôt HURT my skin, and anything that doesn‚Äôt make me break out is a win. However, but I‚Äôm not sure if it‚Äôs really scrubbed, purified, or improved it the way I would expect a mask to.
Lots of product for your dollar. Smells very nice and doesn't irritate my sensitive, broken skin.

review: I hate putting a poor review but I purchased this because of the decent reviews and I was in the market of looking for a new vitamin c serum. When I went to open this I noticed on the bottle label it said ‚ÄúCautions: people with allergy to aspirin will react poorly to the betaine one salicylate.‚Äù No where on this product page does it say that. I decided to put a little drop on the back of my hand to see if it‚Äôll be okay and needless to say I definitely felt a burning sensation followed with an itch. I am so bummed I cannot use this because I am allergic to aspirin and unfortunately I cannot return it because I already opened it.

productName: On AHA/BHA Refresh Vitamin C Daily Cream
review: This moisturizer is the best, is helping with everything. I only thing, I think this moisturizer is only for the winter.

productName: On AHA/BHA Refresh Vitamin C Daily Cream
review: Personally I found this to be too light for my skin and I needed to apply a second my hydrating moisturizer but if you are looking for a very lightweight water like consistency in a moisturizer this is it. It‚Äôs very nice overall and I did notice a brightness to my skin but I just needed more

productName: On AHA/BHA Refresh Vitamin C Daily Cream
review: Very light weight gel type consistency. I‚Äôm using this as moisturizer one and going over it with a thicker creamier moisturizer.

productName: On AHA/BHA Refresh Vitamin C Daily Cream
review: I use this in my nightly routine. I‚Äôve noticed a significant reduction in skin texture with the loss of bumps.

productName: On AHA/BHA Refresh Vitamin C Daily Cream
review: Mi piel se ve y se siente mejor.

productName: On AHA/BHA Refresh Vitamin C Lip Plumper
review: I'm not sure if it's the vitamin C or another ingredient, but this product causes me a fairly intense burning sensation seconds after application that lasts a good half hour. Maybe my lips are plumping, I can't tell for sure. I got the product hoping the AHA/BHA would keep peely lips at bay, but I can't use it often enough to test the theory. Maybe when it's no longer dry winter.

productName: On AHA/BHA Refresh Vitamin C Lip Plumper

productName: On AHA/BHA Refresh Vitamin C Lip Plumper
review: Feels very hydrating, it does burn a bit but it is not uncomfortable

Purchased this out-limb because I am always in the hunt for foundation or something similar that has spf in it. This is a game changer, I can‚Äôt speak anything bad about this and I am so glad this made it in my cart.

I can‚Äôt tell you how much I love Iope‚Äôs cushion foundation. I have combination sensitive skin and it provides the right amount coverage (not too much) and does not dry me out. It gives me the perfect clean and natural look!
I love the way this feels on my face it's almost like silk. The vanilla color is a perfect color match for skin, which I was worried about.
The coverage is light to medium if you build it up. It does cover redness well, but not pores.

productName: On All Filter Mask Zone Mist
reviewTitles: Needs a better / finer spray mist
review: Just got the product so can't speak for efficacy yet but the spray is awful. It's not a fine mist like face sprays should be, it sprays a lot very unevenly so I have to pour the product into a better spray bottle. Please fix.

productName: On All Filter Mask Zone Mist
review: We're so sorry to hear that this mist didn't work out for you. Please reach out to us at

productName: On All Filter Mask Zone Mist
review: with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted:)

productName: On All Filter Mask Zone Mist
review: This mist is a bit of a harsher spray, so I wouldn't recommend for people wanting a fine mist, but I will say that it has helped my maskne and my hormonal acne. My breakouts were reduced, I had less redness, and I had less pigmentation from my acne. It is pretty small for the price you pay, so we'll see how long it lasts. Overall, I'm happy with this product!

productName: On All Filter Mask Zone Mist
review: made my face feel super cool and nice!

productName: On All Filter Mask Zone Mist
review: Even without a mask, I tend to break out after a long flight. I used this mist once every few hours on an 8 hour flight, where my total travel time wearing the mask was probably about 12-14 hours and not a single zit! Only downfall is the spray bottle. It's a bit harsh, more spray than mist.

productName: On All Filter Mask Zone Mist
review: Definitely will buy this product again, absolutely love how hydrating and gentle it is. Great for my dry/combo skin.

productName: On All Filter Mask Zone Mist
review: I've been using this since I started back at school and have to wear a mask for 6 hours straight. I do think it's hydrating, but I do feel slightly greasy by the end of the day (maybe it's just me??). My biggest issue with this product is the "mist"‚Äîthere is nothing misty about the giant drops of product landing on my face, and the coverage of the spray is also feels kind of lacking. So, I don't think it's a bad product, but there's room for improvement.

Doesn't do anything for my skin (I have combination skin and get occasional breakouts). It also has a weird, viscosey texture. Toner is supposed to help you feel extra clean and I feel like this one does the opposite.
We are so sorry to hear this product did not work out for you. Please reach out to us via e-mail with your order number and we'll be happy to get you all sorted!
Great for sensitive skin

reviewTitles: Great for partnership with Topical Retinoids

It makes my face to feel very hydrated and very soft! HIGHLY RECOMMEND

I haven't used this enough yet but my first thoughts are that I love moisturizers that come in tubes because it feels more hygienic. I have dry skin and I wanted a moisturizer for the warmer weather. I've heard this is better suited for the winter months but my skin is so dry that it drinks this right up. With a serum underneath, I think this will make your skin look plump and dewy!

This moisturizer is very hydrating, and you only need a little to cover your whole face and neck. It's a gel consistency, but it's also a little watery/thin.
This was great as an addition to my routine; the product was very hydrating and soothing on the skin

This is part of my core essential routine year round! Great to use alone in the summer, and great to use under a thicker moisturizer during the winter months. I've never had any reaction to this, it's very lightweight and relatively affordable. I'll always make sure to have a back up on hand!
This is been my go-to moisturizer for years now! It's super hydrating without being too thick.

I have had acne prone skin and scarring for years. This is better than anything my derm has ever given me! It came in my allure beauty box and now I‚Äôm hooked. I use it in the morning and before bed. Especially great after exfoliations. Keep it in the fridge! I am buying more because I‚Äôm worried it‚Äôs going to go viral on TikTok

I purchased mostly for my daughter who struggles with acne. I can tell that this gel does his work in soothing skin, elimination of red spots and irritated skin. I even applied to my hair just a pea size but it didn't work well.
The only thing I liked about this product was how soothing and cooling it felt once applied to skin. I was not a fan of the sticky and tacky feeling it left behind.

productName: On Aloe Real Cool Soothing Gel
reviewTitles: so light! with a jelly consistency
review: Ive been using this product with my red-light device thing, and absorbs great! No stickiness at all, with nice cooling effect. Have not tried on sun-kissed skin yet, though

productName: On Aloe Real Cool Soothing Gel
review: Its so affordable and comes with so much product! It is such a great overall product for moisturizing, nourishing, and even reducing burns from the skin. Great product!

productName: On Aloe Real Cool Soothing Gel
review: I buy this every year because let‚Äôs face it, this is a must for everyone, especially for warmer months. If you sunbathe, you definitely need to put this on afterwards to keep your skin soft and looking young. I use it all over my body and can be used on the face as well.

productName: On Aloe Real Cool Soothing Gel
review: I use this as a pre-moisturizing step before my regular moisturizer and I've noticed that the combination makes my skin feel just a bit softer than usual. I also love how light is it.

productName: On Aloe Real Cool Soothing Gel
review: i love this. i tried the nature republic version but they have alcohol in it so it leaves my face feeling super dried out, but this one does not do that. it doesn't leave a sticky feeling either. it absorbs into my skin nicely and it's lightweight. i use it a lot during the winter when my face is the most dehydrated. i usually use it after my serum, before my moisturizer.

productName: On Aloe Soothing Mask Pack (10 Pack)
review: I love these mask they are super soothing and hydrating!

productName: On Aloe Soothing Mask Pack (10 Pack)
review: From my point of view and experience, this mask will suit all type of skin. It good to use on a hot and stress day. This mask can cool and clam your skin down when you have a long tire day. So yes, i will recommend this mask.

productName: On Aloe Soothing Mask Pack (10 Pack)
review: this is absolutly my favourite general use mask, I use it every time my face is tired or i spent too long in the sun and my skin feels so much better everytime! The value for money is unreal

productName: On Aloe Soothing Mask Pack (10 Pack)
review: These are fantastic at the end of the day when you've gotten a little bit too much sun, and I use the extra essence wherever else needs a bit of cooling and calming - neck, shoulders, arms... Works great, feels great, have already re-purchased.

productName: On Aloe Soothing Mask Pack (10 Pack)
review: These are lush. Crazy hydrating, no scent. I stuck it in the fridge for a little extra soothing after spending a long time outdoors. These will be kept in rotation

They are my favorite when I order them in the ten-pack, but every time I order singles they always have a terrible smell to them. I hate wasting them but I won't risk it because of my skin sensitivity.

My favorite sheet mask. I love that it doesn't have a smell. My face is so plump and hydrated the next morning.

I did this sheet mask following cleansing and toning, as usual. I have extremely sensitive, dry skin - especially during the wintertime in NYC with too many radiators pumping dry heat into my apartment. I used a gua sha to incorporate the serum deeper into my pores, yet my skin didn't feel or look more hydrated by the time I unmasked. In fact, the pores in my T-zone were suddenly full of sebum and massive. It didn't make me breakout, but it did take a few days to close my pores back up.

If you have dry skin or just need a good mask that'll give you a boost--this product will not disappoint.
This mask is very reasonable. It fits the face well and plumps the skin.

I have a normal skin type but it is severely dehydrated...this mask did wonders for my skin! it moisturized it to the max and I can honestly say that my skin was amazing and looked so healthy for days!
one of my favorites
This amino moisturizer mask left me dewy, soft & very moisturized. My makeup foundation never looked better!
Great but price is high. Packaging looks amazing
Love, love, love this for my hair. The best hair oil I've ever used. I have short hair, so one bottle can last me a whole year. Worth it, even at the price.
Not too greasy and gives shine and a silky texture to my hair. The scent isn‚Äôt too strong and it keeps my hair moisturized throughout the day.

I have tried many hair oils, and I can confidently say that I will NEVER be without this product again. The scent is lovely. The shine is incredible. This multipurpose oil tames frizz when I wear my hair in its natural curls, and it can also smooth and extend the life of a blowout. Holy grail.

I've tried other hair oils (to save money) but I keep coming back to this one. It lasts a while and maintains my hair better than anything else I've tried. My hair is quick to both take in and lose moisture, so I moisturize and then seal it all in with this oil. It doesn't leave my hair looking greasy whether applied damp or dry. The scent is pleasant and dissipates quickly.
Each mask has made my skin glow for days and feel so hydrated and smooth. No breakouts or irritation, I want more!

reviewTitles: Worth a Try If You Feel Overwhelmed By Selection
review: I wanted to try some new sheet masks out so I thought I'd give this a whirl. Two of the masks I received are now some of my favorites!

Saturday Skin Probiotic Cloud - I had to buy this mask again as soon as I used it. Leaves your skin luminous, plump and pillow soft. Plenty of liquid left over for your neck and d√©colletage. Great for no makeup days.

productName: On Apricot Collagen Youth Firming Ampoule
review: I think my age spots are beginning to fade after adding this to my routine. It is gentle and smells nice. My face feels more elastic and certainly more moist and dewy.

productName: On Apricot Collagen Youth Firming Ampoule
review: I had heard such great things about this ampoule and it did not disappoint. I saw immediate results, my skin seemed to smooth and soften. But there is a perfect amount of firmness as well. I will definitely be purchasing again.

productName: On Apricot Collagen Youth Firming Cream
review: I love this apricot collagen firming cream.

productName: On Argan Oil Silk Plus Hair Mask
review: My hair look better even though I applied only twice. I can't mix in one routine cleaning oil , pack and treatment. It was too much and my hair looked oily. Today I skipped oiling hair and is much better. Even styling hair seems to be easier.

productName: On Argan Oil Silk Plus Hair Mask
review: I used it only twice so far and I'm seeing improvement in my hair

productName: On Argan Oil Silk Plus Hair Mask
review: Better than expected! I'm a black woman with relaxed hair. This product made my hair thicker.

productName: On Argan Oil Silk Plus Hair Mask
review: Very high quality product, especially for the price. Perfect for everyday use as a conditioner or as a mask.

productName: On Argan Oil Silk Plus Hair Mask
review: I have thick, curly Indian hair and this mask works on my hair! Def made it smoother and softer. Still a few flyaways afterwards but I solved that with a leave-in product. Overall, would re-purchase.

review: Azelaic Acid is one of my favorite ingredients and this product highlights it so elegantly. Usually, azelaic acid serums or gels are quite grainy, but the formulation of this product is SO elegant, it quickly became my favorite option. Will definitely repurchase!

reviewTitles: It ITCHES my skin so bad
review: I don't know ingredient is in this product that my skin doesn't like, maybe the concentration is just too high, but my face itches SO BAD within minutes after I apply it, even over moisturizer. I have to wash it off with cool water because it also makes my skin a little red (which is the opposite of what I hoped it would do). I am just rubbing it all over my arms and chest to use the bottle up, will not be repurchasing again :(

I got this to try the line and fell in love with it. I noticed a difference in my within 2 weeks of using it. I also found it to be really hydrating for my skin. I am now looking into buying more products from them.

reviewTitles: Works but the emulsion would probably have been a better choice
review: Was VERY difficult to open, and you need more than you think to get it on evenly as it dries up very quickly even on oily skin (seems to be evaporating faster than sinking in). The emulsion would have been a better choice as it would be more spreadable and you can still apply moisturizers on top of that as well too.

I just finished a tube of this and it really helped sooth my irritated skin while adjusting to a tretinoin cream I've been using this year. The cream is very moisturizing, but not heavy and leaves my skin feeling protected when my skin barrier feels compromised. While the cream itself doesn't stand out, it integrated well with all of my skincare products and was a go-to product when I wanted a basic moisturizer at night.
I like this cream a lot after a peel or acid treatment, it‚Äôs very soothing and hydrating. Leave in overnight and skin is calm in the morning
I got this moisturizer as an add on to an order and I am in love. It actually helped calm and heal my skin after hormonal acne breakouts, plus is a great night time moisturizer.
This is really moisturizing and gentle. Love the smell too.

I am 25 and have highly sensitive/combination skin. I love this stuff and I didn't think it would. I use it as a part of my night time routine and its like magic in an aluminum tube. My breakout is cleared up and my skin is smooth/moisturized. I was a little intimidated by the medicinal look/smell because I didn't want it to make my skin worse, but it proved me wrong. If you are on the fence, I would give it a shot

reviewTitles: love the minimal packaging, but don't love the balm itself
review: too thick, doesn't feel as good as some other balms that turn oily then rinse off easily. this one is almost too thick, doesn't melt down in my hand as well.

productName: On Back To Relax Soothing Gel Mask
review: I have very sensitive skin. This mask is great! I always waking up feeling soft, moisturized and replenished! Love it after a long day at the beach.

productName: On Back To Relax Soothing Gel Mask
review: Wore this for 10min and washed it off. The next day I woke up with my face COVERED in whiteheads and red patches. I‚Äôm not allergic to any of the botanical ingredients so I suspect one of the chemicals in this mask is not safe for sensitive skin.

productName: On Baggage Claim Eye Masks - Gold
review: A little disappointed the mask wasn‚Äôt gold on both sides but was one of the most hydrating eye masks I‚Äôve used so far. A definite must-buy when it gets restocked!

productName: On Baggage Claim Eye Masks - Gold
review: I really enjoy products that deliver beneficial ingredients and results as well as have an experiential appeal. These eye masks really tick off all those boxes. I noticed a pretty big transformation the first time I used them on puffy /swollen morning eyes and now sometimes go over top of them with a cold spoon to double up the goodness. productName: On Baggage Claim Eye Masks - Gold
review: didn't depuff my eyes

review: This is amazing! I love how fine the mist is! it feels delicate, soft, hydrating, and so luxurious. I use this in my day and night time routine. I woke up feeling so refreshed and hydrated this morning! Loving it and will continue to use. I might need to get another for my gym bag!

productName: On Balancium Comfort Ceramide Cream Mist
reviewTitles: amazing for acne prone skin, light daily moisturizer
review: Night time routine: cleanse > toner > essence > serum > eye cream > moisturizer > mist > oil

productName: On Balancium Comfort Ceramide Cream Mist
review: I never write reviews, but I‚Äôm in love with this mist. My skin loves it too. I bought other things , like toner and a serum and they work great also. This is my new favorite cosmetic company.

productName: On Balancium Comfort Ceramide Cream Mist
review: I love this stuff, been using for a year and has not cause any acne, most products are irritating and pore clogging for me, ive tried almost everything and this is one of my faves.

productName: On Barely There Tinted Lip Oil
review: I like this for the gloss affect, but I did not find it had any color which is disappointing. For reference, I have lighter color lips that are a neutral pink. If you are looking for a nice gloss I think this works just fine, but just be mindful that it may not give you the color you are looking for. You can definitely pair it with a lipstick to add some extra glam to your look.

I really like this BB Creme! I just purchased it about a week ago, and I really love the matte finish. Can't go wrong with the SPF. Will continue using!
I wanted to like this product because I love the Erborian Skin Hero so much, but sadly this product is terrible.

I was expecting a lightweight moisturizer with some tint but this is SO HEAVY. It is basically just a foundation. I am a lighter-tone South Asian, so really none of the colors are ideal and I am always afraid of looking like a ghost. I went with caramel, and it looks atrocious. The color formulation is waaay too orange. The texture itself is a bit too chalky than I would like (so is the Skin Hero, but it's an otherwise flawless product so I give it a pass). My skin is very dry and this product is super drying and makes my skin feel tight. Especially for this price point, I wouldn't recommend this product. Sadly, I think this is unusable and will be going straight to the bin.

productName: On Best of K-Beauty Deluxe Set
review: I really appreciate having trial sets of products I'm curious about. I was a bit lazy with my skincare prior to purchasing this, and this really got me excited to get back into the routine of things. I did not like the Acwell Licorice pH Balancing Cleansing Toner paired only with a serum, but I really love it with my Neogen Real Ferment Micro Essence and will be purchasing the full size product. It elevates this essense to provide a dewy base for my sunscreen. I have always loved the I'm From mugwort essense, which smells amazing to me and is so calming. I'm purchasing the full size product of the Snail Bee Ultimate Serum, which feels very luxurious. I like the Manyo Factory Bifida Biome Complex Ampoule, but don't think I need an additional fermented product. The Saturday Skin Waterfall Glacier Water Cream was really nice, but i'm happy with my existing moisturizing creams, so I'll pass on purchasing the full size for now.

review: The only product I didn't love was the Banila Co Original Clean It Zero. I didn't like the smell and texture very much, but its a good cleanser. I'm grateful to have a trial of this because I was about to purchase a full size to compare it to the Then I Met You Living Cleansing Balm, which I adore.

I have sensitive, dry, acne prone skin and this mask felt so hydrating and my skin had a glow/dewy look all day. Amazing! Will definitely repurchase.

I didn't think much of this toner until I went ahead and tried it. I have sensitive, dry, acne-prone skin and I have been searching for my holy grail toner that moisturizes, strengthens barrier, and prevents breakouts. THIS is the toner you need - the probiotic blend plus witch hazel extract does both at once! The bottle is huge and it goes a long way. The liquid itself is more watery than gooey, so I would recommend it as a first step after cleansing. I am very particular about irritating ingredients, but this product's ingredients are very gentle and have no extra filler in them. The price point is fantastic, and the bottle will last you a long time. I'm only halfway through, but I bought a second bottle so I don't run out :)

reviewTitles: Perfect Moisturizing Toner With Perfect Price Point!
review: I've always used a alcohol-free toner; although as I'm reaching my upper 30's my skin has been going through such a change, and moisturizing toners have become my savior! With sensitive Combo skin I've noticed that gels or creams that are too moisturizing can lead to unexpected breakouts even though dry areas; however, moisturizing toners always tend to be the secret weapon to my lately unpredictable skin.

Ive been using this for about a month now and I think its breaking me out! I haven't noticed any differences besides little white heads. Its a huge bottle so Im hoping my skin will adjust, we will see!

I got this as my free sample. After checking the ingredients to make.sure there weren't any allergens I patch tested on.my arm. Everything was clear after 10 so I applied to my face after my normal wash routine and after my toner and essence.
All I can say it was bad. Immediate burning sensation and small red dots on my cheeks. My entire face is red like I was sunburned....and I'm extremely fair there is zero hiding this.

I rinsed off and then proceeded to do damage control. I have extremely sensitive skin and a lot of allergies so I always cross check my products. There should have been nothing that affected me in this. Several of the products I use daily have the same/similar ingredients in this ampoule. It should not have reacted with any of my reg products or with my skin in general.
The only thing I can think of is the pH is higher than I usually get. Most of my products have a pH well under 7 and a few are at 6. But 7.4 in this is still fairly low so no idea.

reviewTitles: Did not give long lasting hydration
review: I'll be honest, I tried the lip product from Naturium, and I had high hopes I'd like this product. Yet, I found my skin not feeling hydrated when applied. I would use it after coming out of the shower, and it would take vigorous strokes, rubbing it into my skin. It did not absorb into my skin as I'd hoped. I did however, I tried the Klair body and loved that, even though it is a bit more expensive. My skin actually increased in dryness. I opt to use natural shea butter instead.

Typically, I end up using this anywhere from once biweekly up to once a month! Easy to use, stores well, and works amazingly!

productName: On Black Rice Hyaluronic Anti Wrinkle Serum
review: It didn‚Äôt make a difference for my fine lines after two months. I do like the packaging and the light scent and it didn‚Äôt clog my pores or cause my reactive skin to break out.

productName: On Black Rice Hyaluronic Anti Wrinkle Serum
review: I use this around my eyes and forehead and 100% notice a difference in the elasticity of the skin. After using for ~6 weeks, those areas feel bouncier and very hydrated, huge plus that my under my eye makeup looks way better too! I was just using this in the AM but have switched to using it AM & PM since I loved the results. I use right after my toner / essence / serum step!

I 1st read about this toner when it was still hard to find. A few months later, a sample of it appeared in 1 of my subscription boxes. And I fell in love. I love that it's a slight more viscous of what u may think of as a toner, but its still thinner than a serum. Its just lovely & nourishing & fragrance-free & that perfect hydrating step. Some AM's, I've only applied this, then SPF, and I am good! I love its versatility, ability to absorb, hydrate and it's fragrance-free & doesn't bother my acne & sensitivity.

This toner is truly a game-changer to my whole routine. Since I have been using it, the product has been really gentle with my acne-prone skin. I have a habit of not doing a patch test on my skin, though I'm glad to report that nothing negative came out of it!
Sad to say that my bottle is about to run empty, but I look forward to restocking it.

This is my favorite toner. I am on my third bottle. It has the best skin-loving ingredients and is the perfect start to my skin care routine. I put it in the palm of my hand and press it into my face and neck. It preps my skin for everything I put on after. Definitely will continue to purchase this toner. I will not let myself run out.

review: I keep one in the shower and by the sink. Have tried several cleansers and this is by far my favorite. It foams up nicely making my face feel clean. The scents are nice. And when it gets to the bottom add water and it will last and last.

productName: On Blueberry Real Fresh Foam Cleanser
review: So I have very dry skin (although not sensitive) that gets easily dried out by most every cleanser. With other cleansers, my face always felt unbearably tight and dry until I could slather on some moisturizer to reverse the damage. But with this product I'm not running to my moisturizer like before (though ofc I still use one)! A real game changer for dry skin!

productName: On Blueberry Real Fresh Foam Cleanser
review: It‚Äôs a nice clean without feeling dry, but the air in my house is dry so the water on my face seems to evaporate a lot quicker. It also kind of burns around the perimeter of my mouth. Wouldn‚Äôt recommend to sensitive types.

productName: On Blueberry Real Fresh Foam Cleanser
reviewTitles: Does nothing to help remove makeup
review: I bought this because I‚Äôm older and wanted something to help clean my ‚Äúmature‚Äù skin. The second bottle I bought the pump jammed and I had to open it and waste most of the product. My skin felt tight after every usage and it didn‚Äôt take any of my makeup off. I wanted something that got off anything my other cleansing missed. This didn‚Äôt do the trick. Now I‚Äôm looking for a better cleanser.

productName: On Blueberry Real Fresh Foam Cleanser
review: I love it so much ,and I like the smell. I love my skin feeling after use it. I recommend it !

productName: On Blueberry Real Fresh Foam Cleanser
review: I like this face wash a lot. I use it at night as a double cleanse after an oil cleanser. It is kinda perfect for that, but I found it to be slightly too drying for morning use. Cleanses well and is gentle on the skin

productName: On Blueberry Real Fresh Foam Cleanser
review: Love this cleanser. I‚Äôve been using the green tea version and decided to switch it up. So glad I tried this one

productName: On Blueberry Real Fresh Foam Cleanser
review: Doesn‚Äôt strip moisture from your skin. Deep cleans yet skin doesn‚Äôt feel tight.

productName: On Blueberry Real Fresh Foam Cleanser
review: its a classic. i love this line of cleansers and this one specifically is my favorite. I have very dry skin that is prone to hormonal acne and it never lets me down.

productName: On Brillie Hand Wash Variety Set
review: This is the best hand soap I‚Äôve ever used. All of the scents smell so good and natural. Each soap pack lasts so long, even though I was my hands very very frequently throughout the day, so the multi set is so worth it for the price. The soap itself feels so smooth and soft on my skin and lathers really nicely. Doesn‚Äôt leave my hands feeling dry after which is shocking. I‚Äôm in love.

productName: On Brillie Hand Wash Variety Set
review: I love love love this soap! I have tried so many planet friendly soap options from blue land to homemade recipes and I am obsessed with this. I was my hands mutiple times daily and one packet of the soap with last minimum 3 months I feel like. It‚Äôs sooooo hydrating and your hands feel beyond clean!

productName: On Brillie Hand Wash Variety Set
review: Really happy with this product. The foam is thick and feels silky smooth. It doesn't dry my skin too much either. I have only tried the vanilla so far, which has a nice scent that is not overpowering.

productName: On Brillie Hand Wash Variety Set
review: Great hand soap, love it. Gave it to three people as gifts as well. All three, including myself, had problems with the pump after awhile. We all have dried to fix it, but the pumps dont last long. I wish I could get this info to the manufacturer. Other than that I love the shop and looks of the container

productName: On Brillie Hand Wash Variety Set
review: This set is way better than I expected! I feared it would be too watery, but it's a rich foam with a nice subtle scent. It also leaves my hands feeling more moisturized than my typical drug store hand washes. Love that it's refillable! Looks nice on the counter too.

productName: On Bubi Bubi Bubble Lip Scrub
review: Didn‚Äôt do a much of anything. Slightly bubbled. But that was it.

productName: On Bubi Bubi Bubble Lip Scrub
reviewTitles: Does what it says, but proceed with caution
review: Unfortunately, I was unable to continue use of this product, as it caused my lips to have a reaction, and I gained a few cold sores along the way :(

productName: On Bubi Bubi Bubble Lip Scrub
review: When I did use it, I was impressed with how it lifted the dead skin away via a bubble effect.

productName: On Bubi Bubi Bubble Lip Scrub
review: My daughter now owns it, and she has had no problems.

productName: On Bubi Bubi Bubble Lip Scrub
review: I would say that, if you're prone to cold sores, then this might not be a suitable purchase for you.

productName: On Bubi Bubi Bubble Lip Scrub
review: I liked the compact size but at the same time wish it was a little bigger. I think it does a great job doing a gentle cleaning of the dead skin on lips. Although wish the product had more in it because it can be pricy for $12.

productName: On Bubi Bubi Bubble Lip Scrub
review: This is my first chemical lip scrub (I've used a physical one before). It's so oddly satisfying to see the dead skin shed off! It's a great addition to my lip care routine; I've always been a lip balm addict and now I'm happy to prep with this bubbly scrub!

productName: On Bubi Bubi Bubble Lip Scrub
review: Refreshed. Cleasing lips

productName: On Bubi Bubi Bubble Lip Scrub
review: I know others are saying this did nothing but to be honest im not sure if they‚Äôve used the product properly. This removed 70% of the dry skin on my lips and was awesome.

productName: On Bubi Bubi Bubble Lip Scrub
review: I read so many awesome reviews about this scrub, but I feel like it‚Äôs just mediocre. I don‚Äôt feel it exfoliates at all, but I do like how it bubbles!
Looks black but goes on clear. Works adequately overnight. Overall pleased.
Thought it was a really good moisturizer for the price point. I feel like my lips glow when I wear this product. Product goes on clear.
This is a non-oily formula, my lips were chapped during my trip to NYC, and this balm healed them overnight

I've been using the Laneige Lip Mask for years now. I bought this because it looked like it could be similar and because I was kind of tired of paying the upward $30 amount for a lip mask that I finished within a month. I used this the other night and it is actually extremely similar to the other lip mask, and does not cost as much for a similar product. While the price difference isn't too much, I like the smell of this product more.
the prettiest pink color and blends so well
First time i tried ph reactive make up and was amazed. it looks very natural and has a bit of a glow to it.

This blush is sooo pretty on the skin. I love how bright pink it is and how dewy the finish is. It's not sticky either! It really brightened my complexion and look and something I reach for daily. I have a light skin tone and it shows up well. My sister does have a medium dark skin tone and she used it and it barely showed up unfortunately but you can see slightly.

This is honestly so pretty, I LOVE the shade that it turned on my skin, it's super flattering. My cousin tried it as well and it was a slightly different shade that also looks great on her! The packaging is so cool, I love that its bright green and orange. I also really like that it stays dewy looking, so it looks great over dry patches. I've worn it a few times and it's lasted all day each time, I didn't need to touch up. If you're wearing a mask or sweating a lot you may need to though, although I think it would be easy to add more with this formula. It's also very buildable!

I've used Klairs vitamin C for years and wanted to try something new since it was out of stock at the time. I've been using this since December to give me akon tomw to react before commenting. My skin has had a reaction to it. I'm in my postpartum stage so my skin is in flux and I'm trying to heal some pregnancy melasma. This product just doest jive my with my skin and leaves it red, irritated, and slightly painful. May work for others but I'll be going back to Klairs.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error and I‚Äôm sorry that this ampoule did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences:)

So for the the longest time I was using Klairs vitamin C serum. It did help but not as efficient as this ampoule! I use it at night only because the sun will damage the product and my skin. Its light and not oily like the Klairs

So I‚Äôm almost through the bottle of this stuff. I bought this to try instead of a vitamin c serum made with ascorbic acid because I‚Äôve had a hard time finding a good one. This serum feels nice on the skin, is fragrance-free, and is non-irritating. However, I haven‚Äôt noticed any benefits to my skin claimed. This product definitely doesn‚Äôt deliver the same results as an actual vitamin C serum, and the niacinamide in it I know is good for skin but I haven‚Äôt really noticed any effects from that either. This product is akin to putting on a water gel to my skin and that‚Äôs it. I also want to note that this product doesn‚Äôt tell you the concentration of niacinamide so I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs very much and that may be why I haven‚Äôt seen much benefit. I‚Äôm using the bottle up so not to waste it, but I won‚Äôt repurchase. This product was disappointing.

I‚Äôve been using this product since 2021. It does exactly what it says. It‚Äôs given me more toned and glowing skin. I tend to use it during my morning routine 4-5 times a week. I saw results within the first week of using it. Don‚Äôt forget your sunscreen!
I don't use a lot of products, so I like multitasking skin care. My skin likes this and is responding well.

reviewTitles: I love this company but meh not this product
review: This product did not do anything for my skin unfortunately. I have dry, sensitive skin especially in the winter. This did not help even out my skin tone. It also did not make my face brighter, just made it red :/.
I have ordered this one a few times but stopped using it a while back bc I forgot to re-order. Definitely getting it again, it really helps with my hyperpigmentation / acne scars!

reviewTitles: By far the best vitamin C, I always come back to it
review: I was a bit nervous buying this. I've used the old formula and loved it, so I was scared the new one would not work well with my skin. I was wrong. It feels exactly the same as the old one but better. I have oily and sensitive skin and my skin and it worked well with me. It definitely does not oxidize as quickly as the old one. It goes on nicely and does not cause my sunscreen to pill. Will definitely repurchase.

I used the whole bottle, my experience with it was ok. Not really any complaints, it went on smooth and wasn‚Äôt sticky. People seem to dislike the smell but I didn‚Äôt think it had much of a scent so that‚Äôs a positive. This one just didn‚Äôt seem to do as much for my skin as past serums. But my skin is picky, so could just be a miss for my skin which ok:) worth the trial
Great, simple vitamin C for daily use! Definitely helped with hyperpigmentation. Would recommend!
Great texture
This lotion has a light yummy scent and is very moisturizing without being too heavy
Repaired heel cracking , but isn‚Äôt too heavy for body, nice floral scent, not overpowering, but noticible, effective moisture like an essence lotion for body

This is my first body product I‚Äôve bought from Soko glam and it‚Äôs good. I like the scent of it because it smells like coffee but it‚Äôs a very average body wash. It does what it says it does but I haven‚Äôt really seen a difference. Nothing bad about it but it‚Äôs not the best body wash I‚Äôve ever tried.

This may be my favorite purchase I have made from Soko Glam. I struggle with mild-moderate body acne and have struggled to find something to help. I have only used this product a few times paired with the tea tree care body spray by Klavuu and WOW WOW WOW I already see a difference in my skin. I am so impressed by just a few uses. I am definitely buying the whole set and will keep purchasing in the future. What a GREAT product. It also has a nice smell to it.
It honestly doesn‚Äôt seem like the product does anything for me. I‚Äôm better off using coffee grounds and an oil mix for a scrub.

reviewTitles: A little doesn't go a long way
review: We are sorry to hear that about your Cafferonic Body Scrub. Please reach out to us via email at
with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

This is my go to body wash ever since I tried it. I‚Äôve bought it for all my friends and family. It‚Äôs very moisturizing and smells really nice- not too strongly of coffee. It doesn‚Äôt leave residue or anything either but it definitely makes my skin feel super soft and smooth! I‚Äôm definitely obsessed!
Smells great, feels good on my skin

productName: On Calm Movements Eye & Cheek Mask (Set of 5)
review: I really enjoyed these and felt immediate gratification! I truly loved how comfortable they are to wear and plan on trying more from this brand. Another great Soko Glam purchase.

productName: On Calm Movements Eye & Cheek Mask (Set of 5)
review: I have used these masks twice before putting my makeup on for a wedding. My skin texture becomes smoother and my cheeks glow.

productName: On Calm Movements Eye & Cheek Mask (Set of 5)
review: Excellent product. I loved that after I was done with it on my face I slapped it on the back of my hands and that was fabulous.

I use this after the gym and every night at the beginning of my skincare routine. I never thought there was much difference in micellar waters but i think this one is special. I have sensitive skin and this micellar feels extra nourishing and hydrating.

reviewTitles: Enjoyed this but will use another for now
review: I have combination skin + acne. On my chin line and dry areas I LOVED this as a toner. As light and non-drying. But on my T-zone I need something more. But I agree with other reviewers that it is great! I never used it as a water based cleanser though (didn't realize at the time it was one since I saw it in a review as a toner).
Love this cleanser! It removes all my makeup, refines my pores, leaves my face smooth and comfortable. I have VERY sensitive skin.
I love this product. It leaves my face feeling hydrated as my water based double cleanse. The smell is clean and fresh. No sticky or tacky residue just clean.

This is gentle on the skin. Doesny leave the skin tight, dry. It is my go to when i dont have a lot on the face and need a quick clean up before bed. Or just for the morning instead of washing my face.
I started using this as my morning cleanser and just love the way it leaves my skin so smooth. It seems really gentle and non-drying, too.

This is a must have! Repurchased as soon as I ran out. Light and calming but effective. Leaves you feeling clean but not tight and stripped. Love the light scent as well. I will continue to repurchase.

I use this as my morning or in-between cleanser and I love it. There's also a nice calming effect if I go in for blackhead treatment and need something to sooth the swelling/redness. Very nice and easy to use product!
It smells so good, and my skin feels soft and clean. I wish it came in a giant shower gel form!
I use this every day. I love it. It does a good job at getting my face clean, but I don't wear a whole lot of makeup.

productName: On Calming Clear Milk Peel Cleansing Balm
review: Absolutely adore this product, makes my skin so soft and smooth without irritation.

productName: On Calming Clear Milk Peel Cleansing Balm
review: As a person with moderately sensitive skin, I am always a bit wary when adding in an exfoliant to my routine. **HOWEVER** this cleansing balm is so light and refreshes my skin after each use. I have combo/sensitive skin with my t-zone being the prime area for where I get clogged pores and hormonal breakouts. I have to say that even after a few uses my pores were noticeably smaller and clear. This product will definitely be a staple in my routine.

productName: On Calming Clear Milk Peel Cleansing Balm
review: I liked it when I first started using it, partially because I liked the idea of a balm so traveling with it is less of a mess, but after I tried a regular cleaning oil I realized this didn't do as good of a job getting the daily grime off my skin. Soo there's nothing wrong with it but I wouldn't recommend it to anyone either.
This totally works but is nearly impossible to get onto your face neatly. It is so soaked, you really can't get it to lay flat.
Soothes at red blemishes and overall complexion looks revived my go to
Didn‚Äôt do much for me.

productName: On Calming serum : Green tea + Panthenol
review: Oh, wow. I am absolutely in love with this serum. So, so calming and soothing and really helps to reduce my redness.

productName: On Calming serum : Green tea + Panthenol
review: Works great on my sensitive and red skin!

productName: On Calming serum : Green tea + Panthenol
review: My skin is acne prone and this product helps a lot in calming my skin. it helps a lot around that time of the month when the skin is irritated . I have seen very positive results when using it.

productName: On Calming serum : Green tea + Panthenol
reviewTitles: It does what it says it does!
review: When my skin is very sensitive I tried this product. I don't use it often just when I notice my skin has a little more redness and irritation so usually around summer time. It reduced my redness and irritation by a lot and before I knew it my skin felt like it went back to normal. I keep this with me all the time just in case I need my skin to relax!

productName: On Calming serum : Green tea + Panthenol
review: I have nothing overwhelmingly positive to say about this product. Doesn't feel like it's doing anything.

reviewTitles: Started as a gift and became an essential
review: The ratio of people that I've let test this product to the amount that raved about the effects? 10/10 would recommend! If you don't like your skin feeling a bit tight and dry after, not the product for you, but I've seen a huge difference in the clarity of my skin!

reviewTitles: Best clay mask I have tried
review: Love this mask. Very cleansing while still being hydrating and soothing. Has a very interesting sensation that wasn't my favorite at first, but ended up not minding. Feels like pop rocks, but not in a bad way.

i've used a few clay masks but this one is my favorite. noticed smaller pores within the first couple of uses. all clay masks are going to make your face tight because they suck out the oil out of your face, but this one isn't nearly as drying as most of the other masks i've used before
I LOVE this masK!
This sucks oil out of pores, it is so tingly and my skin always looks so glowy and clean after. I also use a little bit as a lathering face wash sometimes.
Lovely, light skin cream

I really enjoyed this! Received a sample size of this and was sad it finished! This feels very smooth going on and leaves my skin feeling replenished. Really like the ingredient and will be purchasing the full size.

I've struggled to find a good moisturizer as my skin soaks up everything very fast but it also doesn't like creams that are too thick for everyday use. This is the perfect balance for me, for both summer and winter. I literally noticed changes the next day and omg, it makes my skin feel like silk.. This is going to be my staple for daily moisturizer from here on out. I highly recommend it!

I've been using this for about six weeks now. I'm not sure if it's using this alone, nightly, or that I've been also taking a collagen hydration supplement, but my skin has been looking so much better than it has in the past. I have very oily skin--like oil-slick within an hour of washing oily. It's also "oily but dehydrated" which means I have to use a combo of lightweight hydrating products with mattifying ones. Because of all of this my pores are very prominent. (I used to get called strawberry nose when I was younger.) My texture issues have improved so, so much since using this, so much so, that I feel more confident than I ever have to go without makeup. I think it has a mild retinol-like effect because carrots are high in vitamin A, and retinol is essentially topical vitamin A. As I said, I use it at night directly on the skin, no serums before, just an exfoliating LHA toner before, that I put on with a cotton pad. I realized after the first two tries that I need to then layer a mix of two drops of oil plus a hyaluronic acid serum on top, followed by a layer of a very, very lightweight moisturizer. Misting something watery like a witch hazel between layers also helps. If you've been struggling with texture issues, but have been hesitant to use anything retinol like, I think this is worth a try.
my go to moisturizer in dry winters

productName: On Carrot Deep Clear Remover Oil Pad
review: I‚Äôve been using this for two weeks and at first I had a really bad reaction with lots of acne. I stuck through it and now my acne has leveled out but it‚Äôs still more than when I was using the banila oil cleanser so I will just go back to what was working for me.

productName: On Carrot Deep Clear Remover Oil Pad
review: with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

productName: On Carrot Deep Clear Remover Oil Pad
review: Wiped face and washed with water, day after day skin got worse and more swollen face is actually in pain.

productName: On Carrot Deep Clear Remover Oil Pad
review: The pads feels so good on the skin. It really does give me a squeeky good clean!

productName: On Carrot Deep Clear Remover Oil Pad
review: I‚Äôve purchased this item not too long and it removes ALL OF MY MAKEUP! Not harsh on my oily skin.

productName: On Carrot Deep Clear Remover Oil Pad
reviewTitles: Totally does the job, but I think I‚Äôm allergic to something in the formula
review: As the title says, it is great removing oil but something in the formula made my eyes itch and burn for about an hour after application. I tried it again once with the same issue before I just gave it away but I don‚Äôt know if they dealt with the same issue.

productName: On Carrot Deep Clear Remover Oil Pad
review: I really wanted to love this product. I was looking for a product to do a good double cleanse and thought this would be it. I am using this along with the peptide no sebum mild gel cleanser. I have been getting tiny little pustules around my face. I‚Äôve slowly started to cut products out of my routine . I believe this is the corrupt sadly.

I love this CC water for year round use! I have oily skin, so this light version works for me. It makes my skin look beautiful without looking like it has heavy make-up on. It looks more natural than foundation. The slightly darker tint (compared to the CC cream) works for me (I use caramel). This is the only base I use now, with primer and sunscreen underneath during the day. I will continue to buy this forever!
I don't wear makeup and I wanted something just to make my skin even this is perfect it's very light feels like I don't have anything on my skin and takes away all of the uneven skin tones
I wanted something to replace my IT Cosmetics CC Cream. This was not it ‚Ä¶ The coverage is so light. It may (or may not - I really couldn‚Äôt tell) even out skin tone but that is about it.

reviewTitles: I don't think it does anything for me
review: My skin's redness doesn't improve when I use this.
It doesn‚Äôt fit on my skin unfortunately

I love facial mists, and I use them very flexibly in my routine (sometimes first, sometimes last). This toner is gentle and refreshing, I really like it. The only thing is, the spray is very intense like soaks my whole face in liquid with one pump...which I guess is great for product longevity!

I got this product on Amazon and I got to say, I love it! The water is very gentle and doesn't sting my face or neck. I use this everyday, morning and night, and especially when my face is inflamed by some other products or actives. I like that it comes with a spray that allows me to easily cover a wide area without having to manually rub to spread the liquid. This product has a refreshing scent but is not overly fragranced. I think the scent comes from the Centella asiatica leaf water and not some essential oil so I think it is safe for people with sensitive skin to use. Overall, I would purchase this product again.
Mi piel se siente fresca.

productName: On Chasin' Rabbits Aloe U Vera Much Soothing Gel
review: I love this soothing gel. It keeps my skin moisturized. The gel is sticky when first applied. Overall, happy with the purchase!

productName: On Chasin' Rabbits Aloe U Vera Much Soothing Gel
review: I bought this to use as a conductive gel for my microcurrent device and it works exceptionally well! I like this so much more than the gels that come with the device. It‚Äôs a beautiful simple formula with great ingredients. Four stars because it dries down sliiiightly sticky and remains a bit sticky for a while. But overall, lovely and lightweight product for added hydration!

productName: On Chasin' Rabbits Limited Edition Set
review: I've been using this set for a couple of days now and so far I am LOVING it! Usually, I have a pretty oily T-Zone, but since it's been getting colder, my skin has been so dry it was literally flaking off. I've been using this set morning and night and it doesn't leave my skin feeling tight like my last cleanser. I like that this leaves my skin feeling and looking hydrated all day. I think I am going to find something a little more intensive for night moisturizer. I'm giving it 4-stars because I will have to keep using it to see how it really affects my skin after longer use, but if it continues the way it is, it's an easy 5-star set! Also the little bag and stickers are such a cute touch and I love the headband, it fits very well without being too tight.

productName: On Chasin' Rabbits Limited Edition Set
review: I love these products so I decided to buy myself this gift set. I am a little disappointed. I should have just saved the extra money and bought the 3 full sized products separately. The bag and headband is not worth the extra $10. The headband is small and keeps popping off my head (I just have an average sized head!) The bag is what the products were packed in and it has writing about the products all over it. That makes it a little awkward, imo.

productName: On Chasin' Rabbits Limited Edition Set
review: If you want to make your own set, I suggest you just buy all 3 separate products and the adorable and functional $5 headband from Etude House.

productName: On Chasin‚Äô Rabbits All About Glow Multi-Balm
review: I was absolutely stunned when I saw the size of this product, it is so small, almost like a mini product and it is so expensive. Gives a glow but doesn't last long.

productName: On Chasin‚Äô Rabbits All About Glow Multi-Balm
review: Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I‚Äôm sorry that this product disappointed you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

productName: On Chasin‚Äô Rabbits All About Glow Multi-Balm
reviewTitles: Very moisturizing and leaves good shine
review: It takes only a very small amount to keep your face very well moisturized. Between that and the convenient packaging, it's worth every penny.

productName: On Chasin‚Äô Rabbits Drunken Hand Pomade
reviewTitles: Love smell and hydrates pretty well
review: I like using this morning and night when I am also applying my cuticle oil. It does have a temporary greasy feel but I always apply onto back of my hands and rum in most of it before getting on my palms. Any extra greasy feeling I rub my palms into my elbows and it‚Äôs all good. productName: On Chasin‚Äô Rabbits Drunken Hand Pomade

productName: On Chasin‚Äô Rabbits Drunken Hand Pomade
review: Amazing scent and the texture is not grease at all after absorbed. Recommended if you like vanilla and peppermint scent.

productName: On Chok Chok Green Tea Watery Cream

productName: On Chok Chok Green Tea Watery Cream

productName: On Chok Chok Green Tea Watery Cream
review: Soooo soft it is absurd. Like one of the softer products I‚Äôve ever put on my skin. Feels heavenly and hydrates well.

productName: On Chok Chok Green Tea Watery Cream
review: just the right night cream for summer!

productName: On Chok Chok Green Tea Watery Cream
review: Great daytime moisturizer. Seems to help sebum production, skin soothing, doesn‚Äôt irritate acne, and leaves a beautiful finish to my skin. If you have some dry spots like me, you may want a heavier moisturizer to spot treat or use overnight. Perfect during the day, even in the hot summer.

productName: On Chok Chok Green Tea Watery Cream
review: From now on my go to moisturizer for hot / Florida humid weather. Got this recommended from one of their employees via direct email. My skin honestly doesn‚Äôt produce as much sebum anymore. It‚Äôs light and instantly sinks in. Seems small but you honestly only need a dime amount! I combine this with my green tea fresh toner and adore them both together. Haven‚Äôt had a breakout in 2 weeks. Diet still bad tho haha

productName: On Chok Chok Green Tea Watery Cream
review: Not sure this is going to work for me. I was looking for a light moisturizer I can wear in the winter because my regular gel moisturizer isn't cutting it. I like the texture and it feels great at night when I put it on.

productName: On Chok Chok Green Tea Watery Cream
review: However, I am breaking out more along my jaw and around my mouth. I think this cream and regularly wearing a mask is too much for my skin.

I‚Äôm almost finished with the bottle. I have dry, sensitive skin tendencies. I wash my face and then follow with this before applying a prescription retinoid or the occasional AHA at night. It‚Äôs liquid, almost a soft water like consistency. Someone mentioned the bottle being convenient and I would agree with that. The valve on top acts as a good portion control. The product itself is just okay (especially for the price). There are definitely more effective products out there. It does have soothing qualities but even that I find to just be kind of meh.

I have sensitive skin that gets red easily but with this stuff, it calms my skin and the itchiness disappears fast. I use it morning and night and notice it does help other products sink into my skin better. Cica is a skin saver
This product is great. I do not break out as often as I did since I started to use this product.

I have to say, the design of the bottle is great. When I tip it over, not a lot comes out. Just a good amount . I tap 2-3 times and it is enough for my entire face. I like this a lot because for other products, I tap once and a lot comes out. this is totally worth it.
I have very sensitive skin--Why? Simply because I use prescription Retin- A every night--which is amazing---but it destroys the skin barrier. So, I am using this Cica Essence and LOVING IT!!!

This essence is the first essence I've used so I don't have much experience with it, but this definitely feels like a toner. I treat it like a toner in that this is the first product I'm putting on my face after I've washed it. I haven't had any bad reactions, and it does feel soothing, especially after long days of wearing makeup or being in the sun.
When my skin is feeling sensitive this is one of the products I reach for. It's got a thin/watery consistency so I usually use it as a toner, let it dry down, then pat it on like an essence.

So I may have chemically burnt my skin from another product that was packed with harsh ingredients. I needed to repair my skin barrier again and this cica essence completely changed it. I had to quit all my actives and was hyper focused on getting the moisture in my skin. This essence helped when accompanied after a toner and before a moisturizer for me. It is a watery consistency and the bottle itself is simple. I would say the top may over-pour if you‚Äôre not careful. Also patting it down and not rubbing it in helps. Overall, Dewy Tree is a great brand and I switched over to their face wash when I bought this one. The combination of both helped me get away from those chemical burns from another product in about a week.
I am obsessed with this! I never knew how much I needed essence in my routine. My skin soaks in all of the goodness and leaves it super dewy without looking oily. This has solved my dry skin problem!
This is gradually helping my redness on my nose
My most favorite sheet mask. It plumps the skin and hydrated like no other. It‚Äôs also always cool no matter if kept in the refrigerator or not.
Love anything with cica!
Light and easy to apply. Not as good as other cica masks I've tried
I work outside and use this mask for a little restoring work after long days in the sun
works amazing for my skin
i have this one and the squeeze green sheet masks. this is my favorite brand of sheet masks

I always find face sheets messy to use, and this is no exception - although it does an amazing job reducing redness + swelling! If you have sudden breakouts and ~40min to spare before a big event, i'd pop one of these on!

reviewTitles: very hydrating and calming to the skin
review: does a lovely job of relaxing the skin bringing down redness and overall a great experience
I love the Cica essence and masks. The travel cleanser is amazing. It will last sooo long as a little bit goes a long way. I‚Äôm actually ordering this set again just to get the travel cleanser!
the essence is so refreshing! love the thicker texture of the cleanser.
I knew I loved this essence and the masks so bought this. Great value for some of my favorite SoKo Glam products I‚Äôve come back to for a couple years now!

The Essence is the best product (5 stars) : I notice almost all redness on my face gone a few minutes after applying it. I don't detect any fragrance, and it feels soothing and calming. It is clear with a little beige/tan tinge when I shake a few drops into the palm of my hand.

productName: On Clean Forever Young Biome Ampoule
review: Je recommande ce s√©rum ! La texture p√©n√©tre rapidement sans effet gras ni collant. La pipette est tr√®s pratique √† utiliser. Il est adapt√© aux peaux sensibles. La peau est plus √©clatante et nourrie.

productName: On Clean Forever Young Biome Ampoule
reviewTitles: So surprised how well this works
review: This has definitely made it into my daily routine. I was a little skeptical at first because the texture is a little odd and thick. But it absorbs very well and leaves the skin feeling hydrated but not sticky. Instantly I noticed my skin was calmer, hydrated and more firm. Additionally, I noticed that some dry spots on my face pretty much went away instantly. Couldn‚Äôt recommend more.

productName: On Clean Forever Young Biome Ampoule
review: I am new to rover in, in fact I had never heard of it. Frankly, I think they have some of the best products out there. I had persistent eczema on my ear and using Rovectin products has completely eliminated it. The bombe is like a serum, I use it like one. There is absolutely no smell and it absorbs easily in the skin. Together with the cream my skin is very smooth and looks great. And the price is right too. Everything is so superior to the expensive products that I have been using from another high end brand. Finally, great skin and yet no greasy feel.

productName: On Clean it Zero Brightening Peeling Gel
review: I have used peels before but this is by far the best! It washes off nicely without residue and I have a nice glow afterwards.

productName: On Clean it Zero Brightening Peeling Gel
review: This is great for exfoliating! I use it 1-2 times a week and it delivers on the results! My face feels very smooth and bright every time!

productName: On Clean it Zero Brightening Peeling Gel
review: It has just a little more 'grit' than other peeling gels, so I feel it exfoliates much better. It has a nice citrus scent thats not overpowering and leaves my skin so smooth + bright!

productName: On Clean it Zero Brightening Peeling Gel
review: This is a great exfoliant. Lately I have been using it while in the shower for easy clean up.

review: I bought this hoping it would be an affordable option comparable to the Then I Met You cleansing balm, but it did not live up to my expectations. I agree with the other review that says it's hard to rinse off. It doesn't really emulsify well, and then it will not rinse off. It just becomes sticky and greasy. productName: On Clean it Zero Cleansing Balm Brightening
review: On the plus side, it did not irritate my very sensitive skin. Even when it was hard to clean off, it didn't irritate my skin or clog my pores.

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Nourishing
review: It not as good as the pink one but it nice it does melt I your skin and cleanse any makeup but I think the pink is better for my skin

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Nourishing
review: While I don‚Äôt see this version different than the others, I enjoy using and it‚Äôs great to get makeup off. Good scent and great size that will last awhile, especially if you only use when you wear makeup sporadically like I do :)

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Nourishing
reviewTitles: Great for when I'm feeling dry

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Nourishing
review: I feel like I'm probably in the minority, but this really dried my skin out! I used it from late spring until mid-Aug and found myself having to moisturize like it was mid-winter. Normally, I don't have as many issues with dryness in the summer months. I'm pretty certain that the issue stemmed from this, as it was the only variant/new product in my routine. I used it up, so I feel like I gave it enough time - just wasn't for me! As soon as I moved a different product into the cleansing oil/balm step, my skin was back to normal. It's not awful or anything, just maybe not for every type of dry skin!

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Original
review: Takes all my makeup off.

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Original
review: my skin is so soft. This product Preps my skin for Double cleansing. It makes my

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Pore Clarifying
review: I wrote a review before saying that this product didn‚Äôt work for me after I used it every day, and I have discovered that I was actually just using the product wrong. You‚Äôre supposed to add it dry to the face and then add water to wash it off, but I was adding the water first so it was not as effective. I can‚Äôt find the review that I posted to remove it so I‚Äôm hoping to at least cancel it out and set the record straight! This is a good product.

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Pore Clarifying
review: My 17 year old absolutely loves this. She has sensitive skin and has no issues with this product. It helps control her acne, makes her skin feel hydrated, helps take off makeup and the best part is that she doesn't break out in a rash with it. She absolutely loves the balm!

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Pore Clarifying
review: I love this cleanser so much, it‚Äôs helped my skin improve by miles. It‚Äôs softer and more hydrated than it‚Äôs ever been.

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Purifying
reviewTitles: Favorite Makeup Remover / Simple Routines / Washing Face in Shower
review: After several years this is still my favorite way to remove makeup - it's easy, gentle on my skin and eyes, and removes the hard stuff (eyeliner and liquid lipstick), is non-irritating, non-drying, and barely scented (it even passed my most sensitive-skin friend's usage tests and she doesn't like anything!!). You don't need a lot of product so it lasts 4-6 months+ easy, and it's a lot less messy than a plain oil to work with, which is why I tried it in the first place! I like to put it on before I jump into the shower and then rinse it off there to keep my routine simple (I can't be the only one who hates to wash their face at sinks, right?)

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Purifying
review: My skin always feels better when I use this product. I highly recommend it.

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Purifying
review: I will buy this over and over again. It is great to remove what you need and it is so light on the skin. It does not feel stripping at all. Love love love!

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Purifying
review: My face have never been feel this clean after using this cleansing balm. It keeps my face clean and soft.

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Revitalizing
review: Use this every day. Great product.

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Revitalizing
review: I absolutely love this cleansing balm! It's the first step in my double cleanse and it smells good too!

productName: On Clean It Zero Cleansing Balm Revitalizing
review: Love it!

productName: On Clean It Zero Foam Cleanser
review: loved it. made my skin feel super soft and smelled very good. maybe not for people with dry skin, but i liked this product. overall good.

review: really calming my face, awesome!!

productName: On Clean Lotus Water Calming Sheet Mask
review: Je le recommande, il est facile √† utiliser, il est adapt√© aux peaux sensibles, la peaux est douce et hydrat√©e !

productName: On Cleanse Me Softly Milk Cleanser
review: This has been such a great milk cleanser for me during the start of the cold/winter season. My skin usually gets incredibly dry once there is any signs of the cold coming in and this has been such a great morning cleanser, soft, gentle, non irritating for my sensitive skin! As i've gotten older I've become sensitive to a lot of artifical/scents, but I found this line refreshing as the natural light scents are herbal/tea like and actually pleasant. I have the whole Sioris line, I use it for morning and night and it's been so gentle and super hydrating! I've been using it for over two weeks (even on the first day I felt the hydration instantly) and it really soothes a lot of the dry skin pains I would usually have in the morning after washing up. I can tell the difference on the days I'm lazy and don't use the Sioris line! I also break out easily when using new lines of skin care and seemed to especially with Korean cosmetics/skin care (IDK why and I get super sad about it bc I know Korean skincare lines are more advanced than US lines.) I'm just so happy Ive finally found something that works for me!!

productName: On Cleanse Me Softly Milk Cleanser
reviewTitles: Can't wait for the second purchase!
review: Absolutely one of the best cleansers I've ever used! If not because I understand how skin routine works, I wouldn't be using moisturizers; it leaves my skin feeling so silky soft, bouncy, and still feels hydrated. I absolutely love it, so much so, I literally cannot imagine my routine without it anymore. I use it as its own in my am routine and match it up with a jelly-like cleanser for the pm routine. My skin has never been this soft and so healthy. Even my mom, who has super sensitive and dry skin nowadays, loves it. It works miracles!
