The pump gets stuck after one pump but you need more than one pump of product to really cleanse your face. My bottle has stayed mostly full because of this, I wish I would've returned it during the return window. I think there are probably more functional and beneficial milk cleansers out there.
Good for dry peeling skin, and has made skin soft.
I feel it is making a difference on my small areas of hyperpigmentation.
My skin absolutely loves this serum. I've seen improvement in my complexion. My skin feels smooth too. I've purchased it again. I need to figure out other products that work well with it.
i do like this product and just have to remember to use it at night. it makes my skin feel wonderful.

reviewTitles: i‚Äôm still on the fence w this one

I have issues with KP (aka: strawberry legs). After using this I have little to no ingrown hairs and my skin is much smoother. I find to also be very hydrating and it is easier to use than the ordinary's lactic acid.

I got this b/c I was looking for an aha product to help with my cell turnover. It stung my face first use but only b/c I was using too many actives from other products in combo with this one. Because my skin tends to be on the dryer side I did use it with a heavy moisturizer. By doing this for my skin, I noticed an immediate difference. I only used it twice a week and I intend to order it once I'm done with my serums.

This stung my face a bit but it works great for my boyfriend.
This is perfect even on its own, leaves your skin feeling soft and not drying at all. It is not oily either as it washers off really well. It is my favorite of all the oil cleansers.

productName: On Coconut Water Hibiscus + Rosehip Toner
review: Nice soothing toner

productName: On Coconut Water Hibiscus + Rosehip Toner

review: I like to try new things, but sometimes you just hit on things you can't do without. This is one of those for me. It's the perfect way to start my care routine both morning and night.

reviewTitles: Not the Best, Not the Worst
review: A decent moisturizer. It's pretty hydrating, but not quite hydrating enough. It's soothing, but not quite soothing enough. It just didn't wow me enough to purchase again.
I really enjoy this night moisturizer! It‚Äôs very thick and can leave a slight residue but I enjoy how it makes my skin look and feel :)
I use it at night, you don‚Äôt need a lot, and my face always feels and looks refreshed in the morning.

This moisturizer was kind of intense for me. I used it every night but it ended up causing my skin texture to be awful and blotchy, so I started using it sparingly and my skin improved. But I think it's due to my skin type being oily and sensitive that caused that reaction. I hope this review helps others with my skin type.

I want to take off half a star, but not a full one. The cap could use some improvement. You have to squeeze pretty hard to get any out and the last tube started leaking automatically. Every time I picked it up to use, the entire cap would be full of product. Annoying to travel with. Maybe it was just the previous tube though.
Thoroughly cleanses while remaining gentle. Realign like this cleanser.
This has quickly become my new favorite cleanser. I used it as mask and a cleanser and both ways my skin felt hydrated and plump. Definitely a staple product for me.

My daughter loves this cleanser. She has normal acne prone skin and she says this makes her skin feel soft and smooth. I was pretty scared to try this cleanser just because I've been pretty loyal to Cosrx, but I wanted to mix things up a bit in my routine. So far so good, the scent threw me off a bit, but its not overbearing at all. I love how it feels and does a great job. Will definitely replenish once I'm out.

productName: On D.N.A Hydrating Protein Sheet Mask
reviewTitles: Very hydrating mask. Love MediHeal masks
review: I first tried the Mediheal variety box set of masks. This one I enjoy most for winter dryness. I am alternating these with their tea tree masks (help with redness and acne) so my face is calm and hydrated. Keeps my skills looking flawless. My forehead lines stay away with hydration

productName: On D.N.A Hydrating Protein Sheet Mask
review: These masks definitely do their job well, they leave my skin super hydrated! the fragrance is a little overwhelming for me personally, but it does smell like fresh-out-of-the-shower clean so I‚Äôm sure there are others who would love it.

productName: On D.N.A Hydrating Protein Sheet Mask
review: Absolutely adore these masks! I can't give info on long-term results because I just started using them, but I can tell you I understand why they always get such good reviews. When I first opened the mask, I thought they'd leave a sticky after feeling, but not at all. The thick serum absorbs very quickly, and the sheet itself is so soft! I actually even saved a little of the serum to use up later. My skin was so plump and soft! Will definitely continue to use these masks and will purchase more in the future. The price is very reasonable for what you're getting.

productName: On D.N.A Hydrating Protein Sheet Mask
review: My skin is super sensitive and these were perfect, did not irritate my skin at all.

productName: On D.N.A Hydrating Protein Sheet Mask

The mask material is very soft and it stays on really well. Lots of serum in the pack, so there's plenty left over to use later. I highly recommend! These are a great skin pick me up!

productName: On D.N.A Hydrating Protein Sheet Mask
review: I bought this sheet mask because I felt my skin was so dehydrated, so why not get the sheet mask that says hydrating. This mask, did not dissapoint!! productName: On D.N.A Hydrating Protein Sheet Mask
review: My skin is sensitive and prone to breakouts. These masks were wonderfully soothing and made my skin look and feel plump and hydrated. No irritation at all.

productName: On D.N.A Hydrating Protein Sheet Mask
review: My skin is sensitive, combo/dry, reactive with hormonal acne. My Moms is late 50s, dry, concerns of wrinkles, redness and hyperpigmentation.

productName: On D.N.A Hydrating Protein Sheet Mask
review: These work extremely well for both of us. They are extremely moisturizing, a good size and no funky smell.

I love this cream Soo much!! It looks thick, but it feels very light and melts into my skin. It's great under makeup, not too heavy and super hydrating. I've noticed my skin looking more plump and glowy. 10/10 would buy again and again!

I thought that this cream would feel heavy. But it‚Äôs the lightest moisturiser I‚Äôve ever worn. It‚Äôs feel wonderful almost like water. And it does a great job at hydration and doesn‚Äôt give my skin any sort of tingling after I put serums or treatments.

I have super dry skin and use moisturizer excessively. After moving back to the US from Korea, I couldn't get my hands on my favorite Korean moisturizer anymore so was looking for something new around the same price point. I decided to take a chance on Banila Co and I am SO thrilled that I did! A teeny, tiny bit of this moisturizer (I'm talking like, a centimeter on the tip of your finger) goes such a long way, which means good longevity for a small package. The cream is definitely on the heavier side and doesn't absorb as quickly or easily as a lightweight moisturizer, but by morning my skin feels so soft. I haven't used it under makeup and will avoid it during the day because it does tend to feel a bit heavy (and no SPF), but I absolutely reccommend it for night-time intense moisture and hydration!

Holy moly. This product leaves skin silky smooth! My makeup -- tinted face oil -- slides on like butter after prepping with this. It's hydrating, smoothing, and makes skin look so healthy and fresh! Great value, too.

A little definitely goes a long way. It might have been due to the excessive amount that I used the first time, but the scent gets a little strong in the first couple minutes applying and my skin felt slightly irritated as well. Otherwise it's a pretty good moisturizer. My skin definitely feels softer and stays more hydrated compared to past moisturizers that I have used. The winter has definitely made my skin have its ups and downs, so this has helped keep my skin hydrated and soft.

review: In searching for hydration and glow I decided to purchase this. It really helps my skin to look plump and hydrated all day. As A woman rapidly approaching middle aged I am greatful for any simple product that can overwhealm the tide of time, even if it is short term. I will be perchasing again.

productName: On Dear, Klairs Fundamental Watery Oil Drop
review: This oil is super lightweight and it brings the color back into my complexion after I cleanse. Not greasy or sticky and leaves a slight shine which I personally like.

productName: On Dear, Klairs Fundamental Watery Oil Drop

reviewTitles: Really like, but not in love...
review: I really wanted to LOVE this product, but I don't. However, I do really LIKE it. I tried it for the green tea benefits and the hydraulic acid ingredients, but I did not notice a significant difference in my skin. The serum goes on smooth, and is nice and light. It smells nice, and feels nice. However, it did not improve my skin condition, and it stayed the same.
I had been looking for a product to help reduce acne and scars and I‚Äôm happy to say I‚Äôve found it! In just a week my skin had cleared up a ton and it is great at fighting new breakouts.

Green tea was recommended to me as an anti-acne ingredient and I began to search for skincare with it. This serum did not disappoint. Although it absorbs quickly it does not leave a residue. I apply it in the morning and it helps control my oil. The only thing is I didn‚Äôt like was the packaging since the push mechanism inside makes it harder to recycle.

productName: On Deep In A Barrier Cream
review: To the best of my knowledge this is one of only two moisturizers that utilize tamanu oil--the other being Krave (in the same price range when taking size into account). It appears all of the negative reviews are from those who did not do their research on this ingredient so be warned tamanu oil is a fairly heavy oil and has a distinct nutty scent (somewhat reminds me of maple syrup and since Sioris doesn't use artificial fragrances you will be smelling this oil) the main point of contention with all of the reviews under 4 stars aside from one which listed a nut allergy. It is an amazing ingredient that does wonders with skin discoloration, fine lines, dry skin, and a generally calming ingredient for the skin. What I like about this formulation in comparison to the Krave barrier cream is that it is lighter and so can be used in some cases during the day and the scent dissipates quicker as well (for me the scent dissipates usually within 10 minutes though I don't really mind it). And this saves me from having to purchase the oil separately and trying to mix with a separate moisturizer. The sole reason to purchase this product is for the formulation with tamanu oil. If that's not an ingredient you are looking for then there are probably better products for you. If the scent of tamanu oil doesn't bother you are you're looking for all the benefits this ingredient offers then I highly recommend this formulation with the other great ingredients offered and a much lighter experience than straight tamanu oil. If the scent is something you are worried about, tamanu oil is sold as an oil in many health supplement stores for around $10 so I'd highly recommend testing it out there before trying this out.

productName: On Deep In A Barrier Cream
review: Fantastic night cream and I like the small but more important that my skin loves it.

productName: On Deep In A Barrier Cream
review: I am so happy that I bought this cream))))

productName: On Deep In A Barrier Cream
review: I cannot put this on my face without gagging. It smells so bad. I‚Äôve never had a problem with smells before, but this just makes me want to puke. I don‚Äôt know how well it works because I cannot get past the horrible stench.

productName: On Deep In A Barrier Cream
review: It smells like old fashioned candy. Smell is worth the benefits!! Soft, smooth skin!

productName: On Deep In A Barrier Cream
review: The cute pastel green tint of this moisturizer doesn't come through that well on the product photos, but it makes the bottle look so classy sitting on my counter. It rubs right in and doesn't leave any sort of cast. I like the gentle scent, and it didn't irritate my sensitive acne prone skin at all!

productName: On Deep In A Barrier Cream
review: This moisturizer is plush, rich and applies like a night cream dream. The packaging in a tube is fantastic as most thick moisturizers like this one tend to come in jars, having the me that comes in a convenient and clean tube packaging is fantastic. It‚Äôs fragrance and alcohol free which makes it suitable for sensitive skin, however, if you‚Äôre someone who hates strong, earthy, medicinal or herbal type smells I‚Äôd say move past this one: I don‚Äôt like fragrances and enjoy this types of natural scents, and even I find the smell of this product to be a bit funky. Still I don‚Äôt care about it cause I find this to be a very nicely formulated product.

productName: On Deep In A Barrier Cream
reviewTitles: Better for people with normal skin
review: I bought this cream as I've had a good experience with the Sioris cleanser. However, like other reviewers have said, the herbal smell is very strong. I'm not usually one to mind an herbal scent, but this was definitely more than I was anticipating. Furthermore, I have eczema and hyper sensitive skin, especially in winter. I didn't have a reaction to it, but found that this cream wasn't hydrating enough for winter. I found myself applying my Pyunkang Yul Essence Toner and Cosrx Snail Mucin Essence sometimes twice to make up for hydration. It's not the worst cream I've tried, but not my favorite. I still think it would be suitable for normal skin types, but it doesn't provide enough moisture for my chronic eczema skin in the winter.

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Cream
review: I really enjoyed this moisturizer! it smells like fresh clean linen. Although, the parfumed scent may be strong to some on application, it dissipates soon after. Light slime-like consistency but not at all tacky to the touch. As a result, my face feels decently moisturized but not greasy after every use. On the contrary, it feels quite refreshing post-application. A little goes a long way and the packaging too is pretty. I guess my only criticism would be how it's applied coz it doesn't come with a wand/spoon? so it's bare fingers dipped in the tub of product which can make it prone to contamination? if people mind that sort of thing.

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Cream
review: I have a very sensitive reactive skin type, with dermatitis and this cream has helped my skin dramatically! It soothing and hydrating enough for a day and night time moisturizer. Haven‚Äôt had any perioral dermatitis flares since using it.

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Cream
review: Amazing for my sensitive skin and gives a great amount of hydration. I love using this in the AM, especially before make-up. I will definitely be repurchasing :)

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Cream
reviewTitles: Great Addition to my Skincare Routine
review: I have sensitive skin that will react quickly to products that aggravate it. Luckily, this product does not cause my skin to react negatively. Cica Repair Snail Cream is a light moisturizing cream. I think having cica in the product keeps my skin calm. The redness I normally have in my cheeks (rosacea) is no longer there. The product has also calmed and prevented the occasional breakouts I tend to suffer from. I am loving the positive results from this cream.

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Cream
review: Extra hydrating, mildly moisturizing. Perfect for all weather other than nyc winters...

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Cream
reviewTitles: Didn't hate it, didn't love it
review: I really wanted to love this moisturizer because it has some amazing ingredients, but something in it seems to be clogging my pores. I've tried switching out other products, but every time I use this multiple times in a row, I notice clogged pores. However, it's definitely gentle and hydrating and might work really well for others! There is a slight candy-like scent to it, but I found it to fade quickly so it didn't bother me. It's also has a gel-cream texture, which worked surprisingly well for my dry skin as the weather got colder. I don't regret giving this a shot, but I won't be repurchasing.

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Cream
review: Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I‚Äôm sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Cream
review: all-rounded moisturizer that I would recommend to someone who has oily to normal skin type. Comapred to other snail moisturizers that have a more sticky feeling than yea ... this is an alternative.

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Essence
review: Great product. Leaves my face feeling soft and hydrated. Absorbs well. Would buy again.

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Essence
review: I brought this product because to get some extra skincare benefits. I‚Äôm dealing with a lot of irritation and redness at the moment. And since I‚Äôve been using this, I‚Äôve seen a difference. I really like this product, there is no scent and it absorbs quickly!

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Essence
review: I use this product after the cleanser , I like the texture and accept well of the products that I put after it.

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Essence
review: I have pretty sensitive skin and this helps keep it mellow all day long. It does have a slimy texture but it soaks in rather quick and doesn‚Äôt leave a sticky residue. Recommend for anyone who needs something to keep their skin calm all day

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Essence
review: Instantly calms my skin. absorbs quickly.

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Essence
review: I love how my skin feels with this essence. Neogen is great and I like the products they make that I have used so far. The essence goes great with the Neogen fermented micro serum.

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Essence
reviewTitles: Amazing all-in-one that‚Äôs even helping with radiation burns
review: I‚Äôm using this on my face and, after extensively reading up on the ingredients and how they act on the skin, I decided to apply at night while undergoing radiation for breast cancer treatment. To date (21 treatments in) my team is amazed at how well my skin is holding up. I‚Äôm also noticing the fine lines around my eyes plumping up and I credit this wonder fluid!

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Essence
review: I love snail products and this is a really good one for those who don't like the sticky feeling that comes with a good snail product. It absorbs quickly and leaves that dewy hydration I love. This has also helped with my irritated winter skin without the heaviness of my typical winter products. Also, I just love a pump bottle.

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Essence
review: Neogen products always work well for me and I noticed the texture of my skin different when I took snail mucin out of my routine. This has been great in helping return the hydration and firmness I would get from other snail products. I have sensitive skin and it hasn't given me any bad reactions.

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Essence
review: I used to have bad cystic acne and went on Accutane to correct my painful, deep cystic acne. This left me skin dry which is a new territory for me considering I used to have oily skin. I have sensitive skin still and this is the perfect product to apply after my toner and before my moisturizer in both the am and pm to ensure my skin is glowing and radiant. It does have a slight perfume smell to it, but it smells quite good and does not irritate my sensitive skin at all. This is an absolute must for anyone needing to add my moisture to their skin, or those with maturing skin. I am 24 and this product keeps my skin looking 16 and supple. I have already recommended many people to try this product because I love all the benefits I see it giving my skin.

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Essence
review: This is one of favorite essences! So hydrating. Sinks well into the skin. Isn‚Äôt sticky. I love using this essence into my skincare routine. Makes a difference with serums and hydration!

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Essence
reviewTitles: My dry skin loves it. So glad I tried it!
review: I wanted to know what all the hype was about with snail mucin, and this is the first product I've tried that has it. I chose to buy this particular essence because of the packaging (it comes in a beautiful, indigo(?) frosted glass container with a pump). But aesthetics aside, the product feels wonderful on my dry skin in humid Texas weather outdoors, and non-stop AC indoors.

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Essence
review: I think the CICA has kept my skin calm (no redness or harsh reactions after 2 weeks of use so far). The consistency is what I expected of snail mucin - a gel-like texture. My face looks and feels hydrated, all without feeling tacky or slimy.

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Essence
review: I love how my skin feels with this essence. Neogen is great and I like the products they make that I have used so far. The essence goes great with the Neogen fermented micro serum.

productName: On Dermalogy Cica Repair Snail Essence
reviewTitles: Amazing all-in-one that‚Äôs even helping with radiation burns
review: I‚Äôm using this on my face and, after extensively reading up on the ingredients and how they act on the skin, I decided to apply at night while undergoing radiation for breast cancer treatment. To date (21 treatments in) my team is amazed at how well my skin is holding up. I‚Äôm also noticing the fine lines around my eyes plumping up and I credit this wonder fluid!

i‚Äôve bought these 3 times now and have been using them every morning before toner. great for sensitive and acne prone skin !

I love these for refreshing my face in the morning or a little extra exfoliation when I need it. I find them very effective and non-irritating. They feel soothing for my skin. I couldn‚Äôt use them on their own as a toner but they‚Äôre good as a first step if you don‚Äôt want to wash again.
full of essence but just feels like I'm wiping my face... not for my taste
It‚Äôs nice moisturizing lip gloss and I like that it doesn‚Äôt have any fragrance but I still don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs worth the price. I bought it only to see what‚Äôs the hype. Nice packing.

I love the cooling sensation this wash gives. It doesn‚Äôt feel at all like an exfoliator which I was hoping for a little more of BUT I still really like it. I feel like it gives a deep clean without the squeaky dry feeling afterwards.
Creamy gel cleanser, yet doesn't have the cool sensation as mentioned in the description. Feels like a normal cleanser with no wow factor.

reviewTitles: Gentle cleanser but not suitable for me
review: Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I‚Äôm sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

productName: On Double Date Lip and Cheek Duo - Honeymoon/Swipe
review: I was a bit skeptical at first as I am usually not a fan of liquid like blush but OMG this one is so so so good. I love how smooth it lifts and the pigmentation is awesome!!! The blending of it is also great!! I love it so much :)

productName: On Double Date Lip and Cheek Duo - Honeymoon/Swipe
review: Beautiful color, great compact design, but less creamy than I'd like for applying with fingers and the color layer is too dry for my lips. The glossy layer works great for lips and as a highlight. Would repurchase for sure. But slight bummer to need an applicator to apply (as I hoped I could pop it in my pocket for going out without a purse)

productName: On Double Date Lip and Cheek Duo - Honeymoon/Swipe
review: Perfect for on the go. Put a little on and if I need more later it fits in my pocket I enjoy that the best!

productName: On Double Date Lip and Cheek Duo - Honeymoon/Swipe
review: This balm has a very nice texture that glides on the cheeks well. A little tends to a go a long way and does last all day. I am not sure about the color and feel like it's a bit too orange for my tone so I don't like it on my lips. Would consider trying in a pinker/redder tone, but overall a nice product.

productName: On Dr. Althea Herb Therapy Velvet Mask (10 pack)
review: I bought a pack of these for a friend's bachelorette weekend. Everyone loved how moisturized and soft their faces felt afterwards. The formula was great for a variety of skin types, and no one had a bad reaction. I did not find there to be a scent to these and normally I am sensitive to fragrances. I would definitely recommend these.

productName: On Dr. Althea Herb Therapy Velvet Mask (10 pack)
review: I bought these on a whim while basing off the description and reviews, hoping they would be worth it. These are so nourishing and calming for my skin. I have oily acne prone sensitive skin and these didn't have any negative effects towards me. I'm on my second order. If you haven't tried them yet, you need to!

productName: On Dr. Althea Herb Therapy Velvet Mask (10 pack)
review: I love the feel of these velvet masks, they're great to pamper myself!

productName: On Dr. Althea Herb Therapy Velvet Mask (10 pack)
review: I‚Äôve been having trouble with my face getting dry and then feeling irritated around my period. This mask feels sooo good on my face. It was cooling and soothing

productName: On Dr. Althea Herb Therapy Velvet Mask (10 pack)
review: This is my first time with this sheet mask. I‚Äôve used quite a few and I love it!!! I like the way it fits my face and my skin looks so much bright after use. I have hyperpigmentation issues along with scarring from having pcos! Sheet masks tend to help my skin feel brighter. And less damaged and this mask is perfection. Will be buying over. And over again. It‚Äôs a staple for sure

productName: On Dr. Althea Herb Therapy Velvet Mask (10 pack)
review: Loved using these after days of wearing makeup felt so nice and made my skin so glowly !

productName: On Dr. Althea Herb Therapy Velvet Mask (10 pack)
review: I love these masks. Not only are they soothing to my deep, hormonal acne but in between my cycle when my skin feels dry and parched, they‚Äôre also super moisturizing. One of my new favorite masks!

productName: On Dr. Althea Herb Therapy Velvet Mask (10 pack)
reviewTitles: One of the best face masks!
review: One of my go-to face masks! They are very hydrating and moisturising; my skin feels so plump and fresh after using it! I keep buying them over and over.

productName: On Dr. Althea Herb Therapy Velvet Mask (10 pack)
review: A fitting name for it, these masks feel velvety smooth and therapeutic to my skin, it literally just feels good, and leaves my skin feeling soft, supple, and refreshed.

productName: On Dr. Althea Herb Therapy Velvet Mask (10 pack)
reviewTitles: Possibly the best sheet mask material
review: I initially bought these because I was curious about the "velvet" name. Wow, it delivers. The actual sheet of this is very soft and velvety, and the serum is deliciously creamy. Wonderful for winter skin, and to gift.

productName: On Dr. Althea Herb Therapy Velvet Mask (10 pack)
review: These are so rich and creamy, masks are extra silky and smooth. Worth it, I use them when my skin gets irritated or red/dry after washing and my face is always calmer after

productName: On Dr. Althea Herb Therapy Velvet Mask (10 pack)
review: Love these masks. My face feel so hydrated ü•∞

productName: On Dr. Althea Herb Therapy Velvet Mask (10 pack)
review: I was so excited to receive this item in the mail yesterday. This was the first mask I used today and I was very disappointed. I guess one of the ingredients in this mask didn't click well with me, I only had this mask on for 10 minutes and felt the urge to scratch at my skin and saw that I broke out in rashes. Wanted to love this, but just wasn't for me. My friend, however, loved this and had no reaction like mine.

productName: On Dr.Althea Essential Skin Conditioner Silk Mask (5 pack)
review: These are okay. They leave skin feeling soft and silky smooth but they're very drippy. You spend the whole time wiping upwards because it leaks down the face while on.

productName: On Dr.Althea Essential Skin Conditioner Silk Mask (5 pack)
review: I love all of Dr Athlea‚Äôs products! It‚Äôs perfect ‚Äî the gold packaging, the hydration, the gel texture . . . instantly one of my favorites after first time use.

productName: On Dr.Althea Essential Skin Conditioner Silk Mask (5 pack)
review: I love these masks so much- winter heat and traveling make my skin and lips so dry even when I am hydrating, but these masks always do the job in saving my face

productName: On Dr.Althea Essential Skin Conditioner Silk Mask (5 pack)
review: My friend got these for me as a gift a while ago, and once I used them all up I had to buy them again. They are definitely on the expensive side so I don't use them very often. However, when I feel like my skin needs some deep hydration I will definitely reach for one of these. The quality is so nice and it really feels like such a treat.

productName: On Dr.Althea Essential Skin Conditioner Silk Mask (5 pack)
review: Tried one sachet so far but I love it. It has a lot of essence in the pack which was great so I used it all over. My skin felt hydrated even the next day.

productName: On Dr.Althea Essential Skin Conditioner Silk Mask (5 pack)
review: I have to say, these masks are both beautiful (look at that packaging!) and so so so luxuriously hydrating. I really enjoyed using these sheet masks because it almost felt like an overnight mask after I would take it off, wait for it to absorb, and then put on my night cream. The added hydration was much appreciated by my winter skin, and in then morning when I went to wash my face it was incredibly soft :) will definitely repurchase!

productName: On Dr.Althea Essential Skin Conditioner Silk Mask (5 pack)
review: This face mask was clearly higher quality than my usual ones. It hydrated my skin very well and felt great on my skin. Definitely something special!

productName: On Dr.Althea Essential Skin Conditioner Silk Mask (5 pack)
review: Favorite mask

productName: On Dr.Althea Essential Skin Conditioner Silk Mask (5 pack)
review: I love using these masks on days where I chemically exfoliate because it helps my skin calm down and not get irritated.

productName: On Dr.Althea Essential Skin Conditioner Silk Mask (5 pack)
reviewTitles: Perfect fit, plenty of serum, instant calm
review: I have acne prone skin, and this mask nips it in the bud when I start to break out. I love it!

productName: On Dr.Althea Essential Skin Conditioner Silk Mask (5 pack)
review: I really really love this mask. It feels like silk when you put it on and feels very soothing. After 20 minutes of using the mask, it leaves your skin feeling very moisturized and hydrated. I would definitely recommend this mask over many.

productName: On Dr.Althea Essential Skin Conditioner Silk Mask (5 pack)
review: One of my all time favorite Mask brands. Very refreshing, smoothing, my skin always feel SOO much better after one of these.

productName: On Dr.Althea Essential Skin Conditioner Silk Mask (5 pack)
review: Nothing wrong with it. I just have other masks I prefer. Doesn't affect my skin one way or other.

productName: On Dr.Althea Essential Skin Conditioner Silk Mask (5 pack)
review: This super moisturizing mask left my skin drenched in moisture after each use. It can get a bit messy, and requires a little bit of time for your skin to soak it up.

productName: On Dr.Althea Essential Skin Conditioner Silk Mask (5 pack)
reviewTitles: Would definitely purchase this mask again.
review: I have been using this mask sheet consistently for the last 5 days and it definitely made my skin smooth!! I was kind of worried about my skin since it was getting itchy and dry due to the weather. However, this helped me in soothing and softening my face!!!!

This toner is the best thing that's ever happened to my skin. When I started my Korean skincare journey, I quickly realized that my skin loves and needs toner (it's slightly oily, very dehyrdated, sensitive). I've tried some good ones over the years. I switched to Olivarrier after an influencer was raving about it. It had a nice, thick, slippery texture and felt very hydrating. Didn't think much more about it. About 3 weeks after I began using it daily, I noticed that my closed comedones were clearing up. At 6 weeks, they're basically gone. I was stunned. I've been fighting them my whole life. I've tried so many chemical and manual exfoliators, and they're either too harsh or don't work. I had all but given up. Bonus: the cystic acne that I get monthly on my jaw has also cleared up! Since it happened so gradually, I wasn't sure which product was responsible. During that time, the only thing I consistently used was the toner. I almost didn't believe it. After I had a reaction to an IPL treatment, I had to stop using all products on my face for a couple weeks. Sure enough, the comedones came back. Started back on the toner, and a month later my skin was clear again. I was going to write a rave review, but Olivarrier changed the formula. I was disappointed but bought the new one. It is slightly less thick then the original, but it still has the same effect on my skin. I just adore this toner! I hope they never discontinue it.
i'm not sure i've noticed an improvement but it feels nice on freshly washed skin

This has really changed the game,. A lot of products I can go with or without, find dupes, or are "good enough". At this point, I can't see myself not reaching for this. I have acneic, combination skin with texture and scarring. My skin is brighter, evenly hydrated, and less inflamed. This is a staple.

This feels really nice and hasn‚Äôt given me a rash at all. It makes my skin feel hydrated and I haven‚Äôt had any dry spots. I have oily combo skin, and it hasn‚Äôt made me any oilier. I‚Äôve been getting a good amount of cystic acne on my chin, but I‚Äôm almost positive it isn‚Äôt this product because I‚Äôve been using AHA‚Äôs and BHA‚Äôs as well, but be wary just in case.
I‚Äôve been using this for almost 2 weeks and it is great. It mixes well with other products best of all I am very sensitive and have not broken out! My skin looks so dewy and plump

reviewTitles: Not bad, wish it was more hydrating
review: Like the light consistency (slightly thicker than water) and faint scent (very fresh). I can't tell if it made any difference to my skin, although I've been using it for about 1.5 weeks so maybe it needs more time. I wish it was more hydrating. I will most likely repurchase because I like hybrid products
and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

I pump this on my palm and then press it gently on my face. It is about the consistency of water but feels much more hydrating on my skin, especially when sealed in with moisturizer. I like it enough that I've already bought a second bottle.

Moist Toning Lotion is a true savior for my sensitive, reactive and often inflamed skin. It calmed and moisturized my skin without leaving any residue. Its pleasure to use before moisturizer and I am very happy with results.

With as many toners out there, this is one of the best!
I love this toner! This is my second bottle and I love how hydrating it is. It really helps calm my hormonal acne and keeps my skin moisturized all winter long.
I‚Äôve been toning my face after every wash and this product is by far the best I‚Äôve tried.

Moist Toning Lotion is a true savior for my sensitive, reactive and often inflamed skin. It calmed and moisturized my skin without leaving any residue. Its pleasure to use before moisturizer and I am very happy with results.

This toner is the best thing that's ever happened to my skin. When I started my Korean skincare journey, I quickly realized that my skin loves and needs toner (it's slightly oily, very dehyrdated, sensitive). I've tried some good ones over the years. I switched to Olivarrier after an influencer was raving about it. It had a nice, thick, slippery texture and felt very hydrating. Didn't think much more about it. About 3 weeks after I began using it daily, I noticed that my closed comedones were clearing up. At 6 weeks, they're basically gone. I was stunned. I've been fighting them my whole life. I've tried so many chemical and manual exfoliators, and they're either too harsh or don't work. I had all but given up. Bonus: the cystic acne that I get monthly on my jaw has also cleared up! Since it happened so gradually, I wasn't sure which product was responsible. During that time, the only thing I consistently used was the toner. I almost didn't believe it. After I had a reaction to an IPL treatment, I had to stop using all products on my face for a couple weeks. Sure enough, the comedones came back. Started back on the toner, and a month later my skin was clear again. I was going to write a rave review, but Olivarrier changed the formula. I was disappointed but bought the new one. It is slightly less thick then the original, but it still has the same effect on my skin. I just adore this toner! I hope they never discontinue it.
i'm not sure i've noticed an improvement but it feels nice on freshly washed skin

This has really changed the game,. A lot of products I can go with or without, find dupes, or are "good enough". At this point, I can't see myself not reaching for this. I have acneic, combination skin with texture and scarring. My skin is brighter, evenly hydrated, and less inflamed. This is a staple.

This feels really nice and hasn‚Äôt given me a rash at all. It makes my skin feel hydrated and I haven‚Äôt had any dry spots. I have oily combo skin, and it hasn‚Äôt made me any oilier. I‚Äôve been getting a good amount of cystic acne on my chin, but I‚Äôm almost positive it isn‚Äôt this product because I‚Äôve been using AHA‚Äôs and BHA‚Äôs as well, but be wary just in case.
I‚Äôve been using this for almost 2 weeks and it is great. It mixes well with other products best of all I am very sensitive and have not broken out! My skin looks so dewy and plump

I was looking for a hydrating moisturizer / cream to use during winter for my dry skin. While this cream is gentle enough, it leaves a sticky / tacky residue that takes a while to go away. With all the options out there, I would not be repurchasing.

This product works great. I typically have dry skin and hormonal breakouts and I‚Äôm somewhat sensitive. This does not cause me to breakout, it‚Äôs super light on the skin and leaves my skin shiny and moisturized!
I really like this moisturizer. The only thing I don‚Äôt like is how it doesn‚Äôt seem to absorb as well as other creams. My skin stays sticky for a while. Other than that, I really enjoy this cream.

This moisturizer has a lightweight gel feel but hydrates wonderfully. I use it with my day and nighttime skincare routine and it has paired well with all my other products. It also has no scent and it wears great under makeup.

productName: On Egg Cream Mask Hydration Set (5 pack)
review: This was not the product for me. The shape of the face mask is odd so there's not a way to put it on without getting serum in your eyes. The fumes alone burn my eyes pretty bad. The serum is nice and rich but given the shape of the sheet mask, I wish it was in a bottle to apply instead.

productName: On Egg Cream Mask Hydration Set (5 pack)
review: Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I‚Äôm sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

productName: On Egg Cream Mask Hydration Set (5 pack)
reviewTitles: The Egg Cream Mask is Amazing!
review: I like to use this mask at night. I use this as my last step after completing my night regimen. I like that my skins stays firm and moisturized until the following morning.

I bought this without having ever dabbled in this brand. And when I tell you it was a really great purchase I mean that. Everything about it from the ingredients to the texture and even the smell. It takes me a bit to absorb but I‚Äôm pretty sure it‚Äôs because I sometimes use a little too much. I definitely recommend this!
Makes my skin feel soft and hydrated

reviewTitles: This is my fav moisturizer and I‚Äôve tried a lot
review: I love that it‚Äôs multiple products in one because sometimes I‚Äôm super tired and don‚Äôt feel like doing my full skincare routine at night so I just cleanse, tone, and apply this moisturizer and my skin still looks and feels great.

I used this cream over the winter and was slow to appreciate it. It has a VERY heavy scent. Once I got used to it, though, I appreciated how this rich cream worked its magic overnight. I always had plump, moisturized skin in the mornings. I sometimes used it as a morning cream, too, but found the scent a bit much during the day. On the plus side, it never made me break out and offered great hydration. Would use again on winter nights.

I‚Äôve bought a few bottles of this stuff and it‚Äôs so great for my dry, acne prone skin. I only use it at night, so i‚Äôm not sure how it would be under makeup, but I do know that when I use it my skin feels like I just exited the womb. P L U M P.

I bought this without having ever dabbled in this brand. And when I tell you it was a really great purchase I mean that. Everything about it from the ingredients to the texture and even the smell. It takes me a bit to absorb but I‚Äôm pretty sure it‚Äôs because I sometimes use a little too much. I definitely recommend this!
Makes my skin feel soft and hydrated

On the plus side, it never made me break out and offered great hydration. Would use again on winter nights.

I received a sample a while ago, and decided to purchase the full size. It was a great, non-greasy moisturizer for a while, but after a few weeks of use, I noticed it was clogging my pores. I had to stop using it, but perhaps someone with slightly dryer skin will get better use out of it!

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I‚Äôm sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.
I was intrigued by the egg ingredient and decided to give this a go. It‚Äôs great! You can really feel the refreshing moisture setting in. I use this daily at night.
This mask left my hair so, so soft and shiny. I was shocked by how silky my hair was after rinsing it out. Love.

I have fine hair and I use this product once a week or so to keep it strong. The protein is great for helping me prevent split ends and helps my hair feel thicker. Just make sure to use some extra moisture with it as protein can sometimes make hair brittle with overuse!
My FAVORITE hair product. It makes my hair so super smooth, and I buy this as a gift for EVERYONE!!
Definitely a winning hair mask! My hair gets really dry from working outside all day so finding this mask was a life saver. After just one use my hair is smoother, softer, and less frizzy for days!
This is a great addition to use along with Pureology. I find this works better than the Pureology mask. Your hair should look good for the next week or so after using this.

I have long, thick, wavy, and red died hair. It is damaged and many shampoos and conditioners do not work. I had recently received a purchase for hair products from Soko Glam and it worked great, so I said to give this a shot. I left it in for about 10 minutes and when I rinsed my hair was so soft and easy to brush. The end result smooth tangle free locks! A must try!

A little bit thick for my liking, I thought it will be more like a cream, I didn't see any change after I used, my hair is thick, no like 4C or something like that, but thick and treatment with a paste consistency didn't work for me
My hair is extremely coarse and dry it really made my hair soft just after one treatment it is very rich
Iam glad I purchased it this hair cream
My hair looked so much healthier after just a few times using this
Love this product

reviewTitles: Great for everyone in the family!
review: I was looking for a cleanser that would work for both my husband (normal skin type) and myself (oily/combination/acne prone) - this worked perfectly! Neither of us had any irritation or breakouts :) And it leaves your skin squeaky clean without the tightness. A tiny bit creates a lot of foam - I love it! It will be staple in our household!
I love this cleanser. My face feels completely clean without being stripped. I also love the gentle exfoliation it provides.
I just started using this and it has become my favorite face wash.

Truly my favourite cleanser - it leaves my skin feeling clean without overdrying, and I like that it has very gentle 'beads' in it to exfoliate! The smell is pleasant, and it seems like it helps to tighten my skin + pores! Plus you only need a tiny amount, so one bottle last forever.

This is such a lovely cream moisturizer. There is a light/lovely scent that goes away after a while, which I don‚Äôt mind because I think it‚Äôs divine. The cream is on the thicker size, so I use a pea size amount in the AM (face and neck) and double that amount at night. The consistency is whipped like and has a luxurious feel to it. My skin can seriously get so dry in the fall/winter months to the point where its flaky, tight and painful. This cream has been a life saver, I feel so hydrated all day when using this!

I have comb/oily skin and this cream is extremely thick. There‚Äôs such a thing as over moisturizing that ends up not working too well on my skin and creates build up faster. Would pass on this if you‚Äôre an oily person.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I‚Äôm sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

I had to IMMEDIATELY wash this off! As soon as I applied it (using a cotton pad as it says on the bottle) my face turned bright red and started burning. While I have sensitive skin I have never had that happen before! This was the only part of my routine I changed when using it. So if you have sensitive skin, I‚Äôd recommend passing on trying this one.

reviewTitles: Did nothing positive and might have caused breakage
review: I took a risk on this product as there were no reviews and no information online. The ingredients looked promising and i had great results with another hair product purchased on soko glam (l‚Äôador wonderbalm). I tried this product 3x and 3 different ways. 1) as a solo leave in product 2) prior to serum 3) with leave in conditioner to amp moisture and air drying. It did nothing- no smoothness, softness, shine, bounce, detangling properties- nada. So unless there is a magic method to using this that evades me, I would pass as it‚Äôs not cheap and there are so many great hair products sold elsewhere.
All I have to say is . . . WOW! Love this stuff.

reviewTitles: That this wasn‚Äôt good at first but changed my mind
review: I got this originally for the brightening benefits,after a while I didn‚Äôt see much glow in my skin so I stopped using it.After I stopped using it my skin wasn‚Äôt as hydrated or supple anymore.I continued using it again and immediately I noticed my skin was hydrated and supple again.I have combination skin so this product is really great because of how light weight it is and it‚Äôs not greasy at all.It‚Äôs a 10/10 would buy again (sorry for all the reading lol)

It‚Äôs a nice product. I honestly wish they would wait a few weeks to ask for these reviews though because it just hadn‚Äôt been enough time in use for me to have a real review. So far‚Ä¶.it hasn‚Äôt broken me out.

This lovely thing is wonderful. Lightly viscous, and cool to the touch. This essence servers as a wonderful skin soother in my routine. This has not broken me out, and has caused no irritation for my skin. I would recommend for someone with acne-prone or sensitive skin!
**I‚Äôm posting for the second time as I could not find my original review**

This lovely thing is wonderful. Lightly viscous, and cool to the touch. This essence servers as a wonderful skin soother in my routine. This has not broken me out, and has caused no irritation for my skin. I would recommend for someone with acne-prone or sensitive skin!

I‚Äôve always had super sensitive and puffy eyes and have even been prescribed steroid creams to try and calm down the inflammation, this is the only cream I‚Äôve bought that hasn‚Äôt stung the skin around my eyes when I use it and leaves them feeling hydrated
This is so nice absorbs quickly. A little goes a long way and my old eyes look much softer and hydrated.
I‚Äôve been using this twice a day for about 3 or 4 days now and Im noticing a difference already. The eye are is smoother , plumper and more moisturized when I wake up.

I purchased this item as a gift for my mother, who has never used any sokoglam items before. Unfortunately she experienced an allergic reaction that caused her eyes to puff up. I recommend reading the ingredients before purchasing, as I did not do.

reviewTitles: It's works, but not for me
review: I purchased this a while ago, but held off on reviewing it until I was sure how I felt about it. I used this twice daily for over a month before I realized it was the culprit behind my eye irritation. I thought the irritation might have been due to the weather changing, drier air, having my heat on all the time, more driving time. Eventually, I took this out of my routine to see how my skin reacted. And the irritation stopped. I've loved Benton in the past, so I tried it again. This was definitely the source. The thing is, though, that I also noticed a negative change in my skin when I stopped. So it did brighten and smooth the skin under my eyes! Unfortunately, it bothered my eyes too much to keep using it. I'd say it's worth a shot if you don't have particularly sensitive eyes.

I've used the eye masks from this brand without issue, but this eye cream caused itchiness and since it costs money to ship it back, I'm using it as a (very) expensive hand cream. BEWARE if you have sensitive skin. I'm also a normal/oily combo for reference.

I was worried how my skin might react to this but it is very hydrating and didn't irritate my sensitive skin! It's not going to reverse age you 10 years (nothing will) but I do feel like my under eyes are brighter and more hydrated. The skin around my eyes gets irritated so easily, but after using the whole tube of this product I feel like the skin around my eyes is stronger than before. My eye area can handle more of a beating when it comes to eye makeup and feels a little healthier. This melts into my skin and doesn't leave a sticky film which is a huge plus for me. This is a very good eye cream, it's vegan, and it comes with a lot of product in the tube. A great addition to my daily routine! I would definitely recommend giving it a try if you've had your eye on this!

The ingredients list of this eye cream are top tier which is why I purchased it. I‚Äôve also had friends that are obsessed with this but unfortunately it‚Äôs just not for me. I didn‚Äôt really enjoy the consistency of it, it irritated my eyes and unfortunately it triggered my milia. Just not for me.

Basic sheet mask

I was pleasantly surprised by how good this mask is. For my skin, the morning after using a mask tells a lot about how good it was. I loved how healthy my skin looked and felt the next morning. I highly recommend this mask!
My face felt really hydrated and had a nice, hydrated glow afterwards. I put it in the fridge prior to use!

This is one of my favorite sheet masks of all time. It is a soothing and moisturizing mask. It leaves my skin hydrated and soft. The ingredient list make it an all star for me. The mask is made of paper with lots of serum. It fits well..: I always buy when it is in stock. I sells out because it is amazing!

productName: On Fermentation Peptine Eye Care Cream
reviewTitles: I scream for this eye cream!
review: Improves elasticity and dark circles, feels light, absorbs well and smells nice. Love this eye cream.

productName: On Fermentation Peptine Eye Care Cream
review: This eye cream is hydrating, a little goes a long way so u won't run out of product fast. Keeps my eye area smooth and hydrated.

productName: On Fermentation Peptine Eye Care Cream
review: I have used a retinol eye cream for years and the results are unbeatable when it comes to getting rid of fine lines. After not using skincare for a year, my eyelashes were falling out. I used this eye cream to repair my skin around my eyes and eyelashes, and they grew back with a vengeance. I couldn't have done that with retinol! Love this eye cream for that.

productName: On Fermentation Peptine Eye Care Cream
review: Immediately on application I feel a slight stinging I don't know why, I've never had this issue with any other eye cream. Thankfully it doesn't do anything bad to my skin besides the stinging. I don't have wrinkle or terrible bags so I can't say how effective it is, but I never noticed a difference in my eye area. I finished the whole tube so as not to be wasteful (though with the stinging I probably shouldn't have) but I wouldn't repurchase this.

I don‚Äôt wear makeup but I love using this balm. A tiny bit goes a long way and I just love how it smells. The first time I used it it seemed to pull up a ton of yucky stuff out of my pores. Love this.

I‚Äôm in love with this cleansing balm. First of all, it‚Äôs pink so I was immediately happy. It completely melted into my skin and it thoroughly cleaned my skin. Lastly, I love the smell. Overall, it just feels luxurious to me. I definitely want to repurchase.

This was a great oil cleanser that smelled nice and worked well! The product itself is great! I just didn't like the packaging. The lid broke early on so I was no longer able to screw it back on. It was just awkward and an inconvenience for it to then on, have no lid.

Gave me one of my worst breakouts in years! Something I love about oil cleansing is the way it leaves your skin feeling moisturized. This one doesn‚Äôt do that. Don‚Äôt buy this. There are so many other good ones like Enature‚Äôs moringa balm

I bought two colors, Vintage Red and Midnight Mauve, and I use them everyday. Midnight Mauve is a good pink color, while Vintage Red is pretty orange, like a summer red. They are pretty drying, but they‚Äôre perfect under gloss because once they dry down they really don‚Äôt budge at all.
I am white (Missha No. 21), with warm undertones if that helps anyone make a call on the colors.

I have almost the whole set of these by now I like them so much, I will say, I do find myself re-applying throughout the day, so if you are looking for something that lasts you all day this isn't it. For me, that doesn't bother me at all. I really like the colors and the way it is so light on my lips. Sometimes I will pair it with a light gloss for a little shine.

I cant tell by the names what color it corresponds to because the names of them aren't listed under the tints, super misleading. I took a chance and bought two and don't like them at all. don't think it stays on as well as i thought it would. pretty disappointed, would not buy again.
It‚Äôs the best hairbrush I‚Äôve ever used! I feel like I‚Äôm getting a scalp massage every time I use it.

reviewTitles: Best Brush I've had in Years
review: I have very long, thick hair and my hairbrushes in the past haven't quite been up to the task. I also needed a brush I could use in the shower on occasion. This brush is great. It goes right through my hair without getting stuck.

reviewTitles: Better than what you can get at a department stroe for the same price
review: I didn't realize until I got it that it's flexible, which is actually awesome. The curved brush head is very nice for maximum contact when I use it to give myself a little scalp massage.
This is going to sound weird probably, but the brush has a curved shape to it and it feels like my head is being caressed by a gentle hand every time I brush my hair, haha. I'd recommend it!

I bought this brush because I really like the British M line and I figured I would give it a try. I have fine hair but a lot of it, so needless to say my hair gets tangled easily. This brush is amazing. Super gentle, doesn‚Äôt pull so less hair comes out while brushing. Gets tangled out easily and is super easy to clean. Definitely my favorite brush I have owned.

I saw this brush on SOKO GLAM and thought I'd give it a go as my last brush was on it's last legs. So far no complaints! It does the job and it's quite a nice brush overall. Excellent for cleaning the brush too as it's got holes in the brush and isn't a paddle brush. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because I don't feel it was as strong as my old brush. It takes a few tries to get through tangles compared to before, but I think it's due to this brush being slimmer than my old one. I have very thick hair which doesn't help! But I'm happy with this one, it seems cleaner and sleeker in style and is high quality so I'm sure it'll last a long time.

reviewTitles: So good I bought a second one
review: Bought this as a last minute add to cart for my mom. She ended up loving it so much, that I bought it for my sister. Such a great brush!!

I felt my hair is hopeless, that is why even if this brush is expensive I still bought + after reading good reviews. My problem really is after shower my hair is all tangled up and every time I brush it, hair fall is crazy, but when I use it...lo and behold!!! What?!!! It detangles my hair, no bother and super less hair fall. I don't know the science about it but is surely works!!!

I love this little lip balm, I keep it in my purse and use it throughout the day to give my lips some color. After about the second use the tint stays on your lips, and I always get compliments on the packaging. If you are looking for something super hydrating you can layer a more occlusive balm on top, I like to use aquaphor to give it some shine. Love it!

reviewTitles: Nice at first, but then a bit drying
review: When I first put this on I loved the texture. It felt very moist and I loved the subtle pink color, that seemed to build the more I put on. However, whenever I wear it, I notice quite soon after that my lips feel very dry. Because of this, I avoid wearing it frequently

productName: On Force Shield Supercharged Reset Mist
review: Nice afternoon relief

productName: On Force Shield Supercharged Reset Mist
review: Idk. It wasn't bad, it does help my skin look fresher... Maybe in summer I'll see the light. But if your skin is only a lil oily this is probably overkill. It just has an odd scent and slightly odd texture feeling ... 4.5 stars. No issue with my sensitive skin!

productName: On Force Shield Supercharged Reset Mist
reviewTitles: Good for a quick boost, great for acne
review: Is this the best mist on the market? No. Is it a good mist. Yes. Will I reorder it, yes.

productName: On Force Shield Supercharged Reset Mist
review: I have extremely sensitive skin, a lot of allergies and am disabled.

productName: On Force Shield Supercharged Reset Mist
review: I follow my routine as closely as possible but some days its just skinfood wipes and a reset spray if I'm wiped out and don't have the energy for my full routine.

productName: On Force Shield Superfuel Serum Stick
review: Love the stick application - my face is absolutely glowing and I got several compliments. I originally bought for travel but will keep using it.

productName: On Force Shield Superfuel Serum Stick
review: I liked the product at first, it isn't the most moisturizing or long lasting product as it is a serum stick but overtime, it gave me rashes all over my face and my neck. I usually don't have sensitive skin but this product just irritated my skin so badly that my skin was incredibly dry, red and it stung pretty badly for a couple of days afterwards.

productName: On Force Shield Superlight Sunscreen SPF 30
review: I was super nervous when I saw that it was green but as others have said, it does well to give some color correcting to redness on my skin. It's super light weight and smells pleasant! I keep it in my purse to reapply throughout the day!

productName: On Force Shield Superlight Sunscreen SPF 30
reviewTitles: Great sunscreen for oily or normal skin at a great price
review: I like the green tint, and the clean ingredients. It was slightly too mattifying for my dry skin. I prefer something that feels a little more moisturizing. It's frustrating to use my skincare to try to get a good glow, and then to put on sunscreen and all the glow is gone. But for someone with oilier skin, this is probably an excellent choice.

productName: On Force Shield Superlight Sunscreen SPF 30
review: I am pleasantly surprised with how much I like this sunscreen. It is great for winter months were there isn't that much sun during this season. My face is less oily throughout the day and I love the green in it. The sunscreen has not caused any breakouts and I would definitely buy again. I just wished it had a stronger SPF for better protection but for that reason I am only using it for the winter months for now and will reconsider using it this summer.

productName: On Force Shield Superlight Sunscreen SPF 30
review: This sunscreen has a super light and non greasy finish which I love! It's great for warmer and more humid temperatures and I think it would be good for acne-prone skin since it's so light. The green tint does fade and works in nicely to your skin to help reduce redness, but it'll take a little bit of time for it to absorb. The only reason I docked a star was because I love the idea of a pump for dispensing but sometimes the pump is a bit finicky.

productName: On Force Shield Superlight Sunscreen SPF 30
review: This one goes on very nice and does not leave any residues behind. I really like the light feel of the SPF knowing it still provides a high level of sun protection.
It does work great for acne and my aging, sensitive skin. Propolis also helped on my very irritated skin under the nose after infection. I'm going to repurchase it for sure.
It makes my skin look super hydrated and has no smell whatsoever! A little goes a long way!!!
Loved this product! Great price for awesome quality

Let me start this with a couple caveats. First, I'm a guy, so it's difficult to find a moisturizer that's not overpowering in fragrance and doesn't contain mineral oil (the vast majority of moisturizers marketed to men contain oil). Second, I work in Antarctica 8-12 months out of the year, always during the winter months if I'm not doing a full year contract, where it's typically below -20c, windy/gusty, with almost zero humidity (polar desert). I also live in Minnesota and am there during the winter as well, typically on the western plains of the state where the weather is almost identical to Antarctica winters, but slightly higher (not much) humidity. (I basically winter year round between the hemispheres.) Third, I'm a Boiler/Furnace mechanic where I work in varying environments such as the aforementioned environments outside, but also including rooms that are potentially above 30c with high humidity (steam).

With the above said, this is best moisturizer I've had that can handle all of the above situations. Whether it's -45c, zero humidity, and 45+ knot winds straight at my face or it's 35c, 95% humidity, and I'm covered in ash, soot, grime, dirt, and oil this moisturizer keeps on going. It's heavy enough to keep my skin moisturized in the coldest, driest, windiest conditions, but light enough to not suffocate my skin in hot, humid, dirty conditions. I would almost consider it be recommendable as a year round moisturizer for a lot of people because of the extremely different environments that I use this in.

review: Es un producto que me gusta mucho, facil de usar y efectivo, lo recomiendo

productName: On Gentle Face Cleaning Remover Pad
review: I received this as a birthday gift. Thank you, Soko Glam! I know the description and directions state that these are ‚Äúcleansing‚Äù pads, but I would go one (or two) steps further with my cleansing routine. I don‚Äôt feel that these should in any way, shape, or form, replace the cleansing step as they do not cleanse that well; this coming from someone whom doesn‚Äôt wear foundation and on occasion, mascara and eyeliner. I‚Äôve had them for over a month and I‚Äôve tried using them twice instead of double-cleansing and my skin was not happy. My skin needs actual water to start the hydration process, which these do not supply. I believe that these pads would be okay to ‚Äúrefresh‚Äù the skin midday or after a workout until you can get home to actually wash your face, but the jar is huge and isn‚Äôt travel-friendly.
Lovely, smooth and buttery.
I have found a new favorite
Bought these during cyber month and no regrets at all. I love how it leaves my skin glows. Definitely would buy more.
Really loved this toner. New to k beatuy but it‚Äôs my new go to

reviewTitles: Ginseng Essense Water is a game changer
review: I purchased this on a whim and thought I would give it a go. I've been using it over the last few months and have definitely noticed a difference. The redness that I normally have due to rosacea is not there anymore, my skin is noticeably brighter, and it is definitely more hydrated. I would highly recommend this to anyone wanting to try it. It's now being added to my rotation permanently.

I never really liked water essences, but this one changed my mind. I only need 3 drops in the palm of my hand and can easily pat it on without half the liquid dripping away on me. I've bought this twice now I like it so much. I pair it with the Ginseng Snail Serum. My skin looks and feels amazing. It hasn't caused any breakouts. Absorbs quickly. Definitely makes your face feel moisturized even before using moisturizer!
I heard good things about beauty of Joseon products. And so far so good.
Love it!

I use this at night since it‚Äôs a thicker, creamy consistency, and it‚Äôs works really great! I wake up to my eyes looking hydrated and less tired. It‚Äôs also helped minimize the appearance of my dark circles.
Will be a staple in my winter skincare routine. I have dry sensitive skin and this eye cream is perfect for the cold winter months or dry weather climate. The texture is absolutely luxurious!!!

My tired eyes always feel good after using it. The amount you get is quite large. I've never gotten so much eye cream in 1 jar before. No milia or irritation but my eyes aren't very sensitive. This eyecream is good for day and night
This eye cream is very rich and nourishing so a little goes a long way to give your eyes some TLC

The Ginseng Eye Cream is a heavy, thick moisturizer for eyes. I have seen improvements in my undereye circles. My preexisting smile lines/wrinkles have stayed the same and not decreased. Since it is thick cream, the Milia spots under my eyes have worsened, which caused me to score it lower. I am combating them with a retinol spot treatment. Still using the cream because the spot treatment has been workiing m
Perfect for my skin
I enjoy this serum so much. To me, it just feels so luxurious. I use it day and night and it really hydrates my skin. There‚Äôs a slight hint of ginseng fragrance but it‚Äôs nice.

I saw many great review about this product. However, after finishing the whole bottle I would not consider repurchasing it because I did not see a big difference or improvement on my skin. Great ingredients but not much results.

productName: On Glow Deep Serum: Rice + Alpha-Arbutin
reviewTitles: Helped me a lot with my acne scars
review: I've been using this for the past nine months and see a huge difference in my scarring. It feels amazing on my skin and has noticeable helped even out my skin tone and scarring. I have nearly no scarring now. Would definetely reccommend for anyone with acne scars.

productName: On Glow Deep Serum: Rice + Alpha-Arbutin
review: I‚Äôm on my third bottle of this and it has become a mainstay of my skincare. The rice bran water is a lovely addition and leaves my skin happy and glowing!

productName: On Glow Deep Serum: Rice + Alpha-Arbutin
review: i love using this serum at NIGHT (alpha arbutin is more stable in the dark). skin is glowy and hydrated and my skin looks brighter. ANOTHER HOLY GRAIL THATS SOLD OUT IM GOING TO CRY

productName: On Glow Deep Serum: Rice + Alpha-Arbutin
review: At first, I liked the product because it absorbed into my skin well but after a couple of weeks use I started noticing tiny bumps on my face and clogged pores. I used this right after my cleanser and followed with a moisturizer. Removed this from my routine and the bumps disappeared. Added it back in and the bumps were also back. It's likely that the arbutin didn't work well with my skin sadly

reviewTitles: Wonderful Moisturizer for Dry/Sensitive and Acne Skin
review: I have a mix of skin challenges & it's hard to find products that moisturize my dry spots without aggravating them or causing acne flare ups in other areas - but this one is a complete hit! I can use 5-6 drops of the serum, cover my entire face, and have my skin feel wonderfully moisturized and dewy - great find in the winter. This serum looks thick at first but blends easily across the face. I use this in combination with the I'm From Rice Toner and a moisturizing spray that I have and my skin will feel and look well moisturized for 24 hrs without any touch-ups!

I even use the serum on my hands or extremely dry eczema-like spots that I have and I can see improvement within 12 hours and it has helped heal them up within a couple days. Despite the bottle being small and using this almost everyday the bottle will last for months, so I think the price is decent at $17.

I‚Äôm not much of one to write reviews, but this serum is so effective. I have dry AND sensitive skin and live in a very cold/dry winter climate. I use this serum as a part of my AM and PM routine and I can say that my skin is absolutely more supple, hydrated and clear as a result. I‚Äôve found that after I ski my skin barrier is absolutely wrecked no matter what I do, but this serum has help my skin recover and calm down much more rapidly.
I‚Äôm in my second bottle and will continue to utilize this incredible product!

I bought this because I wanted a lotion to wear after doing a treatment, but now I use it nightly. Easily one of the fastest noticeable improvements I've had from a product. It has really helped me maintain smooth, glowy skin that looks great in selfies :D
I use this a few times a week or whenever I am breaking out. It goes on so smooth and is great as a moisturizer as well. It leaves my skin feeling so soft.

The other Korean cream that is just like this but better is out of stock, but this cream is not bad, so I have no complaints. I use it when my skin feels rough. After using it at night, my skin feels butt smooth. You can also shave your peach fuzz on your face for maximum smoothness . I do that. I stop wear ing for years. I hope that other woman can embrace their beautiful bare face!

reviewTitles: Good for breakouts on sensitive skin
review: Helpful when I am having a breakout which tend to be hormonal. I have sensitive skin but this does not irritate it at all. Surprisingly moisturizing as well.
When your skin is not happy with anything this helps heal and straighten everything out.

I‚Äôve never used glycolic products before so I don‚Äôt really have a comparison but I can say it wasn‚Äôt drying or harsh. I didn‚Äôt feel stinging, most likely as it has a very minimal amount. However this cream in itself is definitely not hydrating enough and would require another layer to keep your skin moisturized.

But with consistent usage I do see improvements of the skin surface as it appears smoother - but the change is very slight. It doesn‚Äôt have any strong fragrance and is gentle. I‚Äôd recommend others giving it a try as it does work but takes time.

reviewTitles: Great for dry sensitive skin in need of consistent exfoliation
review: I have bought this twice now because it‚Äôs so effective. My skin is so soft and clean after using it. It feels like the top layer of skin is naturally exfoliated after use
It‚Äôs a good product I just didn‚Äôt find it to be quite as moisturizing as my dry skin needs.

I alternate days with differin gel and this glycolic acid treatment. Its much less irritating than other chemical exfoliant treatments I've tried. I use this cream at night and the day after I often notice that my breakouts have been reduced and my skin is smoother. I've had this cream for over 6 months and I'm only half way through the bottle. I don't think its an effective moisturizer on its on and I always follow up with something else. The price is great for the quality of this product and I will be repurchasing.
Really good product but felt a bit harsh for my skin. my skin is dry but quite sensitive

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I‚Äôm sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

productName: On Goodbye Redness Centella Mask Pack
review: Calming and simple mask

productName: On Goodbye Redness Centella Mask Pack
review: I've bought this mask a number of times- it's super effective and affordable. Excellent at reducing redness and soothing.

review: I've gone through many different sheet masks and can safely say this is the best one I've tried! It fits your face perfectly while hydrating your face. I recommend using it after exfoliating and putting the mask in your fridge to make it cold beforehand.

productName: On Goodbye Redness Centella Mask Pack
review: Definitely noticed reduced redness after using this mask, will order more.

productName: On Goodbye Redness Centella Mask Pack
review: These have become my new favorite masks! They‚Äôre very calming for my redness-prone skin.

productName: On Goodbye Redness Centella Mask Pack
review: Benton's centella masks are basically must-haves for sensitive skin. All the centella really works, and at under $3/mask they're affordable enough to slap on as-needed, instead of hoarding for a self-care pamper day. There's also plenty of extra essence.

productName: On Goodbye Redness Centella Mask Pack
review: I loved this mask!!! It was so soothing on my irritated skin and did just the trick to rid of my redness. There so so much serum on their mask, it was oozing as I pressed it into my face. I definitely will repurchase this again.

productName: On Goodbye Redness Centella Mask Pack
review: Definitely soothing and hydrating. Will buy again! I don't have breakouts but my skin can get flushed so was looking for something calming and this worked.

productName: On Goodbye Redness Centella Mask Pack
review: Love these when I'm having a terrible breakout. They're non-iritating and they don't burn at all. My redness is noticeably lessened the morning after I use my breakouts don't seem so inflamed. Definitely will repurchase again!

productName: On Goodbye Redness Centella Mask Pack
review: I ordered two of these single packs, one for me and one for my boyfriend to try. It really did calm our red inflamed dry skin, and it was incredibly hydrating. He wasn't crazy about the concept of sheet masks as a whole since they're pretty cold and slimy feeling to wear, which I agree with lol, but he liked the results and may possibly do this with me again lol. A good product with lots of essence. My only complaint was that while it fit my face fairly well, it was fairly small on his; I had to tear the eye holes to keep it from being literally in his eyes. We'll likely order this again, at least for myself if not for him.

reviewTitles: I always have this on hand
review: This is a need to buy product. I used to only use one water-based cleanser, but I was told to add on an oil based cleanser. I tried this and was sold. You can tell that this cleanser, when used right, is getting the dirt off every time. I live by this and buy it in two's.

I originally got a sample sized version and like it so I decided to get a full one. After using for about 2 months I‚Äôve definitely noticed my skin have a smoother appearance. It also felt like it effectively cleaned my skin without being too stripping and it takes off makeup pretty well too.

One star less for watery consistency comparing with other oil cleansers. I need to apply on palm and then from hand on face. I love citrus/orange smell! It doesn't irritate my eyes. My neck love it too! Even though I am not extremely happy with consistency I'll repurchase it.

It smells so good ! The oil cleanser is a nice consistency, lasted me over 7 months while using two pumps one or two times a day and is the perfect first step in my skin care regime. I bought another oil cleanser and though it gets the job done, it doesn't have as pleasant as a smell as this rice cleanser.

I was introduce to this by a consultant to try to use on days I use makeup or have a lot of buildup but I found that it didn't work for me. After using it for a month I found it made my skin slightly oily after use and it didn't remove my makeup as well as I hoped it did. It did keep my skin moisturized and not dry. I think this product would do well with someone who has dry skin.

I love the light smell of this moisturizer, it‚Äôs super refreshing. The moisturizer itself feels just as refreshing, it‚Äôs not a full cream, I‚Äôd say it leans more towards a watery almost gel like consistency. I wouldn‚Äôt use it in the winter but as a summer moisturizer its great!
This is my new favorite cream. I love the slight smell to it. It's not too sticky and absorbs quickly. It leaves my skin soft and moisturized.

I have been searching for the perfect daytime moisturizer for so long and finally found THE ONE. Pleasantly surprised by the jar size, you genuinely don't need to use as much as you think. It feels like silk and is so great for my sensitive skin. This entire skincare line is becoming a fast favorite.

productName: On Green Tangerine Vita C Serum Mask

reviewTitles: New Staple in My (Sensitive) Skin Care Collection!
