I can‚Äôt say much about this serum. I haven‚Äôt noticed a difference, good or bad. It may be that I just like my other skincare products better. I had hoped this would be similar to the Isntree Green Tea toner but I find them different on my oily, sensitive, acne prone skin.
I liked this toner- I found it hydrating and a bit soothing. I just never really reached for it, and ended up giving it away after a few uses.

absolutely worth every penny!!! i have sensitive/acne prone skin so experimenting with different toners can be scary for me! i have absolutely no regrets with this toner! this helped control my redness and kept my oil production in check!! it does only have a subtle scent to it so it shouldn‚Äôt bother you if you‚Äôre sensitive to that :)
I love all the ingredients and smells very pleasant, but I don't think it's a necessity to have in your skincare routine.

I love this toner. I bought it originally at the beginning of this year and have repurchased this for a second time. It suits my normal skin type very well! There is a slight scent but I find it nice and it calms my skin well.
Super awesome hydrating toner that really evened out my skin tone. will definitely buy again

productName: On Green Tea Real Fresh Foam Cleanser

review: This mask is simply incredible. First time ever I see my pore actually tighter. The first month I did the mask once/twice per week. I saw the results on week 3. Visibly tighter pores. Will definitely purchase this again!

productName: On H.D.P Photoready Tightening Charcoal Mask (5 pack)

productName: On H.D.P Photoready Tightening Charcoal Mask (5 pack)

review: This is a perfect mask to use before any event or special occasion. It is brightening, tightening, and hydrating. What more could you want?! Also, the fit is wonderful!

What a wonderful surprise to find tucked away back in my drawer!!!
I‚Äôve gotten this product over the course of 4 years and it‚Äôs consistent. The nozzle always dispenses well and the mist is fine and light. I love reapplying this throughout the day.

This serum spray is a light and refreshing part of my skincare routine. I‚Äôve noticed that my skin feels hydrated well after using the serum and it works well with my other products. It also leaves a nice, dewy glow, so I will definitely be repurchasing this!

I absolutely love this spray serum! It applies wonderfully and I like the spray when I‚Äôm in a hurry for some extra hydration.

I have fun when I use this product. It helps regain that moisture quickly and leaves a refreshing feeling.
I love it. It's my must have in my skin care routine. I apply twice a week to avoid skin irritation. It has acidic smell which doesn't bother me at all. have some varicose veins and vein spiders.
This truly is an at home facial, it‚Äôs smoothing without being irritating for my sensitive skin. For days after I have noticeably softer skin! It brightens as well! Love it

I picked this as a reward on a whim, so did not have any expectations. I am also somewhat of a product skeptic, This is the only product I have ever tried that has had significant, immediate, visible results from the very first use. After using, my skin was so soft, smooth, and hydrated, and I had some blemishes that were significantly reduced/less visible. My skin looked and felt like I'd just come from the spa. As a bonus, it's super quick and easy to use. There is a bit of tingling while it's on, but no redness or irritation at all. I am sold and will definitely buy again!

Only used a couple of times so far. It‚Äôs a beautiful chemical exfoliating product that I use once a week in between facial treatments. It‚Äôs affordable as it‚Äôs going to last a while due to the frequency of usage. Leaves my skin feeling smooth.

reviewTitles: Great new add to my routine

review: As far as lip balms go, this one is pretty average ‚Äî not great but not terrible, either. Not a fan of the fragrance, though. It smells artificially floral.

productName: On Hanskin Seven Layer Ceramide Lip Balm
review: 1. Not enough product for the price

productName: On Hanskin Seven Layer Ceramide Lip Balm

productName: On Hanskin Seven Layer Ceramide Lip Balm
review: I kept using it to see if it was a fluke but the product ran out before I could be sure that it was worth anything. Two stars because I like the texture of it.

reviewTitles: Great set to keep or share
review: This set is definitely worth the price because almost all of the products are full size. I‚Äôm keeping some of the products and giving some to a friend. I‚Äôm especially a fan of the Hanskin essence that comes with this set.

reviewTitles: This set caused me to repurchase...
review: This set caused me to repurchase multiple products in this assortment. Neogen Day-Light Protection Airy Sunscreen, Isntree Green Tea Fresh Serum, and I'm From Mugwort Mask. These products stood out to me, and I also liked this essence but didn't get the chance to repurchase. This set is best during the summer time, especially if you live in the southern hemisphere.
Try the mugwart mask after it's been in the fridge for a while and use it after exfoliating, it feels absolutely wonderful and has a cooling affect. It is very calming and refreshing!
This essence is absolutely delightful. My face feels so light and SOFT. I didn't anticipate it being so light since it is a little thicker of an essence, but it is truly a delight,

I got a sample of this cleanser a while back and loved it so much I invested in a full size version. A little goes a long way, it foams up really nicely and feels soft and refreshing. It definitely cleans well and may strip some of your natural oils off, but paired with a rich moisturizer it doesnt bother my skin too much. I like to use this cleanser a couple times a week, not everyday.

reviewTitles: A little goes a long way!
review: I liked this product because you can use a very small amount and it will last you for long. But, if you have dry skin it can dry it out at times. Also stings your eyes more than normal (compared to cleaners for sensitive skin)

Great cleanser that isn‚Äôt drying. Definitely would repurchase!

reviewTitles: I WAS WRONG! ‚Ä¶ I LOVE IT!
review: When I lathered this on my face for the first time, I absolutely hated it. It felt as if I was washing my face with shaving cream! I just knew I was going to send it back. But something absolutely miraculous happened! After I finished (GENTLY!) scrubbing my face down with with a washcloth and rinsing thoroughly, I noticed it right away. My face felt clean. But not only clean, it also felt moisturized. I didn‚Äôt feel dry and tight. It didn‚Äôt feel over stripped ‚Ä¶ it just felt good.

productName: On Hi Amino All Cleansing Oil
review: I've been using this oil cleanser for a week now and my skin looks refreshed and glows. I love this item and will purchase it again!
I bought this cuz my normal moisturizer wasn't enough for this winter. The packaging is so cute! The moisturizer smells great, super creamy, and keeps my skin hydrated during this cold season.

My SO and I live in the desert, and this is the cream I reach for when the winds start to blow and humidity drops below 40%. Yesterday it was so dry and windy, my SO even let me put some on his face and in his beard and let me tell you, he aged backwards 5 years and his beard became so soft. He woke up this morning and told me how much he enjoyed how soft his skin and beard feels, something he NEVER does.

This really seems best for the driest weather when your barrier really needs that extra something. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend it for very oily skin. My skin is pretty sensitive and still struggles with hormonal breakouts but when I use this I haven‚Äôt noticed anything but relief.

I have a normal skin and its not so bad even though I dont maintain it well, This is so greesy that I have to use only at night on the day time I look like I have applied castor oil on my face LOL. After using few nights It opened my pores and caused breakouts. I am a returning customer for SG and I always had a good feeling about the products that I ordered. But this choice of mine turned down my impression on SG

it pains me to write this review being that this is my first one star review regarding Korean skincare.I am a big advocate when it comes to KBeauty and i always convince my friends and family join the Kbeauty family.I purchased this essence when i was running low on the 'Then I Met You' essence,at first i had no idea what was causing me to breakout because i had purchased a couple of other items too.So i did the process of elimination and started using the new products with my holy grails and alas it turned out to be this essence i was actually very sad and i really wanted to like it now I'm left with an almost full bottle and i don't know what to do with. I would give it away but i don't want them to have the same reaction as me.

This is my absolute favorite essence! It's wonderfully soothing and moisturizing. During the day, I can get away with using only toner and essence, because this essence provides such good moisture. It leaves my skin feeling smooth and bouncy. Will definitely purchase again.

productName: On Houttuynia Cordata Calming Moisture Cream

productName: On Houttuynia Cordata Calming Moisture Cream
review: I was very disappointed with this product as I really wanted to like it. I don't usually have sensitive skin but this product gave me a terrible reaction. This product was recommended to me from the concierge skin consultation and within seconds of applying to my face, I felt it become very itchy and super hot. Using it within the week had led my face to to a very bad breakout that took a few weeks for it to fully recover. This had been my first time going along with a proper skincare routine and led me to quit using any kind of skincare within the future. Thankfully, keeping my skincare routine to just rinsing with water allowed it to heal from this horrible first experience.

review: I use it as my first step in the morning. One pad is enough for my whole face and neck. Good value! I pat it down and it feels hydrating and soothing.

productName: On Houttuynia Cordata Calming Toner Pad

review: I bought this because I‚Äôve always wanted to try toner pads after seeing Korean skincare YouTubers use them and luckily this was one sale during Lunar New Year so I bought it. I love it! It‚Äôs also very lightweight for morning use since I love light formulas in the morning so I highly recommend this product!

productName: On Houttuynia Cordata Calming Toner Pad
review: These feel so soothing and also cleansing but if you want also offer super mild exfoliation if you use the barely textured grid side. There is also a ton of liquid toner left in the container so they won't dry out, and plastic tweezers that actually fit inside the tub (huge pet peeve of mine when tweezers and scoops don't fit in the product container) to keep the product clean. I also have the essence, which I love, and have used the sheet masks (also loved and plan to repurchase) and I think I may need the moisturizer too. These toner pads feel like they can do so many for someone with sensitive skin on a budget if you ask me as they can exfoliate, tone, feel similar to the essence, and since I ran out of their sheet masks I bet I can stick a few of these in the fridge and lay them on my face until I buy more. Also 70 pads for the price is a great buy!

It doesn't feel soft, if that makes any sense. (Especially at this price point) its just not for me!

productName: On Hydra Shield Anti-Pollution Jelly Toner
review: Bouncy, cooling, skin clarifying, goodness!

productName: On Hydra Shield Anti-Pollution Jelly Toner
review: In general, I love toners. So I was excited to give this ‚Äújelly‚Äù toner a try, and it was part of what sold me on purchasing all of the KLog line. I really like the way this feels, and it is very hydrating. It absorbs quickly so you can move on to your next product without having to wait too long. I only took away one star because I really don‚Äôt love the packaging. The pump is strange, you push the top down and the product comes up into a little well. I would much prefer a regular pump type bottle. Otherwise this is a great product and an awesome value for the price!

productName: On Hydra Shield Anti-Pollution Jelly Toner
review: I really bought this product on a whim. I was intrigued and skeptical of the jelly consistency, but I have to say after using this product for almost 2 months I really love the consistency and what it has done to my skin. The ingredients in this toner are great. First product I have tried with niacinamide and it has made a big difference in the overall appearance of my skin. Not to mention the peptides in this formula.

productName: On Hydra Shield Anti-Pollution Jelly Toner
review: I love this stuff! It‚Äôs hydrating, and I‚Äôve noticed an improvement in my skin texture since I‚Äôve put this in my rotation. Will repurchase in the future.

productName: On Hydra Shield Anti-Pollution Jelly Toner
review: I loved the texture of it but unfortunately, it dried out my skin and made me breakout. I don‚Äôt normally get pimples very often and when I switched to this, pimples kept popping up everywhere.

This hair mask made my curls look beautiful, but it had a slight volumizing effect, which I do not want as a frizzy-haired person.

I bought this to remedy the dryness of my bleached, colored hair and it does just that. I like to mix my color shampoo in it occasionally to refresh my color. It leaves my hair feeling so, so soft. I also have a dry scalp and it seems to boost hydration. I follow the instructions on the back - leave it in for about 15 minutes after shampooing. It has a fragrance (for those sensitive to scents).
Very softening and moisturizing conditioner. Its heavy weight so I use it more as mask than a daily conditioner. A little goes a long way. It has a light sweet scent, almost like cream and honey.

This is the only hair treatment that can care for my ends. I've repurchased this over and over again. My hair is so smooth after rinsing it off. I can feel the silkiness even as I blow dry - it feels well-protected.
This is incredible for dry damaged hair! So soft, much smoother and far less frizzy. I‚Äôve been using it as a conditioner and will 1000% repurchase.

I have fine, straight, colored treated, chin length hair. I thought I would try this as a nourishing hair treatment. I shampooed my hair & left it in for 15 min, then rinsed & styled using my regular 2 products. My hair looks incredible! It has more body & texture, which is a total surprise, while being shiny & bouncy, which I definitely was not expecting. Excellent product& I highly recommend it. My only complaint would be the scent is way too strong for my taste, but still a top notch hair treatment.
I found it to be a nice daily leave-in. My hair feels moisturized without being greasy.

reviewTitles: Wanted to love this but it did nothing for me!
review: I've used up the whole bottle and left it in longer than 15 minutes every time I've used it. Unfortunately, I've just had better luck with just my weekly jojoba hair oiling routine.

Adding this treatment in permanently to my rotation. I bleach my hair regularly, so happy to find something that makes it soft, moisturized, but not heavy. Hard to find good treatments that are silicone free. I like the smell of the shampoo better than the treatment, but both are pleasant. Scent isn‚Äôt overwhelming. Wish they had larger sizes since my hair is long but still a good price point.

SO impressed with the results. My hair is half lightened and has been really dry and frizzy from the weather + hard water. No conditioner has really effectively made my hair feel soft or healthy since bleaching it. This makes my hair look like Virgin hair in terms of quality and health. Really really happy to have gotten this.

I can‚Äôt believe how great this is for such a decent price. I used this after color treating my hair and it was pretty dry, this worked amazingly for me. My hair tends to be pretty dry sometimes as it is, especially in the colder months, so this has been amazing for that. It looked and felt NOTICEABLY better after using this just one time, I couldn‚Äôt believe it! I definitely need to buy more of this!!

This product works great at hydrating my hair and adding shine. It is easy to use and my hair feels much softer after. I'm not a big fan of the subtle scent but it is not noticeable after rinsing and drying.
Leaves hair super soft and has a very light scent.
I purchased first time ever. My hair are damaged with coloring and very dry. After applying my hair are very soft and easy to brush with fingers. I love it!!!

I have strawberry blonde wavy hair which means I have some coarse red hair and some fine blonde hair. I use this after I shower as a leave-in. It removes frizz and lets my hair air-dry without getting poufy. I avoid heat on my hair but have noticed that using this makes my hair smooth, shiny, and manageable. I will take that any day of the week for $8. I also like the light scent as I do not like my hair products to compete with my perfume - it smells like a classic lotion. Just bought 2 more.

Let me start by stating that I have fine/thinning hair (stress) and its incredibly hard for me to find a silicone free conditioner that doesn't weigh my hair down and cost an arm and a leg. I know that this product was meant for people with damaged hair but I got it in hopes that it would restore the shine. I was skeptical when I read the directions stating it should be applied from scalp to ends instead of the usual midlenghts to ends but I followed the directions and I'm glad I did. Even if it didn't restore the shine I'd still buy it again based on it's price point and the fact that it conditions without weighing down my hair. Will definitely repurchase.
I am so happy with these patches! they are cute but really helped clear up a hormonal breakout fast

reviewTitles: Updated Packaging! New version not as good
review: I really loved the old version of this in the round container with thinner product soaked sheets. The new products I received are different from the old version and unfortunately aren't great. The container is square now, and each sheet is thicker but distributes less product onto the face. I really loved the old version but am disappointed in this new repackaging and likely won't order again. If I had known, I wouldn't have reordered these again! I would return them but I didn't open them to check that they were the same.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I‚Äôm sorry that the updated packaging for this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

I started using these to help calm eczema on my face. Not only did it calm the eczema but my skin texture has improved and my skin is softer and able to absorb more moisture. I am using these 2x a day because my eczema was very flared. Love these little wonder pads. Bonus points for the byproduct of soothing my winter chapped hands.

productName: On Hypoallergenic Cica Pick Up Mask

review: I'm a dark-skinned Black woman and I thought this sunscreen would be a safe bet (and not leave a white cast.) Unfortunately, this was a trojan horse scenario. It looks normal to the naked eye but I look casket ready every time my camera turns on.

productName: On I'm Safe For Sensitive Skin

review: My sister has been using this for two weeks and she could see her pores shrinking and blackheads decreasing. She had severe acne on her cheeks, chin, and forehead. But after using this serum and moisturizer, her acne has lessened.

review: Purchased this for the first time, gave it a 2 week trial and I can say it is working. It goes on velvety & it smells really nice. I have noticed my pores seems to be a minimizing around my cheeks & nose area. Will continue to purchase this in the future!

productName: On It's Skin Power 10 Formula - Po (Pore Tightening)
review: I bought this during the sale since I‚Äôve been eyeing it for a while. I‚Äôve used it 3 or 4 times and it really does what it claims. I have oily skin and when I wear this my pores look smoother and less visible. My skin is also less oily throughout the day. This makes an excellent makeup primer as well. I‚Äôve tried it under tinted moisturizer and my skin looks so smooth and even. The texture is light and when you rub it into your skin, it leaves an almost velvety finish. I‚Äôd definitely buy this again.

productName: On It's Skin Power 10 Formula - Po (Pore Tightening)

productName: On It's Skin Power 10 Formula - Ye (Vitality)
review: Never used skin care before. Ye is the first and the last. I love the product. It evens out the dry and the oily. Shine free and fantastic.

productName: On It's Skin Power 10 Formula - Ye (Vitality)

reviewTitles: Works well and makes me feel fancy :)
review: I love incorporating this into my routine, and it's always super nice and cooling in the morning. After about three months I have had no issues with it, considering how many other rollers have reviews saying that they broke very quickly.
I have seen other rollers at TJ Maxx and while they might be cheaper, they are not as sturdy. Worth the extra $ in my opinion. It will last you longer.

It looks very pretty. I love the color. And it seems more stable looking than the ones I usually see in the store. I‚Äôve been using the smaller roller for my face though. I feel like using the smaller one is more effective as I feel it more as compared to when I use the bigger one. But it could just be me.

literally gives me that liquid hair look and feel

reviewTitles: helped me detangle my fine hair
review: i emptied this product in 2020, then i forgot about it and been using many other leave in conditioner. now visiting the website, i am buying this again, this product made my hair frizz free and shiny.
I don't have treated or damaged hair but I didn't notice a difference when I used this product. It didn't seem to make my hair softer or shinier.

My hair has been damaged by heat, colour, and chlorine. This product helped my hair a lot and I am currently on my third bottle. After washing my hair, I apply a nickel-sized amount onto my towel-dried hair (avoid the scalp). It leaves my hair feeling healthy and soft, and it looks shiny (but not oily). It has a nice green-apple scent that isn't too strong.
I really like how thin the wand is because the product clump less and is easy to apply on both upper and lower lashes. I do see some lengthening and the product does last long hours.
The only minus point I can see is that when I just curl my lashes and apply the product, the curl doesn't hold super well after a couple of hours.

I was so excited to use this and only got it as a "treat yourself" purchase, but I was so disappointed. Firstly, the price tag is too high so I expected it to be amazing. Secondly, did not meet my expectations at all and made me regret buying it. I just finished using half of the bottle after months because I just don't reach for it. Doesn't leave my skin feeling hydrated or glowy or plump or anything. Rather get the Dokdo toner and put it in a spray bottle. Disappointed in Superegg...

A nice mist as a mid day refresh but I‚Äôm not sure it‚Äôs any better or worse than some less expensive options.

Even though this is called a hair mask, it plays very much like a thicker conditioner for hair & I use it every time I wash my hair with the shampoo from this same line. I am a woman with a buzzcut and before I started using this shampoo and conditioner I constantly struggled with itchiness, flakes, scalp redness & hair shedding. This conditioner works so well. It immediately soothes my scalp and hair leaving behind smooth, shiny & flake free hair with no itchiness whatsoever. I can truly say I have seen a huge improvement in my scalp and hair since using this conditioner along with the shampoo. I would highly recommend.

I have an oily scalp and dry ends (a little heat damage/split ends) and this mask/conditioner didn't really do much for me. It smells great and left my hair shiny the first day, but by day two, my ends were all tangled and dry feeling. Unfortunately, this did not work for me.
Amazing! No more dandruff. And my hair looks great. Smells nice, too!

Do you suffer from a dry and itchy scalp? Because I do. Unfortunately. Head and Shoulders was my jam for YEARS and it was the only hair product that tamed my...dandruff. However, good things don't last and it just wasn't doing it for me anymore. On a whim, I purchased this product back in March and I can confidently say that it's helped me so much! I do have to switch this out with Head and Shoulders some days. For example, I'd use this Kombucha Shampoo for 3-4 days straight and use Head and Shoulders for the rest of the days. Why? My hair would get pretty oily after a while. Though, this doesn't seem to be the case anymore and I may need to purchase the mask. In conclusion, this is a great shampoo for those who have dry and itchy scalps and I will definitely be repurchasing this once I run out!

I used many British M products and was excited to try a shampoo that purports to alleviate breakage and damage. Unfortunately, this shampoo did not work for my hair. I always do a double cleanse and even still, I can feel the oils and buildup on my scalp. It made my hair look limp and lifeless and totally dried it out (even with a conditioner!). This did not work for me but hopefully it works for others!
We are sorry to hear that the Kombucha Shampoo was not a good fit. Please reach out to us via email at

I am a woman with a buzzcut & taking care of your hair and scalp is vital because it is even more exposed to the elements. This shampoo has helped with my itchy scalp & has kept my scalp & hair healthy, happy, shiny and flake free. I no longer have the constant itchiness on my scalp because I use this shampoo along with the conditioner from the same line. My hair and scalp are the healthiest it has been in years because of this line of shampoo and conditioner. I have also noticed that my hair has stopped shedding like it used to as well. I will definitely continue to use these products and recommend them to my friends as well.
I have a really dry scalp, this shampoo help a LOT, I swear.

reviewTitles: Shiny hair, but difficult to rinse
review: I have an oily scalp and dry ends, so it's always a battle trying to find a shampoo that'll work for both. This shampoo did leave my hair shiny and silky, but it's extremely difficult to rinse it out. I would say if my scalp were on the dry side, this shampoo would work great. I usually only need dry shampoo on day three, but this left me quite greasy by day two.

After reading the reviews I decided to try since the reviews were positive and they were correct. I'm in my late 60's still dealing with cystic acne , and dryness with redness from using Retinal products. The pads are so soothing and refreshing. The pads have eased the redness. I highly recommend the pads.
This did helped me skin soothe and calm down more! Love it to use it as my toner step at night.

I am currently 7 months pregnant and have had horrific acne and lesions on my face like a mask for the entirety of my pregnancy. I‚Äôve tried everything and all of it has just exacerbated the situation. I came to soko glam got a skin analysis and bought the recommended products. This product has saved me literally. I‚Äôve only had the product for 2 weeks and I already look completely different. No acne in sight. Scars fading and some gone already. Lesions almost gone and no more dryness cracking and bleeding and severe redness anymore. If I could hug soko glam I would in a heart beat. This product has allowed me to heal my rash almost completely. I will never go without it!
I feel like these pads have completely changed my skin's hydration and redness in the best way. I have redness in my cheeks and on my forehead and my skin looks and feels so much healthier.

reviewTitles: Didn‚Äôt live up to my current SPF
review: I will keep using the product, however it does not live up to my current SPF. Feels a little too blah on my skin, was hoping for slightly more hydration

Thick and moist but absorbs into my skin in 20 minutes. Ample moisture so I like this sunscreen for the cold winter days but switch to something lighter for the hot balmy days.
My daughter suffers from eczema, now that it‚Äôs colder, her scalp starts to suffer. This is great to add to her scalp to help ease the itching and heal the spots without making her head greasy.
Never used this on my face, but was having some very dry skin on my arms that this helped with. Very hydrating and absorbs well.
Bought for face and didn't love. Didn't hate, but it was just meh. So this lamented in my drawer for ages. Tried it for body and same.
Then one day I ran out of my argon oil and I gave this a whirl for.my hair.

review: Holy crap does this help us wavy haired girls. I had great curl definition. Full on mermaid moment. Only con was that I went through a good deal of product. (Partially due to trial and error. Section well ahead of time and move quickly).

I love this oil! I have dry to normal skin that is sensitive and this oil never irritated me. It is moisturizing without being heavy and sticky. It is a big bottle and can be used for multiple purposes. I'll use it as a topper oil when I need extra hydration over night and I love using it on my chest and breasts. If I don't have lotion on hand I can use a few drops of this on my legs and arms as well. I'll even add a few drops on my chest before going out if I have lower cut top to just give my skin a goregous glow. I highly recommend this oil and will continue to purchase!

reviewTitles: Use it for all the things
review: I have been using this nightly for almost 4 months and I really do love it. It's such a mind confusion using oils to combat oily skin, and this one has really helped me eliminate the sebum over production shininess on my face. I truly got it because I wanted to fix my pigmentation and redness, and though it has helped with that, I wouldn't say it's elminated the redness. I put this on my feet after excercising. I've used it on my lips when i've been exposed to the cold winds. I have put it on my hair and my kids elbows for rough skin. It really is a solid rescue-er. This is something I'll keep in my skincare regimen as long as they keep making it.
This was a spontaneous purchase that I definitely do not regret. It gives a slight glow and absorbs quickly. You don't need much, so a single bottle should last a long time.
great for guasha!!

With dry/sensitive skin some oils that are heavier although moisturizing can still break me out. This one I‚Äôve found to thankfully not do that and hydrate well when I‚Äôve put it over my moisturizer at night. Not too heavy at all and dries and sinks in fairly quickly. I wake up with glowing skin!
This is a great serum! It has such a nice texture, didn't make my skin feel greasy or sticky at all. I do think I notice visible improvement in my skin as well, for hydration. Loved it.

I got this mist as a reward and I will definitely be buying once I run out! I use this every night after work and I find it works super well to give my skin a pick-me-up and boosts my moisturizer‚Äôs performance!
I love the mist. It is oil based but does not feel oily on my skin at all. A lot of my hyperpigmentation has faded since using it.
used this for my scalp nd roots and it helped alot with flakiness!! hair grew really well

reviewTitles: My Savior for Combo/Dry Sensitive Skin!
review: I have Combo skin; however, getting closer to my 40's my skin has become unpredictable at times. This recently has become my SAVIOR when my skin out of nowhere decides the retinol product I've been using for years is too harsh for my skin, when I woke up to my face literally peeling! My skin was so quickly soaking this up & it doesn't leave a greasy feel at all; I started by spraying it on the palm of my hand & gently patting on my face, but I've now realized it's not too much to spray right on. I'm going to ALWAYS keep a bottle on hand for those unpredictable skin days!
the texture of the toner was a little too thin for me and didnt see much of a difference when using it, however i used it on my scalp and it helped hydrate it well!
loved the formula and helped with bumps a lot‚Äî i wish it was a thicker liquid formula but overall a good experience

I have dehydrated acne prone sensitive skin and this does an amazing job at hydrating. It's good as a toner and an all-day spray. Great for the spring months to transition into the summer heat. It leaves a slight oily dew on your face that I can't get enough of. With continued use my skin does seem more resilient and calm, my acne scars seem to not be as noticeable which was a surprise bc I'm actually sensitive to lavender oil. But no irritation whatsoever. My only complaint is the nozzle which leaks so much product when I spray it on my face, a bunch gets on my hands. After a month of (leaky) spraying, it just got stuck so I had to transfer it to another bottle. But will repurchase and recommend

I originally bought this toner to spray on my foundation after applying it as I tend to get dry flakey skin around my nose by the end of the day. This works great for that purpose but I have also started using this as my standard toner before applying the rest of my routine I love it so much which is really saying something as I‚Äôve been a beauty water fan for years. It‚Äôs not very oily and makes your skin feel happy definitely give it a try!

I bought this for my mother, so the skin type and age range listed is for her. I got it for her to replace a carrot spray she used to use all the time before it was discontinued about 6 years ago. She has been missing it since then, but when she got this she absolutely loved it! She says that it is very refreshing, no stickiness, and doesn't ruin any makeup if you use it as a refreshing mist during the day. She loves it more than her old formula! It gets used daily and she feels that her skin is always glowing with this!
Literally applied this before bed on a hormonal acne spot - and the NEXT morning it was nearly gone!

I paired this serum with the acwell toner, eye-cream and the hanskin calming essence, and I think that combination is so wonderful. I definitely want to purchase the full products!

review: This is the only product I buy 3 at a time. I keep one in my purse, one at work and one at home. It‚Äôs great to even refresh my makeup. The best for my more dry skin.

I would not have ordered if I knew i could not use it over my eczema as now I have to buy something else until the eczema clears.

I was hoping it would fade after putting on but the scent remains (subtle enough others will not smell it, but on your own face and with a mask on, it does seem to linger some. This formula would be excellent non-scented. Note: the primer and the BB cream appear to both have the same scent

review: I've never tried this brand before, but I was in the market for a new toner and saw all the good reviews. This toner is awesome! My new face wash was a little stripping, but this toner does a great job moisturizing my skin. Would highly recommend!

productName: On MadeCera Cream Double Essence Toner
review: I‚Äôm currently on my third bottle and I‚Äôll probably keep repurchasing this. I have dry, sensitive, acne-prone skin. I have had no breakouts whatsoever!! It‚Äôs hydrating on its own, but use it with the moisturizer and you‚Äôll never want to use another toner-moisturizer combo again. It has a light floral sweet scent, but my skin hasn‚Äôt reacted to it which is such a bonus. I wish they still had the travel kit for MadeCera though. I‚Äôve been traveling a lot and I want to take the products with me without taking up so much space. Please bring it back!!

productName: On MadeCera Cream Double Essence Toner
review: I love bi-phase formulas and this toner is no exception, instantly soothing, moisturizing, and plumps skin with consistent use

productName: On MadeCera Cream Double Essence Toner
review: This Combo Toner leaves my skin Feeling Balanced and Hydrated! and GLOWING!

productName: On MadeCera Cream Double Essence Toner
review: Nice scent, gave me smooth skin, amd removed blackheads. Definitely going to buy again

productName: On MadeCera Cream Double Essence Toner
review: I've been using this for about a year. It is very hydrating and feels good when applied. I have mature skin and feel this is a great choice for someone who needs the extra skin hydration

productName: On MadeCera Cream Double Essence Toner
review: This is a great moisturizing toner. Love the way it smells and feels

productName: On MadeCera Cream Mild Whipped Cleanser
review: I have been using this every night for the past two months. I just need a bit at a time and it does a great job cleansing my skin (I don't wear make-up). My skin doesn't feel tight or dry afterwards, it doesn't strip my skin of moisture. Going to repurchase.

productName: On MadeCera Cream Mild Whipped Cleanser
reviewTitles: Gave madecera line another try, another disappointment
review: So my mom and I are OBSESSED with the Madecera moisturizer. We cannot live without it and she makes me buy 4-5 during the Soko Glam Sale. Therefore, I've given all the other Madecera items a try and I have been disappointed. This moisturizer foams up a lot and the texture is nice, but it completely strips your skin of oils. Afterwards my skin felt so uncomfortable, like I had washed my face with cheap bar soap! I've never used such an offensive cleanser in my life, even for drugstore products! This is the worst product I have ever purchased on Soko Glam ever. I am a VIP Premier member who has never returned anything at Soko Glam. I looked at the Return Policy and you have to pay $10 return shipping..... for a $15 product? Extremely disappointed in this product and Soko Glam's return policy.

productName: On MadeCera Cream Mild Whipped Cleanser
review: Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error and I‚Äôm sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

productName: On MadeCera Cream Mild Whipped Cleanser
review: I received this product purely by chance, and I have no regrets! I love the amount of slip and lather. I notice the smell may be vital for people sensitive to fragrance. I've used this foam cleanser without using a cleansing balm, and it removes stubborn makeup. I TRULY enjoyed this product, and you don't need a lot of products to cover your entire face.

productName: On MadeCera Cream Mild Whipped Cleanser
review: I really like the silky feel of this one, and I‚Äôm glad I read the reviews before use because yes, a little goes a long way. If you feel like it‚Äôs drying you out, try using a little less before giving up. I like the smell, it‚Äôs like a fresh out of the shower clean smell and it gives a nice lather. Most importantly, it doesn‚Äôt sting or irritate my sensitive skin at all!

productName: On MadeCera Cream Mild Whipped Cleanser
reviewTitles: Can't wait til it's back in stock!
review: I had such an amazing experience with this cleanser. I initially got a trial size, then ordered a full size and then left my full size at a hotel while I was traveling. I use a tiny, tiny amount and I love it so much. The texture is creamy and as long as I use a tiny bit, it isn't drying at all. I also think it is a really good value considering you don't need a lot. I have very dry cheeks and oily t-zone so I start at my t-zone with my washing and then I use less on the dry area.

productName: On MadeCera Cream Mild Whipped Cleanser
review: I enjoy using this cleanser. A little goes such a long way. It helped get my makeup off completely after a long day of work.

productName: On MadeCera Cream Mild Whipped Cleanser
review: I got this as a free item and tried it out. A little goes a long way! However it is a bit drying for my skin so I use this as a backup cleaner if I run out of my others ^^

reviewTitles: Best new add to my routine
review: I love that this is a soothing acne and sebum control treatment that I can use daily without drying. My skin loves it and is cleaning up after consistent use.
My favorite thing is the smell, such a natural and refreshing scent to begin my skin care routine.
My skin has NEVER done this. Smooth, perfectly hydrated, and not breaking out anymore. Def going to be a regular purchase for me!
Still waiting to see how this product works, but so far it feels fresh after initial use!

This ampoule always makes my skin feel very fresh and clean after using. It's not drying at all and adds a nice layer of moisture to my skin. It's also a great value for the money since you don't need a lot and it comes in such a large container.

productName: On MadeCera Pink Aloe Builder Pads
review: I am still playing around with where exactly I use this in my routine (after cleansing, or toner? If I use a mask, before or after?) but I really like the addition of a pad-based product in my routine. I think since I started skincare as a young teenager with Noxzema pads, I really dig the feeling of sweeping this over my skin. It‚Äôs fragrance is a very light, clean scent. It hydrates well too, and I love the flip top lid rather than a screw top.

productName: On MadeCera Pink Aloe Builder Pads
review: These pages are so good at calming and balancing my skin. I will reorder these and that's alot bc I am a skincare junkie and want to buy every new product or there. If I'm buying something I already bought, I know it's good!

productName: On MadeCera Pink Aloe Builder Pads
review: These are great. They are hydrating yet with ingredients that treat acne, discoloration and texture. So gentle yet effective.

productName: On MadeCera Pink Aloe Builder Pads
review: These are awesome! They work as a light cleanser if you don't need to rid yourself of any layers of makeup or sunscreen, and/or a toner pad if you use the lightly textured side. They are so full of moisture though that even with the salicylic acid they can be used as an essence pad or left on for a few minutes as a mask. They are good for travel too as there isn't really extra liquid to spill out in a bag or anything and the jar is a flip-top lid (it screws off too but this way you don't lose it or drop it on a dirty floor).
This is what a real essence feels like, literally the best thing.
I just bought my second bottle of this toner, and I really love it. It makes my skin feel dewy, even, and moisturized.

I've been using this daily in the morning since I received it a few weeks ago. It hasn't made me breakout, but I'm not sure it's really doing anything either. I thought it would be more moisturizing than it is for me. My skin is sensitive and tends to be dry in places during the winter. I've been having an issue with products creating redness and this doesn't do that. I'm just not sure if it really is a product I needed in my skincare routine. I agree with another reviewer that sometimes it feels like it wants to pill when applying. A little does go a long way. So if this product works well for you it is worth it.
I love how simple the ingredient list is
Def hydrates my skin and feels good going on. Absorbs nicely but has a slightly strange texture (sort of pill-y) sometimes.

I first learned of this cream as a sample I got from an earlier Soko Glam purchase, and I'm so thankful that I did! This rich, beautifully baby-blue cream is extremely nourishing and comforting on my skin. As I write this, I've been dealing with a cold, windy, harsh winter here in Minnesota and my skin has been incredibly dry, tight and red. A layer of this cream takes care of all of my winter-woes! I personally like to use it as the last step in my routine, as a more occlusive nighttime moisturizer - however I have been having luck here in the winter time whilst using this during the day as needed, too. It has a very light (almost nonexistent) fresh fragrance, and a very thick cream consistency. I generally am very sensitive and prone to redness and have never had an issue or reaction with this cream. I highly recommend!

Though I bought this for the winter time, I used it until the summer. It worked great until the warmer months, when I started to break out more. When I first started to use it, it was great to put on before bed and feel refreshed.
Lovely moisturiser with a low scent level and absorbs quickly. Great for hydrating my sensitive, combination skin and calms my breakouts quickly. A repeat buy for me!

When the weather starts to get dry, I swap out my lighter lotion to this cream. Thick without feeling heavy, it absorbs nicely and keeps a thin layer on my skin which helps protect against the wind and cold. The ingredients also fight off any redness that might come on from the wind and soothes the skin. My partner notices a big difference too with their dry skin, healing some problem areas and making it stronger. Just a key staple in my skincare collection!

If redness and irritation is one of your main concerns, this is a must-buy. It‚Äôs a great night time gel-cream. Absolutely love the cool blue color. A similar product that is more lightweight is Dermatory cica gel cream ‚Äî also a must-buy product.

I use this most nights and my skin barrier seems much happier than with other products I've tried
Great at hydrating irritated/sensitive skin.
Great product. Wish it was slightly more hydrating but I just apply a hydrating serum before using the cream.

I continue to buy this cream. For me. For my friends. Anyone honestly. Not only does it do wonders for my face. And doesn‚Äôt have a scent (I have very sensitive skin). It‚Äôs just amazing. My face gets extremely dried out. I‚Äôm the chick who tries to be consistent but ya. I get depressed. & skip the self care. I go out and fall asleep with my makeup on. And when it gets real bad. I cleanse my face, use toner and then put this on before bed.. my face feels so much better the next day. No dry patches that show in my makeup. I have bought this for two of my girlfriends. One of them went to Hawaii got super sunburnt. Nothing worked so she put this cream on her thigh just to see if it would help. Next morning the burn was gone. Overall?! This is a staple. And my friends love it. My favorite night cream by far
Very hydrating, very light feeling on your face, and not sticky feeling after application. The texture is kind of jelly like and the color is pretty
Favorite brands compared to others
These are the only patches I use!

Man, these little guys work hard! I was hesitant to pay more than $2 per patch, but I knew that the patches with micropoints were better than patches without, so I thought I'd give them a try. Boy, am I glad I did! Whenever I feel a cycstic pimple starting to bloom, I slap one of these guys on there, and it kills it within a day. I've had two pimples go from red, irritated, and painful, to deflated and painless literally overnight. Plus, when you apply the patches, you can feel the micropoints penetrating those first couple layers of skin -- I know that probably won't excite everyone, but I love it!

reviewTitles: Worked Like normal Patches just hard to use
review: If you have raised pores or pimples on the rise these work like the pimple patches. It works really well and I love using them but the application is a struggle. It is hard to peel from the plastic and if it touches itself you'll never be able to pull it apart for it to be flat again... The shape to is a bit awkward for my nose shape. Overall though I do like, I just wish it was easier to put on without risking ruining it.

there was barely any goop on the mask after 6hrs, don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs that‚Äôs good bc i don‚Äôt have clogged pores or bad if it didn‚Äôt work correctly, lol. either way i rather have these on hand then not.

For a while I've wanted a patch that covers a larger area on my chin for when I get lots of small breakouts so it's nice to finally have this although depending on the angle I stick it on my face, it doesn't always stay on through the night.

This product lasted forever! I got this in a vegan gift set a while back and you definitely get your money's worth. I love that it's vegan and cruelty free and it gets the job done! I have sensitive skin and this never broke me out or irritated my skin. Its not super harsh like some cleansers I've tried, and it helped clear up my acne a little! This is a great all around cleanser, especially if you're looking to save some money, or invest more into other steps in your routine. It has a lovely mild scent and is so refreshing. It's definitely worth trying out for yourself!
Its a pretty good price for how much product you get! Definitely worth your money however i won't buy it since it's pretty drying to my combo skin.

It smells a bit weird to me but the scent doesn‚Äôt linger too long. It leaves my skin feeling fresh and clean! I mostly used it on my face but I‚Äôve also used it on my body and it felt just as great! I would definitely repurchase this one!
I love this face wash. It is gentle on my skin while making me feel clean and refreshed. I use it as both my day and night wash.
Went thru many cleansers but this one is honestly the best!!!! And will definitely purchase a second bottle.

I have super oily skin in some spots and I thought this cleanser was going to be strip my skin really bad. Initially after washing, my skin felt tight but once I continued on with my routine, everything absorbed really nicely and it felt hydrated. Really foaming and always seemed to get into my mouth and eyes.

reviewTitles: I lucked out again with loving another product!
review: I recently purchased this. I wanted a deep clean that left my skin soft and supple and looking smooth without the tight feeling you can get with deep cleaning products and this is definitely what I wanted! I think I have a new favorite deep cleaning cleanser! I purchased this after reading the details and I must admit I like the nameüòä

I was looking for a vegan/cruelty-free cleanser because I ran out of my oldies and bought this. I have sensitive and acne-prone skin and this cleanser does a good job of washing my face without being harsh and without leaving squeaky/stripped skin. the scent it gives off slightly bothered me but I got used to it. overall so great!!

I'm not sure about the cleanser and I don't know if I'll be buying again. I might save it to use during the summer months because it is a little drying for me right now, but it hasn't wowed me yet either. It hasn't made my face red, which is an issue I have with other water cleansers. A little does go a long way, you barely need any to wash your face and neck. So if this cleanser works for you it is definitely a good value. It has a very light sent and washes off easily. I have sensitive combo skin.

I use this in the summer months but my daughter has started breaking out and this really helps keep her skin clear. It rinses off really well and leaves your face super clean. It‚Äôs also really gentle on your face; highly recommend!
It's a nice cream but it's heavy feeling and it has broke me out with acne and the smell stays with you for a long time my face feels oily after I use it but a small amount does go along way

reviewTitles: This formula helps keep my skin bright and even
review: Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I‚Äôm sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

I first tried this moisturizer when I was a teenager experiencing dry skin for the first time. It was the middle of winter and I never felt my skin so dry before. I picked up a jar and my skin was instantly better afterwards. Decided to pick it up again as my skin gets drier and drier, and I fell in love all over again. Great product!
This moisturizer was great during the summer months, and absorbs so nicely making the skin feel bouncy and fresh. Will keeps this on my list for next summer!

I never really heard for an emulsion before, but I love using it in place of a moisturizer during the warmer months and underneath my moisturizer during the colder months. My skin feels noticeably bouncer and healthier after I use it, and it just soaks it so quickly. Love it!
This moisturizer is great if you're looking for something simple, inexpensive and effective. I have pretty normal skin with no big concerns and it keeps me feeling moisturized and lightweight.
I use this after my snail mucin and it makes my face so moisturized and dewy fresh feeling.

I have dry, sensitive skin. Heavier products tend to make me break out. This is a very light weight lotion and it doesn‚Äôt make me break out - something I appreciate very much - but I also don‚Äôt find that it does anything other than exist on my face, and make my face smell like a bouquet of flowers. Others mentioned the scent and I agree, it is very strong. I don‚Äôt find it unpleasant; it‚Äôs more like an intense bouquet of flowers, but that‚Äôs about all it‚Äôs got going for it.

review: I have tried a few different serums since being introduced to skin care routines 2 years ago, but this is the product I keep going back to.

productName: On Moisture Boost Cooling Marine Concentrate Serum
review: This is one of the best serums I‚Äôve tried. It‚Äôs so calming on my skin and it the added boost I need in the winter.

productName: On Moisture Boost Cooling Marine Concentrate Serum
review: I probably purchased this based off the cute packaging alone. It was soothing but I had an allergic reaction to this product so had to stop using.

review: I had a really strange experience with this cleanser. It produced absolutely no foam, so I was just rubbing cold gel onto my skin. Trying to rinse it off was also a strange experience. Ended up giving this away after trying it once.

productName: On Moisture Boost Gel To Water Morning Cleanser

review: This cleanser is good for the dry fall and winter season since it's not too stripping. However during the summer months it's a bit too gentle for my oily skin. I love all Leaders sheet masks and this one did not disappoint. Your skin will thank you after one use; highly recommend!!!

I love sheet masks and have purchased many throughout the years, this one however isn't quite doing it. It's a little bit of a hassle to untangle the mask from the protective layers its encased in (not to mention wasteful). I'm confused why the mask is encased in so many layers because I didn't find it particularly hydrating at all. The mask didn't fit well, and actually stung my face and I'm usually not irritated by anything. There's so many other great sheet masks on this website, I'd recommend you purchase another instead.
Work well
I have dry sensitive skin and this doesn't irritate it while moisturizing.

reviewTitles: like it but didn't fit properly
review: The mask was very soothing and refreshing but unlike most, it really didn't fit well over my face. The mask was too big for my face and i had trouble keeping it on especially in the nose area

productName: On Moon Glow Milky Toning Lotion
review: I am very picky about how products make my skin "feel", and I have very fair breakout prone skin so it is hard for me to find products I want to stick with. I added this to my routine about two weeks ago and I've been very happy. It has an immediate cooling and soothing sensation and sinks into my skin quickly without feeling dry. I use it in the morning, after rinsing my face. I follow up with a moisturizer and sunscreen. I don't wear foundation or a full face of makeup, but I sometimes used a Fenty pressed powder on my nose and chin, and it sits well on my skin after using this. I haven't had any breakouts or sensitivity from this, and I will keep using it because I like the cooling feeling and I think my moisturizer sinks in well after using this.

productName: On Moon Glow Milky Toning Lotion
reviewTitles: Good but not my holy grail
review: Used the whole bottle and thought that it was nice but not worth a repurchase. Didn't break me out and gave me hydration. There was no crazy difference in my skin after using it though so I would get it if you are extremely sensitive or have a broken skin barrier and need healing.

productName: On Moon Glow Milky Toning Lotion
review: Absolutely love this and really feel like it made a difference in my skin. I have sensitive, acne-prone skin and use this once or twice a day. It's never caused me any irritation and I have noticed a big change in my skin's clarity since using it consistently.

productName: On Moon Glow Milky Toning Lotion
review: I love this. Beautiful glass bottle. A light scent and it‚Äôs giving my skin glowwwwwwwwwww. Very smoothing

productName: On Moon Glow Milky Toning Lotion
review: Our uhra-light and dreamy la exfoliates and smooths, leaving moisturized, and radiant-lite 3.38 fl oz (100 mL)
It is a good balm that leaves your skin clean and moisturized. There is a nice smell but very subtle. Would definitely recommend.

reviewTitles: repurchased 5+ times, it is a holy grail
review: such a good product! removes makeup wonderfully, doesn't strip skin, adds moisture. i have sensitive skin and it is so gentle. Has a light, delightful smell, very fresh!!
Am I taking advantage of this sale OBVI. Stock up, this cleansing balm is by far one of the best ones. Very faint smell and the texture is pleasing. You won‚Äôt regret just do it.

I bought this originally directly from E Nature and now I bought it again from Soko Glam. This stuff smells like heaven and it FEELS like heaven to put on. It's so smooth and soothing. I have acnes prone and sensitive skin and it didn't cause any breakouts or redness.

i liked it as my first cleansing balm but it became a bit unsanitary and messy for me after losing the scoop that it came with.. i do however keep it around for drunk nights when im sloppy with makeup removal and everything is all over the place so that i dont waste cleansing oil lol

Acne prone skin, ended up damaging skin barrier due to new acne treatment, so needed mask that wouldn't further irritate and attack active acne and blackheads, gentle and effective. Didn't cause any further damage and use it once a week. Washes off easily too!
Loved this mask does dry me out a little, but leaves my skin so smooth
good for exfoliating

THISSSS MASK!!! okay I have combination skin, it gets oily through out the day. I also have sensitive skin but this skin doesn't give me any bad reaction or break me out. It actually makes my skin feel so soft and has brightened my red marks on my cheek from pimples and blackheads i've picked at. (BAD IK LOL) I recomend this mask for anybody who has oily and sensitive skin!

You need this! I have dry combo skin and am hesitant using bentonite because of how stripped it tends to leave my face but this mask didn't. After just one use my blackheads are hardly visible and my skin is super clear. Love it!! Can't wait to keep using it.
got rid of almost all of my blackhead

reviewTitles: First Mask and I Love It!
review: It's my first time using any type of mask, and I'm so glad this was my first choice! If you're sensitive to smell, it could be off-putting, but it's moisturizing when you first apply it, after it dries it feels like all the ingredients are soaking into your skin and when you wash it off, my face feels plump and soft! Absolutely recommend this mask!

This mask isn‚Äôt drying like my other masks I have. After washing it off, my skin feels soft and refreshed. This is my first time using the ingredient mugwort on my skin, but I‚Äôm not disappointed. I‚Äôve eaten it before and it gives good benefits for my body, so I know that it‚Äôs also benefiting my skin. The scent is mild and smells herbly which is nice. I always look forward to using this mask in the evenings

I try to use this at least once a week, or if not, when my skin is being more irritable than normal. It's not as drying as the other clay masks I've used, feels good on my skin, and leaves my face looking refreshed, bright, and glowy. I love this product!
I like how this feels on my face when I put it on. However, I feel like it does little for my skin. It also feels like it dries out my skin too much too.
I wasn't expecting much from this little bottle, but I absolutely love the results. Not stripping, and makes my skin feel super soft. Definitely helps to keep my redness minimized.

I was scrolling through Tiktok when I saw a video saying, "If you want to get rid of your textured skin and white/black heads to use a powdered cleanser" it wasn't this exact one but it was a powered cleanser and it was cheap so I bought it on a whim, and it worked great! Its not sudsy and their barley is a fragrance. But for the black heads my problem area (which is my nose) felt smooth. It cleansed my face well it wasn't drying, just normal.
This was a great purchase for me. The bottle was smaller than expected but I love the powder form it comes in and the fact that I did not feel it strip my skin. The lather was nice too.
I would love a larger bottle of this and am very mildly bothered that they don't sell a larger bottle but at least I know to order two at a time now. This one lasted about a month and a half.
ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS!!!!!! I've never seen anything make my face look so calm and clear. I'm buying another right away.
Really liked this mask, makes me want to buy more mugwort products!

reviewTitles: Wish it came as a multipack.
review: This was part of the 10 step skin care routine. I only wish it came with more as a multipack. My skin felt so lush, light, revitalised. If I could give it more than 5 stars, I would. Needs to be available as a multipack.
got a couple of their masks and they're great, calmed my skin down
i always make sure to get these as they are so so soothing and calming on my skin !!!
helped calm my skin down but not a dramatic difference !!
I love it!
Mugwort has really helped lighten the redness and scaring i have from acne and the essence in this was wonderful for that

My first experience with a mugwort sheet mask is the one from I‚Äôm from. My skin hated that sheet mask and it would sting and cause me to feel itchy every time I tried it. Using this sheet mask is my second experience with a mugwort sheet mask and it‚Äôs so much better. I love mugwort for so many reasons and use other mugwort skincare so I‚Äôm glad I can add this to my list of mugwort goodies. It‚Äôs hydrating, naturally cool to the touch so that in itself helped with inflammation. I‚Äôve only used this once so I can‚Äôt completely determine how well this does when my skin is very irritated, but it never irritated me and that‚Äôs a great start. Also there was extra sheet mask juice in the packaging so I used that all over my neck, chest and upper arms (my body drank it up).
Pretty good mask. My skin was super hydrated after. Make sure you exfoliate before using. This serum needs fresh baby skin to penetrate it seems.

This completely changed my skin! I have super sensitive, reactive skin but this product soothed it. I was able to notice a change almost immediately and within a few days the redness and irritation was completely gone. My skin is able to really absorb and retain moisture now. I love it!

I love the cooling effect on my skin and it definitely calms my skin down and makes it softer.

Great results, does exactly what it says it will do. I don't use it nearly as often as recommended, though, because of two reasons. One is the large pieces of crushed plants in the mask are very sensory unfriendly (I'm autistic), but it's bearable if you're careful when rinsing to not get it in your eyes or nose. The other is that it smells awful, I joke when I use it that it's my "pond mud" mask because that's exactly what it smells like to me, a pond or swamp. But again, I'll repurchase this when I run out, because it really does give good results for my sensitive, dry skin.

reviewTitles: Cooling and Soothing for Irritated Skin
review: Pop this mask in the fridge! The cooling effect of the gel is a lifesaver for sensitive skin. I enjoy the herbal smell, but it is strong and may not be for everyone. The mask also has flecks of organic matter which are a bit difficult to rinse off with just water-a gentle wipe with a washcloth will help!

I love the cooling effect of this mask. Especially because I keep it in the fridge it‚Äôs very cool and helps give it a calming effect. I like the way my skin feels afterward. I do not feel dried out or ‚Äústripped.‚Äù I will say I am not fond of the smell, but I think the mask itself is great so I am not deterred.

with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

And I'm just talking inside my house during winter, not taking it with me outside! My guess is that the coconut oil becomes a solid, thus changing the silky smooth feel to a lumpy bumpy one. I‚Äôve been using as a nighttime lip balm, just tap it on and lips stay hydrated all night still slick in the am, thick, would be a bit hesitant to use on my face, I‚Äôm a water gel kinda gal, the convenience of a stick hydration sold me after using a serum stick, no mess and easy use, would be good for cuticle care by bedside

It has a soft, smooth texture that isn‚Äôt sticky or clumpy and feels amazing on the lips. It has little to no smell which I prefer with a lip product since it is so near my nose. It also has such a pretty tint that is buildable - I use this as my primary lip balm and also on top of a lip liner or lipstick as a hydrating glossy lip colour it‚Äôs the perfect shade for me. And it is so hydrating for the lips on top of all that. I also love the packaging over a traditional stick balm, pot, or doe foot applicator as it stays clean and is easy to use on the go and won‚Äôt mix with a lipstick if you use it on top of makeup. It‚Äôs the perfect lip balm!
Beautiful texture, hydrating and love how well the color compliments my complexion. I will be ordering more of this lip balm in this and the other colors.

Every other gel cream I tried are better than regular face creams, but still made my face look kind of greasy. This gel cream moisturizes my face, and this is the only gel cream I‚Äôve tried that doesn‚Äôt make me look greasy and oily afterwards. And it‚Äôs fragrance free, so that‚Äôs a plus! I don‚Äôt know if I would recommend this to people with dry or even normal skin, but I would definitely recommend to people with oily skin like mine. This is my new go to for gel creams!

i always come back to this product as it has saved my skin over and over again !

reviewTitles: incredibly gentle, crazy effective, one-step makeup remover and cleanser
review: i gotta say i was skeptical when this didn't feel like your typical cleanser or makeup remover jelly (I had bought Plenaire's before this, and it's fine but this is infinity times better). My tip for using Night Off is water makes all the difference - the consistency goes from being pretty thick and not very jelly-ish to slippery with minor suds. it takes ALL the makeup off with zero to minimal rubbing (and you really only need to rub if like me you like to wear triple coat mascara & tightlined eyeliner). I couldn‚Äôt believe it - the only time i‚Äôve had makeup come off this easily was with Clean it Zero but Night Off is less oily and actually cleanses (ie not just taking makeup off). I really love this stuff, i‚Äôm saving so much money and time relative to my old cleansing routine. i‚Äôve been using for ~2wks now and can safely say i‚Äôm never going back.

and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

productName: On Order of the Eclipse Hyaluronic Cream

productName: On Plant-Rich Antioxidant Pore Cleansing Oil
review: I was in the market for a new face wash and decided to take a chance on this one, and I'm glad I did. Not only is the price point decent, but you also get a good amount in the bottle for what you pay. The pore-cleansing oil feels very silky when you're using it. I tried it two different ways. The first was by taking my makeup off and then washing my face with the cleansing oil. The result was incredible, your face feels silky and smooth, the makeup is cleared from your pores, and you can see how clean your face is, as well as feel it. The second way I cleaned my face was to not remove my makeup first. This way really put the product to the test, but it really works. The pore-cleansing oil makes it look like it melts the makeup off of your face as you're washing it. The results are almost identical. You do get a better cleanse by removing your makeup first. For example, stubborn mascara, things like that. But if you're just too lazy or not feeling well, you can still wash your face with just the cleansing oil, and it will still take it off. You might just have to use an extra pump of the face wash. Personally, I think that's pretty impressive when other face washes I've tried can't even do that.
