review: Props to Soko Glam for this lovely toner!! The cleanser was sold out and I can't wait to get that too. I love the smell of this. There's no way to describe the smell properly, but it has a natural and unique smell, similar only to a couple high end Korean products I've used. Fabulous! It goes into the skin easily and I love it!

productName: On Prime Time Refining Toning Essence
review: Effective toner
Like this product

I got this to help repair my skin barrier after I had to use steroids on my face for eczema, and used it in combination with the relief cream. It definitely helped keep the skin hydrated but once they did the job it wasn‚Äôt comfortable enough to keep using daily anymore. It started to feel sticky and heavy. I had to switch to something lighter. It did it‚Äôs job and now we must part ways lol What ended up heavy for me daily may be the moisture someone‚Äôs regularly dry skin needs!
(I wish I mentioned all that in my review of the cream for perspective, sorry sokoglam)

Just started using this for the colder fall weather since my skin tends to get drier and it works really well! Keeps my face hydrated and isn‚Äôt sticky either. I use it twice a day and it has made a good difference with my skin. I would definitely buy again for the colder months :)

This product is nice, I like the duel action. It's not sticky. Very lightweight. The product container isn't very friendly for getting the last bit of its contents out of it. It seems like very heavy plastic. For the price point I probably wont buy it again.
Didn't do much for my skin

I originally got this as a sample and omg its amazing. I havent seen anything new with my skin but im sure its working. I feel rejuvenated and supple after putting this on and i love the smell its like bubble gum to me. I love the jelly texture. Im planning to buy a full size and use it as my nightime routine since i have dry skin i wouldnt wear this during the day or else i will feel dry thru the day

Love this product! I originally got it as a free sample then ordered the full size. It worked well to moisturize my face. I suffer from dry area around my lips and this has helped significantly. It also smells amazing! The scent is not overpowering. I will definitely keep using this product.
Leaves my face glowing, and I loved the light essence.
This makes my sensitive skin feel so great. My eczema responds really well to it. My mother in law tried mine and loved it, so I bought it for her birthday and she's loved it!

I enjoyed this product, it was lightweight, had a cooling, refreshing feel to it and great for the summer. It unfortunately doesn‚Äôt do enough for the dryer months but I will definitely want to revisit this product come June.

reviewTitles: What I didn‚Äôt like, someone else might
review: I used the whole jar, but I didn‚Äôt enjoy it personally. I really wanted to like this one but it‚Äôs just too sticky for my taste, made it feel heavy and wouldn‚Äôt let me forget it was there all day. It definitely sounds like it does great things so I feel like I‚Äôm missing out, plus it never bothered my sensitive skin or left it dry. Just not for me, but I‚Äôm sure someone else‚Äôs skin may love it! What‚Äôs heavy feeling for me may be the amount of moisture someone else‚Äôs dry skin needs

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I‚Äôm sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

productName: On Professional Repairing Hair Perfume Serum
review: I liked this hair perfume. It works well on hair, just make sure to rub your hair after you spray this hair mist. It will be more effective.

productName: On Professional Repairing Hair Perfume Serum
review: Smells good

productName: On Professional Repairing Hair Perfume Serum
review: Love this hair perfume, smells lovely and is the right amount of scent. Works wonders when I don't wash my hair everyday :) Not sure why reviews are not great, I love this product.

productName: On Professional Repairing Hair Perfume Serum
reviewTitles: A Lovely Hair Serum for Shine
review: I tried the D'Alba Professional Repairing Hair Perfume Serum as an impulse purchase. I've had natural dread locs over 20 years and I love discovering new products to use. This serum is mediocre. It's always a risk buying something with a fragrance and this purchase was no exception. It was a very strong artificial fragrance and I tend more to essential oil and natural fragrances. This would be better for someone with a different hair type. I'm of mixed ancestry and my dominant ethnicity is Black and I have that textured hair. It didn't add much shine either that I could see but locs are different than straight hair or curls. If you like perfume-y hair, this is for you.
Good texture, smells great, rinses clean. I have dry skin and only use cleansing oils. I love it!
I love it

reviewTitles: Do NOT buy if you have sensitive skin
review: Despite the review saying "Ma:nyo Factory is widely beloved for their gentle yet ultra-effective formulas." if you have sensitive skin I would definitely avoid this product as it was anything but gentle. This product at least for me caused fairly severe irritation the moment it was applied, and I've used cleansing balms & oils for 5+ years, so I was definitely surprised as it's a fairly well known cult favourite product that I was excited to try. Even the morning after my skin is red and inflammed.....upon taking a closer look at the ingredients I think the cause was the orange oil (a common trigger ingredient for sensitive skin types)
and we will be happy to get you all sorted!
The absolute best! Makes your skin feel so clean. Might be too drying for some, but the right after products used it is definitely worth the buy!

reviewTitles: Left my skin tight and dry
review: I was looking forward to using this cleansing oil, but it unfortunately made my skin tight and dry after washing it off. I thought that was odd since it's an oil cleanser, but after a giving it a couple more tries, I learned oil cleansers CAN dry my skin out!! 2 stars are for the consistency of the oil (more thin than thick) and pump packaging (not having to scoop it out like I would a cleansing balm is definitely more sanitary and convenient). Now on to repairing my skin barrier :)

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error and I‚Äôm sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

I love to double cleanse and this oil makes it easy to do. It is light yet effective in removing all the city grime and makeup. A beautiful texture and barely there scent. I then follow with my cream cleanser.

reviewTitles: First and Only Cleansing Oil I will Ever Use
review: I am a skin care junkie, but this cleansing oil is so amazing that I tried it once two years ago, and have never used another oil cleanser since. It is so gentle. The packaging is also amazing, which makes it easy to bring on trips with me.

productName: On Pure Fit Cica Calming True Sheet Mask
review: A great mask for calming the skin. Does just what it says!

productName: On Pure Fit Cica Calming True Sheet Mask
review: Good for sensitive skin

productName: On Pure Fit Cica Calming True Sheet Mask
review: I like the way this sheet mask feels on my skin.

productName: On Pure Fit Cica Calming True Sheet Mask
review: My skin feels soft

productName: On Pure Fit Cica Calming True Sheet Mask
review: Calms any redness and irritated I have

productName: On Pure Fit Cica Clear Cleansing Oil
review: I cannot believe it took me this long to find out about cosrx. Nice gentle cleanser. I've been so conditioned to use foamy cleaners that have been stripping my skin for so long. I have mature normal skin and I enjoy this cleaner, my face doesn't have the tight feeling when I wash it off

productName: On Pure Fit Cica Clear Cleansing Oil
review: does not makes my skin dry

productName: On Pure Fit Cica Clear Cleansing Oil
review: I recieved the cleansing oil. Upon use of the pump, it leaks out the sides and not through the tip. I've had to transfer it to a different bottle. I have not used often since it is difficult to use with the current bottle.

productName: On Pure Fit Cica Clear Cleansing Oil
review: I normally use the Cica Cleansing Balm for the first step of my double cleanse, but the balm has been out of stock. I got this cleansing oil to temporarily replace the cleansing balm, however, I actually like this better than the balm. I believe that the citrus oils in this oil cleanser are making my face look brighter, smoother, and clearer. The texture is not as 'slippery' as the cleansing balm (which is obviously thicker), but it is nonetheless effective in getting my face clean without stripping it. I also love the smell. All I need is one full pump to get a good cleanse, which makes this very cost effective. I follow up with the Cica Cleanser; truly a perfect pair for my oily/sensitive/acne prone skin.

productName: On Pure Fit Cica Clear Cleansing Oil
review: Address was redirected to incorrect zip code due to google map shipping system. I wasn‚Äôt guaranteed delivery and canceled order.

productName: On Pure Fit Cica Cream Intense
review: I absolutely adore this cream, I need a LOT of hydration for my skin and this one does the job. It leave a light greasy feeling that is quite normal for this level of hydration but I don't mind, my skin thank me when I use it!!!

productName: On Pure Fit Cica Cream Intense
review: I have Rosacea and Cosrx product really improved my control over it and give me nice skin. I need a lot of hydration!

productName: On Pure Fit Cica Cream Intense
review: I love this cream. it is rich and absorbs really well.
I finished this container off, but I don't think I would purchase again. It's softening and a bit soothing, but I didn't find that it did enough for my skin for me to purchase again.
gave it another chance and it was actually pretty nice !!! did not dry my skin out like most clay masks
the mask is good as a clay mask that doesn‚Äôt strip my already dry skin, however, I feel as though this mask does not have a big effect on my skin in general, even after using it for a while.
it‚Äôs so great for the skin and love love the ingredients !! see amazing results everytime
Super good for my skin. I have combination skin and this purple plant cream mask does amazing for my skin!

reviewTitles: Okay but the moisturizer was greasy
review: I like the kit overall but not a huge fan of the moisturizer's greasy after-feel.

I liked everything I used in the set and it was a great way to explore different brands and products. I usually don't like sets because products can be a hit or miss but I used everything without any irritation. I have normal skin so can't really expect any improvement. These products have helped maintain my skin nicely.

This is a great product when you are trying to start somewhere, out of all of the products the moisturizer is my favorite. It was lightweight despite its appearance (which I was very wary of at first) and feels so refreshing and gives that dewy look as well as prime moisturization. I've struggled with finding a lightweight good moisturizer but this is a life-changer. I have dry skin mostly and this absolutely saved my face. I like how nothing is very overly scented, I don't like heavily scented skincare products so this was perfect for me! The serum really did help my skin with redness and irritation, especially on my cheeks I notice it clearing up after using a multitude of products that don't work. If you are looking for hydration and dewy skin this is for you!
Falling in love with my skin a little more everyday ‚ù£Ô∏è

I left a review on each products! This set is great for simple steps. All items really made a difference on my skin. It helped with my breakouts and oils. I have combo skin and this set was perfect! The cleanser and toner were perfect and my favorite out of the bunch!
The love these set.Its perfect for my sensitive skin .I will definitely buy these again

This set absolutely saved my skin. My skin had been breaking out terribly after using a drugstore toner and I had acne all over my forehead and chin. This set has brought so much hydration, bounce, and clarity to my skin. A month later and I only have like two marks left from my terrible quarantine mishap. So much more soft, hydrated, and clear. Can‚Äôt imagine a better set. I will be buying again. (Also double cleansing is a must and never knew the power of it until now).

reviewTitles: Awesome Kit for a Skincare Newbie
review: I love this set! All of the products are high quality and are easy to use. All of the products have directions in English (if not on the product itself, at least on the box). I am brand new to skincare and feel empowered to start a routine with these affordable, high quality products.
So far so good!
Great starter skin set for beginners!
I love it. My skin is so soft.

the only two items that don't work for me are the cica cream and foaming cleanser. the cleanser is a bit drying and would leave my face feeling very tight and with a slight stinging sensation. the cica cream is very interesting and I think along with the sunscreen I was using, helped make my face very mad at me; it was very moisturizing for me.
-sensitive and dry-
What else can I say? Well worth the money. This is an absolute repurchase
I ordered this as a gift for a family member who wanted to try K-beauty. She loved it so much that she's requested I re-order it for her!
New favorite cleansing balm! It‚Äôs gentle, effective, and has no scent.

I switched from using oil cleansers to cleansing balms for travel purposes (the oil cleansers would always leak/spill when I took them on trips), and this Beauty of Joseon balms is one of my favorites. Feels very luxurious and a small scoop goes a long way. I'll swap between this and one of the Banila Co balms (enjoy them all)!

This is one of the best cleansing balms I've ever tried and it is at a very reasonable price. My daily cleansing balm was from Banila Co, and though it did the job, it would leave a film on my eyes and dry out my skin a bit. The BOJ balm takes all of my makeup off without stripping my skin and it does not leave a film on my eyes when I'm taking off mascara. There is no strong fragrance or bad taste (cleans my lipstick). It is a very simple, effective, and gentle cleaner that I will definitely be repurchasing. I still will always use a water-based cleanser as a second step in my routine, but my skin does not feel irritated or dry/itchy with this cleansing balm.
Smooth, cleanses dirt oil & make up easily & leaves skin so soft
Does not make my skin feel dry, removes a full face of makeup, and doesn‚Äôt leave those weird films on my face that some oil and balm cleansers do.
Great value for money, small amount goes a long way

I had tried this oil cleanser several years ago before it was reformulated and liked it, but this new version does not agree with my skin. My skin instantly turned a deep red when I applied and it stayed red for a while after removing it. My skin felt extremely dry and tight. I love Soko Glam though, they have an amazing return policy which allows me to try different products. My skin is very reactive and sensitive these days so it's been hard finding a balance.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I‚Äôm sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

I have dry and sensitive skin with a number of allergies (including soy), so I was a little apprehensive when I saw that this had a soy derived ingredient in it - soybean ferment extract - while I know that the allergic reaction is triggered by proteins in soy, I was unsure if the proteins made it through that extraction process, or if they would be in a significant enough dose to trigger a reaction. I'm pleased to say that I have had no troubles! I should note that my allergy is moderate (hives and eczema rather than anaphylactic shock, even to expeller-pressed soybean oil). My face is soft and clean and the balm has no drying effect. I miss the smell of the Commleaf Green balm I had been using before, but this one is doing more for my skin, so it wins. It's also way cheaper!
wish it was cheaper but made my skin so bouncy and pretty

reviewTitles: Between a cream and a gel
review: This is somewhat less creamy or oily than most moisturizers, it‚Äôs opaque but more liquid than other moisturizers. Calming for my skin but didn‚Äôt notice major results
it was rlly nice felt lovely beautiful packaging but i‚Äôve had creams like this for much cheaper
This broke me out and made my face so itchy!!! I wanted to return it but then due to their shipping costs I wouldn‚Äôt even get my full money back of what I paid!!

I had dehydrated skin for a long time without realizing it - I always thought it was just dry because dry and dehydrated skin present the same (dry). Dry skin is treated with oil/ceramides, while dehydrated skin needs water. No amount of oil improved my skin's hydration, however this little serum completely changed my skin! My skin is back to a normal water content and is dewy and lovely, and my barrier is restored. This serum is excellent for dehydrated skin - I've tried other water based serums but this is my favorite, I'm on my 5th bottle with no plans of stopping. I highly recommended IF your skin is dehydrated. I've seen a few reviews saying it didn't work for them - could be that they need oil not water. If you feel like your skin is dry but nothing helps, give this serum a try!

I've struggled to find a good serum or ampoule that hydrates my skin without clogging my pores. This doesn't clog my pores resulting in a break out or cystic acne the next morning, but it also is only mildly hydrating. It's thin and watery, and barely feels like I'm adding any additional moisture. Maybe 10%. I'll finish the bottle, but definitely wouldn't repurchase.
Had high hopes for this, but didn't hydrate as much as I would've loved!

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I‚Äôm sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

reviewTitles: Great but don't like the jar
review: I really like this moisturizer, but it comes in a jar that takes a long time to use up. After awhile, it seems not good to use something you've stuck your fingers into repeatedly, even though I airways use clean hands. I wish they'd use one of those vacuum sealed pump type of dispensers so it will stay pure longer.
So light and soft, my skin just drinks this product in and feels great all day!

reviewTitles: Lightweight, watery and good for combo sensitive skin
review: This is definitely a water-based product which is good for oily, combo and sensitive skin types. However, don‚Äôt expect it to be a deep moisturizer by no means. Better for summer months or perhaps more suitable oily skin types who don‚Äôt need a heavy type of cream. It works well without adding any greasiness.

Needed a light but moisturizing lotion. Found it! Not heavy at all. Goes on smooth and my skin feels nice and soft after. I can use it for both my night and morning routines. Night routine I go a little heavier with it. My skin is sometimes sensitive to the texture of products. Not with this one. And don‚Äôt forget the neck, chest and back of hands (I include these areas with my toner, essence, serums and creams. Makes a difference!)

I have been using this moisturizer for over a year and bought multiple times. I needed something that was less of a water cream and slightly thicker. It‚Äôs super light weight and had cleared my skin after a couple weeks of using it. It‚Äôs not fragrant so I see it as a hypoallergenic moisturizer. My skin is sensitive and has broken out with the little of changes. I had attempted a different moisturizer before just for fun and my skin had reacted negatively. Once I returned to this moisturizer I cleared up. This isn‚Äôt a fancy moisturizer but the simplicity of it is great and it works.

productName: On Real Aqua Balancing Stick Cream
review: Perfect for hydrating targeted areas or on-the-go hydration.

productName: On Real Aqua Balancing Stick Cream
review: Leaves a tacky feel to it. Other than that it does what it claims not the best hydration ever, but it‚Äôs okay.

productName: On Real Aqua Balancing Stick Cream
review: This stick is amazing! It glides onto the skin so smoothly, and leaves behind a very slight pleasant cooling sensation. I add it on as the last layer of my daytime skincare routine to lock in all my other products. It also works wonderfully under makeup as a primer!

productName: On Real Aqua Balancing Stick Cream
review: Perfect for an afternoon of wine tasting and not looking like a hag!

productName: On Real Aqua Balancing Stick Cream
review: I keep this moisturizer next to my computer or the tv. I can give my face a little extra dose of moisturizer throughout the day. I even use it on the back of my hands which get really dry. It has a smooth, non-greasy texture and is cool on the skin.. Also great to throw in your purse or take traveling as a primary moisturizer.

productName: On Real Aqua Balancing Stick Cream
review: I'm a nurse and bring this with me to work! If I need to give my skin a bit of hydration during my 12 hour shift, THIS IS IT. So easy and compact and not sticky. soft and smooth!

productName: On Real Aqua Balancing Stick Cream
review: I have dry, sensitive skin with redness issues. This is such a good product! I mostly use this for when my skin needs a hydration boost. It also has a very pleasant cooling effect upon application, which is a plus! I didn't realize how small it is for the price that they're charging; was hoping for a lot more product for this price point. But this is definitely a must for on-the-go moisturizer!

productName: On Real Aqua Balancing Stick Cream
review: I absolutely love this moisturizing stick!!! It's so handy to have during the day while I'm out and about working! I especially love to use it during the winter months! It works so well and always leaved my skin feeling very moist and hydrated!

productName: On Real Aqua Balancing Stick Cream
review: I keep this at work and in between patients I can just place this on my face where I need it to keep feeling clean and hydrated

productName: On Real Aqua Balancing Stick Cream
reviewTitles: OK, not as hydrating as I thought
review: Perhaps I was expecting too much out of this moisturizing stick. I bought it because I was going through a phase of dry, flaking skin due to introduction of acne products and wanted a convenient way to reapply moisturizer. I pulled back on all actives and laid on a thick, basic moisturizer as an initial layer, using the stick to reapply throughout the day.
I love them! My skin feels clean and refreshing. I apply after cleansing my face. I broke with Maskne , this helped.

I love, love love this product!! It really exfoliates without ripping my skin off, or tearing my skin. I‚Äôve only been using this a couple of weeks and I can already see and feel a difference. My skin is clearing up from all the little tiny bumps on my face. I use it on my neck and chest as well. Love ‚ù§Ô∏è this product!!
Loved

This was reccomended to use as an in-between exfoliation treatment for me because i have clogged pores (flesh colored bumps). I saw minimal change to the bumps on my face. I do believe this is because I have very deep pores though and may need something more acidic. It does not have a smell and in very gentle on the skin.

productName: On Real Complexion Hyaluron Exfoliating AHA Treatment
review: Have been using once a week for over 4 months. Exfoliates well but no change to pores yet. Great for maintaining my already soft skin.

productName: On Real Complexion Hyaluron Exfoliating AHA Treatment
review: At first. However, The gentle exfoliation you get from this product is magnificent. You do need to stick with consistent usage of 2 to 3 days per week to see the benefits.

productName: On Real Complexion Hyaluron Exfoliating AHA Treatment
review: I have been using this AHA treatment for about 2 months and love how gentle it is. I use it once or twice a week as recommended and it leaves my skin smooth without irritation. A little also goes a long way so I expect this bottle will last me a year!

productName: On Real Complexion Hyaluron Exfoliating AHA Treatment
review: Ive been using various a anti-aging toners and i think this is my new fav! My skin looks more even and glowy. It does not irritate my skin.

productName: On Real Complexion Hyaluron Exfoliating AHA Treatment
review: Smooths uneven skin texture. Finished my first bottle and realized just how effective this is for my skin while waiting for my second bottle to arrive.

productName: On Real Complexion Hyaluron Eye Serum
reviewTitles: Great for hydration and fine lines
review: This eye serum is fantastic for hydration and fine lines. I keep it in my skincare fridge, so when I apply the eye serum, it's nice and cool. I have been using the serum for the last three months, and during that time, I have found that it has actually gotten rid of 90% of the dark circles under my eyes, making them look much brighter. The only downside that I've found is that for me it doesn't do anything for the puffiness on the days when I don't get enough sleep.

productName: On Real Complexion Hyaluron Eye Serum
review: I‚Äôve never had this kind of applicator before and I have to say I‚Äôm not sure I‚Äôm a fan. I tried this eye serum because I like their moisturizer but I‚Äôm not sure that this is doing anything for me.

productName: On Real Complexion Hyaluron Eye Serum
review: We are so sorry to hear this product did not work out for you. Please reach out to us via e-mail with your order number and we'll be happy to get you all sorted!

productName: On Real Complexion Hyaluron Eye Serum
review: This eye serum works really well for me. I have sensitive skin and a bit of wrinkle on my under eye. After about 3-4 weeks, the skin appeared tighter and smoother. Dark circle also disappear.

productName: On Real Complexion Hyaluron Eye Serum
review: This is a great eye cream

productName: On Real Complexion Hyaluron Eye Serum

review: So far only using for a week and liking it. I like the feeling of the cooling eye roller. Makes me think something is working! Will report back on progress.

productName: On Real Complexion Hyaluron Eye Serum
review: My under eyes look less puffy in the morning. It is a great ‚Äòwake me up‚Äô. Love it!

review: Love using this every morning!

productName: On Real Complexion Hyaluron Moisture Cream
review: Loved the texture, but it isn‚Äôt quite hydrating enough for me. Perhaps better suited for the summer months. It‚Äôs a lightweight cooling and refreshing gel texture, but a more hydrating than your typical gel.

productName: On Real Complexion Hyaluron Moisture Cream
review: It smells like fruity pebbles and it leaves my face feeling luscious!

productName: On Real Complexion Hyaluron Moisture Cream

review: I am so glad I found this! I needed a hydrating final step to my skincare routine, and this fits the bill: Full of moisturizing goodness, but not too heavy. My skin is smooth and hydrated in the morning. I'm a big fan!

productName: On Real Complexion Hyaluron Moisture Cream
review: I have bought this moisturizer over and over again. It is light yet very hydrating, and it does not irritate my sensitive skin.

productName: On Real Complexion Hyaluron Moisture Cream

Unfortunately, this product doesn‚Äôt give me any impression. After cleanser, toner, and serum, I start putting this cream on my face and while massaging, I notice the product doesn‚Äôt absorbed into my skin, instead leaving a clear cast. I feel annoyed whenever touching my face and the clear cast stick to my hand/ fingers. It doesn‚Äôt hydrate my skin as I expected too.

productName: On Real Complexion Hyaluron Moisture Cream
review: Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I‚Äôm sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

I've used this for 1-2 years and actually greatly prefer it over SK II (which I gave away to a friend). It's very calming , moisturizing, and helps plump up my skin. It works very well under sun screen and BB cream.

reviewTitles: Great addition to my skincare routine
review: This essence is awesome, really delivers like all the reviews I read. I like the packaging and the way the product feels when applied.

This essence is singlehandedly brighting my old acne scars! The only reason I've rated it 4/5, is because no matter how many layers I add, it's still not as moisturizing as some other essence/toners I have in my skincare rotation. Otherwise, it's perfect! The glass bottle feels incredible high-end and there's a generous amount of product for the price.
Was a recommended product. Took the advice & happy I did. Hydrates skin well.
I‚Äôve only used it for a couple of days, but so far so good! I feel my complexion is brighter and more hydrated. It doesn‚Äôt smell strong either and I like how it leaves my skin.
It's a nice burst of moister! I haven't been using it long enough to really say if iv seen a difference but it is helping me combat the dry winter. Wish it was 10 dollars cheaper lol

I've been using this as a toner for the past couple months, I do notice that my skin looks plumper after using in and it feels nice on the skin, but there are probably other products for a better price that can do the same
It' does not do any of the things described. Plus, I found it to be a bit irritating.
with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

I‚Äôve had this on my wish list for a while but finally ordered it because there was a sale on the website. It is worth every dime, it helped clear my skin of acne as well as scarring and gave my face an overall plump appearance. Will be ordering a second bottle!
This is great for anyone struggling with moisture. I like stacking it with a moisturizer for an extra boost.
This is a very thick serum, moisturizing. Sometimes if I'm not going anywhere, I skip my moisturizer and just keep this on. Great product .

Love this stuff and my skin does too. It's hydrating enough on it's own during muggy summers and a perfect serum layer during the dry winters. A little goes a long way and it's in a small enough bottle for a carry-on (it has definetly earned it's spot in the travel bag... I can't imagine washing my face without it). Have purchased twice and hope it is never discontinued.

reviewTitles: as good as I thought it would be!
review: I've been using the Real Ferment Micro Essence for years, and decided to give the Toner a try, and I'm glad I did. A very refreshing and smoothing first step after cleansing.
It's an okay toner, I don't hate it but it feels kinda sticky on my skin, I'm not sure why and also i don't too much like the scent either.

I always look forward to this step in my skincare routine. This toner gently wipes away any remaining makeup or dirt from after cleansing. I love the way my skin feels as the toner is drying, it feels like my skin is slightly tightening but in a good way! My face feels clean, hydrated and prepped for my next steps!

This is the first essence I got, months ago, (recommended by James Welsh and Hyram) and it feels very refreshing when applied. So far my face likes it lol and didn't react badly to it, so I'll give it a 4/5 stars. Only because I didn't really see a difference (could also be I was trying different skincare all at once), but still to this day I haven't seen much of a difference. Would still buy it though because it does feel lovely on the skin!

reviewTitles: A new favorite toner to go with my absolute favorite essence and serum!
review: It's wonderful for balancing the skin, preparing it for treatments, removing my spot treatment mask. It gently exfoliates without exacerbating my prescription tretinoin, which I have found to be virtually impossible. Love!
But I don‚Äôt feel like my skin gets any brighter. My licorice toner is still top notch!
Holy grail (but the bottle got smaller)

I absolutely love this one! It‚Äôs so light and hydrating! Water like consistency and barely any scent at all. Perfect for day and night. It does it‚Äôs job by keeping my face bright and hydrated throughout the day. This is one product I‚Äôd like to have year round!!
I immediately saw an improvement in texture and tone of my skin! Smooth, even toned and hydrated skin. Neogen Rocks!
This is definitely making my skin look radiant. I love it!

I've been using this product about twice a week for a couple of months now, and I enjoy it a lot. My skin is smoother and more bouncy. It glows. I like how it dries quickly and doesn't leave a sticky residue behind. Love the purple colour too!
I have very sensitive skin to retinol, just one week and my face tolerates these drops beautifully.

reviewTitles: Not the best for sensitive skin
review: I typically love neogen products, but this was a miss for me. Made my skin breakout. Not sure if it's the ingredients, but I had high hopes for something anti-aging.

Great, gentle formula for getting into retinol. Has a higher percentage of bakuchiol than most other products on the market and still remains gentle. Saw a difference with each use, but wish the smell wasn‚Äôt as strong.

reviewTitles: Feels nice, not sure how effective
review: I liked the way this felt on my skin but I didnt see any major difference it dark spots and fine lines. May need to use for a long period.

I use this probably twice a week because I wanted something a little more gentle on my skin that would make it feel more firm. It definitely worked, although not as good as the retinol I use. However, it is definitely more gentle and feels super soothing so would probably work well for people with sensitive skin.

reviewTitles: No change in the firmness in my skin
review: At the age of 30, it‚Äôs been really hard not to notice the little creases in my face. Was using this product religiously with no change at all. Great for maintaining skin. Hope it can work wonders for others.

productName: On Real Fresh Green Tea Cleansing Oil
review: I am a fan of the SOLVED Coconut Cleansing Pads but have switched over to this cleanser because I started to feel guilty about using so much material for this first step. This oil cleanser is gentle and does a great job dissolving any makeup and/or sunscreen before I use my SOLVED Coconut Foaming Cleanser. The green tea leaves at the bottom is a nice touch. Also, the bottle is a nice size so it takes a while to finish.

productName: On Real Fresh Green Tea Cleansing Oil
review: It‚Äôs been great for double cleansing. I use it before my other cleanser and it helps get all the sunscreen off. It has a very thin consistency, just like an oil.

productName: On Real Fresh Green Tea Cleansing Oil
review: i don‚Äôt like that it has a white film to it and it doesn‚Äôt take off all of my makeup. the smell isn‚Äôt the greatest and it feel like it doesn‚Äôt really do much. i will say it does make your skin feel moisturized right after you use it but that‚Äôs the only thing i like. i really wanted to love this product because i love anything that has green tea in it when it comes to skin care but just couldn‚Äôt with this product.

productName: On Real Fresh Green Tea Cleansing Stick
review: I exfoliate my face every single time I'm in the shower for years. People say that I should stop exfoliating so much and cut back. It took over a decade for me to even try to switch. Now that I've been introduced to this green tea cleansing stick that makes my skin feel clean and smooth, I am extremely satisfied changing up my skin care products and routine.

productName: On Real Fresh Green Tea Cleansing Stick
review: This stick is so handy for travelling and lathers very well. I feel so clean and refreshed after using it.

productName: On Real Fresh Green Tea Cleansing Stick
review: Love this green tea stick cleanser! This is my go-to travel cleanser. Love that it is solid so it doesn't take up valuable liquid space in my carry on. So convenient and easy to use. It works great as a quick double cleanse in the morning and after a workout. It has gentle exfoliation, so it's like a 3 in one! I have normal skin that can get dehydrated but this cleanser leaves my skin clean and soft, not tight or dry. I love it. I will continue buying this. I think it is a wonderful product. My teen daughter loves it too.

productName: On Real Fresh Green Tea Cleansing Stick
review: I use this at home and when I travel. Cleans my face without drying and helps with breakouts. I like to travel with it because it‚Äôs not liquid and won‚Äôt leak.

productName: On Real Fresh Green Tea Cleansing Stick
review: I love that this cleanser is a solid, making it super easy to travel with! This is the second time I've purchased and I think it will be part of my travel routine for a long time. It cleanses well and smells great, but not too strong.
The product really changed my skin, acne, pores and also the scars from previous acne look a lot better. Love this product
I love the consistency of it. I use it intermittently with my vitamin C serum and my skin looks great!

productName: On Real Vita C Powder Lemon
review: ive never used a powder before

productName: On Real Vita C Powder Lemon
review: When mixing this into my toner at night I have found that it makes the toner a little grainy at first unless you sit with it and mix for at least a full minute. While this isn‚Äôt a problem for me, sometimes I just don‚Äôt have time to mix it in all the way so I don‚Äôt use it on those nights. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this to anyone who doesn‚Äôt have a lot of time to spend on a skincare routine, probably it would be easier to use a liquid vitamin c product. However if you have the time, I think it is definitely worth it.

productName: On Real Vita C Powder Lemon
review: i had to be careful while applying this power mixing with lotion or toner, i definitely noticed glow in my skin after using it. I have dry skin so, i applied extra moisturizer while using this.

productName: On Real Vita C Powder Lemon
review: I didn't see a huge difference on my skin with this. I thought this would work based on all the good reviews, but after I tried a liquid vitamin c serum, I found the liquid vitamin c more effective. Maybe because the powder doesn't really melt even after combining it with a toner, so your skin doesn't absorb it as much. I have sensitive combo skin, acne prone, and my scars heal pretty slow. Maybe the results are quicker for other skin types.
Nice packaging for the product, in a glass bottle. So far my skin seems to be getting even after a few weeks use.

So, in response to the review that said it turned their skin brown, that happened to me when I attempted to use an old one that had been almost gone for a few weeks and just wanted to see if there was anything left in there. So it was probably a singular product defect. I use this stuff religiously on my hormonal and cystic acne in the am instead of makeup (sometimes i follow w colour pop powder) and it never breaks me out, looks natural, and goes on smooth! I‚Äôll never wear makeup agin after discovering this product.

I was so excited to try this. I haven't worn foundation or concealer since the start of the pandemic... which has done wonders for my skin. BUT! I also have really sensitive skin, so I have quite a bit of redness. I saw this and was hoping it was a much more affordable version of Dr Jarts green tiger balm. Guys this stuff is tinted, and supposedly adjusts to your skin tone. LOL. I'm the color of mayonnaise and like it that way so this stuff literally turned into a brown patch on me. Sooooo disappointing. :( Gonna give it away to a tan friend.
Love this stuff, but the bottle is TINY. Would wait for another sale to repurchase (but I do like it enough to repurchase.)

I've only used the Rescue Balm for two days (twice a day) on a couple of persistent red spots that have been lingering post-breakout. I can already notice a difference. The balm feels nourishing, a little heavy for daytime wear so I put more on at night.

reviewTitles: made red spots all over my face
review: bought it and used it only once - after the night I woke up and saw that it made my face red like spots...
not gonna try using it again

reviewTitles: If I could give this product zero stars I would. Waste of money
review: Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I‚Äôm sorry to hear about your reaction to this product. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

it's aite. don't think i've had it long enough for it to have an effect yet though. my acne scars are still visible and I haven't noticed anything different. although, i haven't had any major breakouts, i think it's too soon to tell.
fyi i also have the snail bee ultimate serum and i apply cerave spf 50 everyday.

I love the scent from this moisturiser. It does what it's supposed to and incredibly moisturises my skin however does leave a slightly oily finish. I don't know if that's because of my skin type. Might be trying a different moisturiser next. The tube also came to me 3/4 full, which was disappointing.

I‚Äôm always on the look-out for my next go-to moisturizer, and this one will never leave my collection! You really can‚Äôt go wrong with this moisturizer. You can feel the hydration and it working as soon as you apply it, but its not heavy. Would definitely recommend!

I'm only a few weeks with this cream and have been using it as a day moisturizer. It smells so good (I know many are averse to fragrance for allergen reasons, but I have very sensitive skin and this seems so be so gentle and not bothersome so far) and is incredibly soothing to apply. It also absorbs well- I put it on after cleansing and toning, and then follow with neogen sunscreen and a ccc cream from CLE. Altogether it gives my skin a dewy and supple look, and helps fight the dry air of New England winter. I recommend for anyone with dry skin who doesn't have to worry about fragrance!

Im on my second tube of this. Very lightly fragranted! It‚Äôs a very moisturizing gel/cream that doesn‚Äôt make me feel oily. It sinks in very well and just feels lovely! I have sensitive skin and this does not make me break out.
I have dry skin and in the winter my face would flake and get red everywhere. Starting this I can say my skin is no longer those thing but soft.
Goes on smooth and doesn't feel oily or thick. Rich and creamy, doesn't take much to moisturize. Love it!
Doesn't feel very strong and not seeing a big difference in my skin. I just started getting dryness and wrinkles around my forehead and this cream isn't helping that much.

I used it only 1 night and the next morning woke up with terrible acne on my forehead, cheeks, and chin. And it's been weeks trying to clear them up...since I'm older and the cellular turn over is so slow.

Before I start the guts of my review, I should preface that I am 24 years old, with acne prone and combination skin. My skin is not very sensitive, and I did not use this product in my face, and I use prescription adapalene gel for my acne and I was sent this product free in an exchange for a review by Sokoglam.

reviewTitles: It's so great to have pure 0.1% retinol
review: Now, I used this product on my neck nightly since first getting this product. Now, I normally wouldn‚Äôt use a retinal right away nightly, and I would space out and ladder up my applications in time, but since I carry most of my skin care down to my neck, I felt comfortable with the frequent application. I find the product itself to be thicker than expected, but easily spreadable. It had a yellow hue and an interesting scent to it, but it is not unpleasant. I like to use this before I put my normal moisturizer over my neck. I‚Äôm the two month since using this product, I have noticed a reduction in hyperpigmentation from past acne and the fading of past acne scars. I find this product mixes well with most of my other skin care products, other than certain actives, like BHA. (I would not normally recommend or use Retinal or BHA together in a routine, but for the sake of the review I did for a few times) I would recommend this product for someone looking for a low irritating retinal that pairs well with other products. I will say though, for the price, as much as I like it, I probably won‚Äôt repurchase in the future in addition to the Rx Retinoid I currently use. If you have the change, and want to try this product, I would recommend this product for you, as I‚Äôve seen results in a short period of time.
This is my 2nd retinol and it is so effective. It seems my wrinkles are getting faded.

I have really sensitive skin and I have loved this cleanser. A little goes a long way and using this cleanser AM and PM I still have SO much left after three months of use. It has a soft scent that I find sweet and soothing.
A little how‚Äôs a long way! It foams up miraculously, it smells lovely, cleans my skin without drying me up. I‚Äôm in love!

I have used this every morning for over a year now. Love it! You don't need to use a lot of the product and the little you use is powerful....rich, cleansing and hydrating. Perfect cleanser that I will use for many more years to come
My favorite cleanser, I‚Äôve bought it 3 times. My skin looks terrible without it. A small amount goes a long way, so the entire bottle can last you 9 months easily.
I use this as my water based cleanser and it's the only cleanser I've ever used that visibly brightens my skin and lightens my dark spots.

productName: On Revive Serum: Ginseng + Snail Mucin
review: I love using this serum when my skin is stressed out or in need of some extra care. I have very sensitive / occasionally stressed out skin, and I find this serum really does help soothe and moisturize my skin!

productName: On Revive Serum: Ginseng + Snail Mucin
review: I was really hoping this brand and product would do wonders but it fell short. I'm not sure if it's a combination of what I'm using but I'll have to give it another try in a months time.

productName: On Revive Serum: Ginseng + Snail Mucin
review: I'm totally sold on Beauty of Joseon at this point. I have bought this product twice, along with the Ginseng Water Essence. What an amazing pair they make together! My skin glows, looks great, feels soft and plump. I haven't had any unusual breakouts using this product, it goes on easy and absorbs fast! I honestly haven't been this attached to a serum before.

productName: On Revive Serum: Ginseng + Snail Mucin
review: Wished this came in a larger bottle because I like it so I‚Äôll have to repurchase often.

productName: On Revive Serum: Ginseng + Snail Mucin
review: This product has got me sold on the Beauty of Joseon products. It's so soothing, especially after long days, and it has both ginseng and snail mucin, which are natural products great for the skin! I definitely will get this again!
I‚Äôve been using this for several weeks and I‚Äôm loving it. I have sensitive, dry combo skin. The product is thick and rich but I can wear it morning and night. Also easy on my skin.

After starting to feel really dry during the winter months, I purchased this cream and may never go back. I love the thick, creamy texture and moisture that it gives my skin that lasts all day or night.
Good

This moisturizer is fantastic! I use this during my morning routine as it‚Äôs light, has a cooling feeling when first applied, easily spreads, and absorbs quickly. I will for sure repurchase this product and also recommend the ginseng eye cream. The I‚Äôm From brand is quickly becoming a favorite of mine!

This is my second rice product from this brand (I also have the rice toner), and I'm a big fan of both. I use this as my last step in my evening routine, and it feels luxurious on my skin, leaving it very soft.

productName: On Rice Pure Clay Mask to Foam Cleanser
review: Absolutely love the versatility of this mask. Depending on my skin, I'll leave it on as a mask or just use it as a face wash. Love the clay to foam effect. Not drying, but still deep cleans.

productName: On Rice Pure Clay Mask to Foam Cleanser
review: I used the entire bottle before giving a review, and I can honestly say that I can't live without this. Coming from somone with skin too sensitive for cerave, cetaphil and roche posay, this was perfect! My skin is glowing, no breakouts, and I can't wait to buy again!

productName: On Rice Pure Clay Mask to Foam Cleanser
review: I‚Äôve only used this for a few days but my enlarged pores around my nose look so much better now! Not to mention the few blemishes I have are starting to get smaller too. When I used the cleanser last night in the shower, I smeared it all over my face and then left it on for 2 minutes and rinsed with a cloth. When I say my skin has never been so soft using only ONE product, I mean it. I hadn‚Äôt even put my night cream on yet and I just couldn‚Äôt get over how soft and glowy my skin was. And it didn‚Äôt make my skin feel tight and pinched like other clay masks do. Forever keeping this in my arsenal!

productName: On Rice Pure Clay Mask to Foam Cleanser
review: This is the best cleanser ever! I‚Äôve been slowly switching to more rice based products and I noticed a complete difference. I‚Äôm waiting for this is come back in stock so I can order more than one to have on hand. I have oily sensitive skin and this was not harsh in any way and didn‚Äôt strip away the oils completely.

productName: On Rice Pure Clay Mask to Foam Cleanser
review: Great cleanser that doesn't strip away the oils from face. I have oily acne prone sensitive skin and this is great! It calms my skin.

productName: On Rice Pure Clay Mask to Foam Cleanser
review: This is my backup cleanser. It doesn't clean as well as the Etude whipped cleanser, which is my fave, however it's a nice cleanser to switch to for variety. I put it in the shower so I can alternate use. It doesn't have any scent and is non-irritating on my sensitive skin. Dock one star for the cleanse doesn't feel squeaky clean. But a wonderful product, nevertheless.

productName: On Rice Pure Clay Mask to Foam Cleanser
review: I really love this mask. It leaves my skin feeling smooth and adding water creates a really cleansing foam.

productName: On Rice Pure Clay Mask to Foam Cleanser
review: There's just something that feels fancy about this mask - it goes on well (you don't need a bunch), its non-drying (even on the dry areas of my combo skin), and its just really cool to wash it off and having it be a bubbling facewash! Leaves an extra-clean slate to go in with the rest of your products.

productName: On Rice Pure Clay Mask to Foam Cleanser

review: This not only helped with my oily skin but also helped with my pores and acne scars. I use this as a mask night to help detoxify my skin. It doesn't dry my skin out and it keeps my skin balanced.

productName: On Rice Pure Clay Mask to Foam Cleanser
review: I was pleasantly surprised after using this cleanser it did not feel like it stripped my skin. I haven't used it as a mask but as a foaming cleanser.

productName: On Rice Pure Gel and Cream
reviewTitles: It did not work for me
review: I wanted to love this product. I bought it, excited and ready to try it out. However, it broke out my skin. I have sensitive skin and I am careful with the products I put on my face. I did research in this product, and thought it would work out, but this was not it. I also did not like how it made my face feel sticky. The product did not feel as if it was absorbing into my skin.

productName: On Rice Pure Gel and Cream
review: Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error and I‚Äôm sorry that this cream did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

productName: On Rice Pure Gel and Cream
review: I spent hours researching and looking for a good simple moisturizer for my oily skin. And it always came down to too simple in ingredients to very nourishing and ally of active ingredients. I was so overwhelmed, and almost always had 3 or 4 moisturizers in my shopping basket. When I came across this one, I was so shocked to see it gave the user the choice of how light or how heavy you needed it. Immediately I wanted it, and ever since using it I have been able to feed my skin what it needs any given day. Love love love!

After suffering with severe sensitivity that included redness and swelling, I switched my skin care to a 2-step cleanse. I've been using this foam cleaner for nearly a year now, through all 4 seasons, and my face has done very well with this product. During the winter, it has become a bit more drying but a good moisturizer to follow does the trick.

reviewTitles: worked for travel, didn‚Äôt like the smell
review: The only issue I have is the the pump sticking and not returning to the upright position after pumping. This has happened on my last two bottles but it doesn't change my decision for 5 stars, just needs packing improvements.
nice product

I have been using this Serum for about a week now and I love it. It makes my skin super smooth and bright.
I highly recommend this serum
I love the texture of it and I am still currently using it!
I love this serum, my face looks 100% lighter all my dark spots are fading. Buy it!! I highly recommend it!!

A little goes a long way, and I felt like my skin looked more "plump" if that makes sense! :) Due to the packaging you have to work a bit to get the last portion of the serum out, but the product itself worked great for my sensitive skin.

reviewTitles: So moisturizing! Favorite toner so far!
review: I have dry skin, but also a few areas where I combat acne so I was really wary of toners drying me out or being ineffective. This is the first toner that is so moisturizing, doesn't sensitize my skin so I can use it daily, and still seems to help control acne (on a basic level).
The lack of scent and safer ingredient list were also big draws for me as I'm trying to be conscious of ingredient safety, so I am very glad they were as effective as they were.
I also got my very sensitive-skinned family hooked on this and will be re-buying!
Hydrating, glowy, brightening... SO good !
I like products that have rice water in general . this tonner works very well and it became my new go to tonner. very gentle and calming for the skin
Love this toner
Best.tone.ever. if you‚Äôre from a dry place like I am, you need this asap. Super hydrating best part no fragrance.

Cleans my face well and leaves it smooth and doesn't dry it out
very moisturizing face wash and has helped me clear up my acne
I like how this makes my skin feel. Of course I am using in combination with other products from Soko Glam. I am excited about the changes i am seeing
