I feel like it is more for normal to oily and great for acne care because it has a distinct tea tree smell to it.

I really like this cleanser and highly recommend it. The bottle automatically foams the cleanser as you pump it out and one pump on a silicone facial cleansing pad is more than enough even after a long sweaty and oily skin day. The smell is light and pleasing and the foaming very lovely and rich with a wonderfully nice lather. This was the first time I used a foaming facial cleanser and this cleanser has converted me. I can't imagine going back to a regular non-foaming cleaner. Although the bottle is small it lasts forever, one bottle lasted me 4 months, and I ended up appreciating the size of the bottle, it is small so you can take it traveling as well, very convenient! It leaves skin feeling clean without drying and I noticed an improvement in my skin with fewer pimples after 2 weeks of using this cleanser.
Absolutely love this wash! The scent is incredible- smells like eucalyptus without burning your skin at all. Very refreshing! I don‚Äôt use the whole pump and my skin feels fresh every time.

So I have been using this cleanser for a couple of months now. I was looking for something that wouldn't excessively dry out my skin after use. This fits the bill. It is gentle and after using it my skin feels great and not dry and tight.
The only thing i wish is it was a little bigger so it could last me longer.
I just received this and I love it already . its very light and leaves the skin feeling fresh and clean .

I have been using this cleanser for years. It is my favorite foaming cleanser because it gently cleanses my skin and gets rid of any residue from my foaming cleanser without drying it out or irritating it.

I love this cleanser! I have been using this for about two weeks now. I usually have very reactive, sensitive skin, but this is so gentle I haven't had any breakouts! It has a light tea tree scent, and it is subtle. I will be purchasing this again!

Gave this a try because I'm a fan of the other rich moust products, but my skin wasn't vibing with it (which is ok!) Gave to my mom, and she enjoys it! She has dryer skin than I do, so maybe that's why.
This is a good cleanser! The tea tree smell is definitely way too strong and the concentration should be lowered, but the foam is luxurious and adequately cleans my skin
i have used this product for years. i have also used the brand for years. it makes my skin feel so refreshed and hydrated. i have super sensitive and dry skin and this solves my problems!
I have dry/sensitive skin and this moisturizer is my go-to product. I've tried others and I keep coming back to this one.
Smooth and excellent in my face and hands

I've only used this product for a week, but in that amount of time closed comedones have popped up aaaall over my face like crazy! I really wanted to love this product because the texture is so wonderful, but something in it is seriously clogging my pores. After discontinuing use for four days (and with the help of the rest of my routine) my skin texture is returning to normal.

After trying a couple more I have decided to repurchase it. At first I didn't love it because I felt it was not moisturizing enough but after pairing it with a good watery toner and letting it dry just a little bit between layers helped balance out my dehidratef skin and it was quick to absorb and that is something important for me because I live in a humid climate.

Great for anyone looking for a serum for sensitive skin. It smells different than other serums, but I believe that's due to no fragrances being included - which is perfect for someone like me that has skin reactions to all scents. It leaves my face feeling so nice and smooth after using!

I really like this serum because it's nice and light. I've bought this along with my Klairs supple toner, and that combo does justice, but I also feel like it does the same thing as the toner. I've opted this out of my routine because I don't really see it as necessary in my daily day and night routine, but it add an extra layer of hydration if you're into that!

reviewTitles: I'm giving it 5 stars because I want to explain the sme
review: Yes it has a more chemically smell. That is because it has no other fragrances to cover that up. People like me who are allergic to fragrance find it hard get products that don't have fragrance. Did you know that some fragrances are actually used to create no scent at all? This product doesn't even use that. It doesn't mean it has bad "chemicals" in there. Many things with fragrances would smell this way if you took the fragrance out. For me and people like me, I'd take something that doesn't smell like flowers but doesnt irritate my skin. These people who are scared of the "chemical" smell don't really understand what's going on here. You don't notice it as soon as your done putting it on. Don't worry about it. It's a great serum and I'm so thankful something like this exists.
I love how moisturized my skin gets from this serum. It makes my skin glow
Love it. Leaves skin moisturized and brilliant. Smell has gotten better.

reviewTitles: Good on sensitive skin, can be layered, not insanely hydrating
review: I have very sensitive, reactive skin and this product does great on it. No irritation or redness.
It does hydrate and set into the skin well, however I have very dry skin and I feel like i can never have enough on to fully hydrate my skin.
Have repurchased 3x, it is a solid product. But currently going to try to look for a more hydrating serum
I love this gua sha! A great product for the price. I broke mine (dropped it on tile floor) so I am repurchasing.

I have a habit of clenching my jaw and that leads to tension headaches. Not only is this a great way to get the products absorbed into your skin, but is a wonderful way to massage my tight facial muscles.
Pretty and does its job.

reviewTitles: Not 5 star yet, but on it‚Äôs way!
review: I like the shape of this gua sha - it‚Äôs easy to hold. I just received this so it‚Äôs too soon to say much. However, I have enjoyed using it and love the rose quartz. I am following the directions and I do see some changes in reduction of excess fluid in my face.

productName: On Royal Honey Propolis Enrich Essence
review: This serum feels so good on the skin and always leaves me looking dewy!

productName: On Royal Honey Propolis Enrich Essence
review: This essence came highly recommended, but I don‚Äôt know that it entirely lived up to the hype, given the price. I did legitimately enjoy using it. I do think a fair bit of my enjoyment was just due to how bougie the bottle is. If you‚Äôre specifically hoping for an essence, maybe look into a different option, as both the packaging (dropper bottle) and texture (not watery) is not conducive to using it as an essence. But in terms of a good moisturizing, soothing serum, this is a fantastic choice because it has the bee trifecta of royal jelly, honey and propolis. I would definitely consider repurchasing next winter.

productName: On Royal Honey Propolis Enrich Essence
review: It‚Äôs moisturizing and it makes your skin feel soft. I recently bought a lot of skin care so I‚Äôm just trying to figure out what step to make it.

productName: On Royal Honey Propolis Enrich Essence
review: Amazing Essence does wonders as prep before applying a serum and moisturizer. If you're looking for glowy glass skin then this is for you.

productName: On Royal Honey Propolis Enrich Essence
review: Very moisturizing essence, would highly recommend it‚Äôs worth the price. Good for normal to dry skin. Also love the packaging.

One of my favorites, my skin feels so soft after use and it‚Äôs really good at clearing the dry skin patches gently without having to scrub or use harsher physical exfoliants. My skin doesn‚Äôt feel dried out after use which some others do.
Best one I have ever tried
Decent overall
It‚Äôs a gentle exfoliator and I love how my skin feels afterwards.

This peeling gel replaced ExfoliKate in my weekly routine and I think I like it more! Especially at this price point, it does an amazing job and my early 40s skin stays super smooth using it once a week before a sheet mask. Absolutely a winner!
I love using this once a week to get off all the dead, dry skin. You can literally feel the dead skin flaking off, it‚Äôs amazing. Skin is baby soft after but not dry at all.
gentle, perfect scrub even for sensitive older skin

I got a sample of this peel gel from a previous order with Soko Glam and liked it so much I ordered a full size. This exfoliates extremely well without irritation (although, I only use it every few days, if you used it more often, perhaps it would become irritating. I also should note that I do not have overly sensitive skin). I normally use an oil cleanser with PHA or BHA to clean and exfoliate and this works even better and makes my skin feel completely smooth. This is a great step before applying makeup to make your makeup set evenly. Since I only use it every few days, I expect this tube should last a long time, too!
A very gentle exfoliator -- I'm not sure as much dead skin as I would like is coming off, but it does definitely smooth the skin and create a clean feeling.

I use this about once per week in the shower, and I find that it provides nice exfoliation without being drying or irritating. The product has jojoba beads but also is formulated so that it clumps up while you scrub, which makes for a gentle physical exfoliation. It's helped reduce my breakouts, and has ESPECIALLY helped with maskne. Docking a star because the "use after cleansing and drying" process is a little cumbersome, but I definitely like it enough to keep buying it.
I bought 3 and I should've purchased more! I feel brighter and more plump after using these.
I really loved this mask! I‚Äôm anxiously awaiting its return to stock! I‚Äôll need to purchase an extra amount next time to make sure I don‚Äôt ever run out of it again.
Loved trying this mask. My skin felt healed and soft. Glowed the entire day and the following one as well.
Havent noticed any dramatic change for my skin but it feels good on my skin and will continue to keep using

productName: On Safe me. Relief Moisture Cleansing Foam
reviewTitles: A little goes a long way!
review: Just a small dab on my cleansing pad and away all the daily dirt & grime goes. It smells wonderful too. Love this product

productName: On Safe me. Relief Moisture Cleansing Foam
review: Not sure exactly what ingredient caused the cystic acne on my cheeks (I never get cystic acne) or caused the little red bumps everywhere, I just know I am throwing this face wash out. Really doesn't help that it smells like a throat lozenge either...

productName: On Safe me. Relief Moisture Cleansing Foam
review: with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

productName: On Safe me. Relief Moisture Cleansing Foam
reviewTitles: Didn't agree with my sensitive skin
review: I have struggled to find a great cleanser for my skin type, my skin changes throughout the year but is always sensitive and prone to breakouts. After using this product, I have noticed major changes in my skin. My skin is less sensitive which is great during the cold weather and my breakouts have calmed down. I have also received compliments on my skin!!

productName: On Safe Me. Relief Moisture Cleansing Milk
review: SG recommend this for me to reduce Rosacea and does the job. It's not thick, feels light just right for my face and I'm happy

productName: On Safe Me. Relief Moisture Cleansing Milk
reviewTitles: Incredibly soothing, transformed my skin in one use
review: I bought this cleansing milk because I tried one of their sheet masks after a nasty sunburn and it felt like a healing experience.

productName: On Safe Me. Relief Moisture Cleansing Milk
review: This milk absolutely changed my skin the first time I used it. It is so soothing and takes the redness away completely, my skin looks so smooth and pure after.

productName: On Safe Me. Relief Moisture Cleansing Milk
review: Had to take away a star because it is unfortunately not great at makeup removal. I only wear a small amount of drug store mascara and this really didn‚Äôt get it all off in one go.

productName: On Safe Me. Relief Moisture Cleansing Milk
reviewTitles: Safe M. Relief Moisture Cleansing Milk
review: I did feel like it removed my sunscreen, however.

productName: On Safe Me. Relief Moisture Cream 12
review: Battling dehydrated skin, this helped so much. Not heavy weight which is also a plus for me.

productName: On Safe Me. Relief Moisture Cream 12
review: My skin is super dry and this moisturizer works well on my skin!

productName: On Safe Me. Relief Moisture Cream 12
review: Great basic moisturizer. I like to try new skincare products but this is a staple that I always like going back to, especially when I'm unhappy with my skin. It never irritates my skin and always feels good going on

productName: On Safe Me. Relief Moisture Cream 12
review: Saved my skin! I cannot go a day without it, it is that good!

productName: On Safe Me. Relief Moisture Cream 12
review: Winter in Canada is brutal and with my sensitive skin, anything too rich breaks me out. This cream is just perfectly moisturizing, rich enough while having all the right ingredients. It takes me from winter until summer without needing to change. It's easily layered for more moisture and goes on lightly for just that touch of moisture without leading my skin wanting.

productName: On Safe Me. Relief Moisture Green Ampoule
reviewTitles: Very calming when I suffered from dermatitis
review: When I had a freak episode of dermatitis a few weeks ago from a new face wash, this helped calm my skin down when it was severely irritated and constantly inflamed and burning. Not the most hydrating serum, so I have to use a thicker moisturizer on top, but it's really great for irritated skin. Didn't see a lot of redness reduction for my existing rosacea, but it does help calm any associated pain and irritation. I will continue using now that my dermatitis has gone away and continue repurchasing!

productName: On Safe Me. Relief Moisture Green Ampoule
review: I use this on days I swim, and it really helps counter the drying effects of chlorine. My face feels refreshed afterwards.

productName: On Safe Me. Relief Moisture Green Ampoule
review: unfortunately this product caused my face to break out and when I applied it it stung. Great smell though

productName: On Safe Me. Relief Moisture Green Ampoule
review: I have red, dry, irritated, sensitive skin and this ampoule did a lot to restore and heal my skin. It was actually pretty surprising. It's gentle enough that my skin didn't get irritated and hydrating enough that a lot of my dryness went away. I even like the smell, which reminds me of lemons. It's a new staple for me!

productName: On Safe Me. Relief Moisture Green Ampoule
review: I was very skeptical because not many skin products work on my skin but I am so happy that I found this serum! The smell is very light and refreshing and my skin feels so much softer and less irritated! I have slight rosacea on my cheeks that have recently become more irritated because I wear a mask and keep it on all day at work but thanks to this serum, I definitely feel a lot better. Definitely recommend!

productName: On Safe Me. Relief Moisture Green Ampoule
review: I‚Äôve wanted to try the Safe Me. Products and felt like this one would be a safe bet (no pun, I promise). I don‚Äôt need a lot and it spreads evenly and absorbs very quickly. I wouldn‚Äôt mind trying other products in the line.

productName: On Safe Me. Relief Moisture Green Ampoule
review: So I have tried soo many propolis serums over the past 3 years, if I had to list, just would be too many. Tosowoong, Cosrx, Benton, Etude House, the list goes on. None of them works as well as this one. I was having a bit of an acne flare and in about 2-3 days my face cleared and has stayed that way. And its not just because I added a propolis serum either, I am also using the Benton Aloe Propolis Gel in my routine right now.

productName: On Safe Me. Relief Moisture Green Ampoule
review: It's the first thing I put onto my skin, about 4 drops on each cheek, 3 on forehead & chin area. I would say it disappears pretty well into the skin and isn't too oily or anything either.

productName: On Safe me. Relief Moisture Mask 15
review: I loved this mask. Its delicate and soft and very hydrating. My skin felt so smooth the following morning, I would highly recommend this mask.

productName: On Safe me. Relief Moisture Mask 15
review: Such a great way to end a long day! Skin soaks this right up!

productName: On Safe me. Relief Moisture Mask 15
review: Super hydrating mask! Will buy again!

productName: On Safe me. Relief Moisture Mask 15
review: I love this mask . It simple yet effective. My face looks very supple after I use this mask . Will keep repurchasing.

productName: On Safe me. Relief Moisture Mask 15
review: I used this mask at night following an unfortunate sunburn I got on my face while on vacation. At this point I was still quite red, and beginning to REALLY peel - my skin felt and looked rough like leather. This not only felt amazing on my skin while using it, but the next morning after using it I felt like I was completely healed. My skin had a nice glow to it I haven't even gotten with moisturizers overnight. Will be buying more to keep on hand!

productName: On Safe Sun Fluid AGE 0880 SPF50+ PA++++
review: Great for the price. You get more than some other sunscreens. I do have to make sure to rub it in well so it doesn't leave a white cast though. Has a powdery smell which I like.

productName: On Safe Sun Fluid AGE 0880 SPF50+ PA++++
review: I used these after being sent a free bottle by SOKOGLAM and started using them in this summer. Couldn't recommend it more! I love the bottle and how it's dispensed. There was no white cast for me and I didn't burn at all. It seemed pretty great in the water too! If I had to have a complaint, it would be whenever I came back from the gym I would have a bit of white streaks from sweat, but after rubbing it away, it's not noticeable.

productName: On Safe Sun Fluid AGE 0880 SPF50+ PA++++
review: Gives me a dewy look, and the white cast does blend in with my light medium skin tone.

productName: On Safe Sun Fluid AGE 0880 SPF50+ PA++++
review: Once I rubbed this in thoroughly, the white cast wasn't too bad on my medium-brown skin. The smell reminds me of old lady perfume and it is extremely strong. This alone wouldn't deter me from using it, but my skin is starting to get bumpy and break out after just two days of use :( Sad, because I wanted to love it.

productName: On Safe Sun Fluid AGE 0880 SPF50+ PA++++
review: It‚Äôs a pretty okay sunscreen, has a light scent that doesn‚Äôt linger too long. It does have a small white cast but that goes away after a few minutes. A little oily but I don‚Äôt mind because of dry skin. Overall it‚Äôs really worth it for the price and quantity you get!

productName: On Safe Sun Fluid AGE 0880 SPF50+ PA++++
review: feels lightweight and not too oily! i have oily skin, so this sunscreen didnt feel like it clogged my pores.

productName: On Safe Sun Fluid AGE 0880 SPF50+ PA++++
review: This does leave a little white cast, but it definitely fades and leaves a beautiful finish! My go-to!

productName: On Safe Sun Fluid AGE 0880 SPF50+ PA++++
review: A friend of mine purchased this and let me try it over the summer. It was a perfect, everyday sunscreen and wore well under my makeup! Can't wait to get my own!

productName: On Safe Sun Fluid AGE 0880 SPF50+ PA++++
review: Love what you get for the price. Does leave a white cast if I don't rub it in enough. Has a powdery smell that I like.

I decided to make my own skincare routine based on reviews on soko glam, and the good reviews were definitely worth it. It's light weight, and feels refreshing on the skin without that oily, suffocation feeling. 10/10 recommend. This is the only moisturizer I've ever gotten that doesn't make me sweat.

Pretty good. Especially considering the price. I personally would use this under make up or with light skincare. Its not going to do much else other than provide a good amount of moisture. If you do not like too much hydration I would recommend. But there are better alternatives at a slightly higher price point. It would also be amazing if you had lots of steps in your routine as to not over confuse your skin with a million benefits and treatments at once. A good neutral, bare, and basic product to have.
love this moisturizer!
I love how the gel liquifies when using. Not thick or uncomfortable and feels hydrating.
I like this a lot! Feels moisturizing but not too heavy.

I am loving this product and the price point makes it even better! My skin has been extra oily lately and makeup was just sliding off my skin. I needed a lightweight, sebum control daytime moisturizer for acne-prone skin. This moisturizer is exactly that. I use this product in the daytime and a more hydrating cream at nighttime.

reviewTitles: Good Alternative to TIMY Gel Moisturizer
review: I decided to give this a try as a summer moisturizer and it does a good job of keeping me hydrated! I‚Äôll probably have to switch to something more intense for winter but I love this for the warmer months.

I have naturally oily skin and live in a humid climate year around, so I have been looking for better less oily moisturizer. Sadly, this did not feel oily but after three days of using this only in morning my face has broken out , turned completely dry, and my neck has developed a horrible dry itchy rash. Steer clear of this one.
with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

This moisturizer is thick without being heavy. Many moisturizers are too thin for me, leaving my face feeling tight by midday. Not this stuff. It leaves my skin feeling hydrated and plump. Plus I love that it comes in a tube! Way more hygienic than a jar.
The only product I have tried recently that is helping repair my damaged skin barrier

I destroyed my skin barrier in December with retinol and tried multiple products without much luck. Enter this product! My skin barrier is finally starting to recover. It has not broken me out, and it is thick without being greasy. I prefer to use it at night, but it is okay for day use as well.
This cream relieved dryness and irritation. It is really thick and perfect for my evening routine. I'm not too keen on the scent but very keen on the results!

reviewTitles: Hanskin makes the best products hands down!
review: This cream is exactly what it says it is and delivers on that moistness. It is PACKED with ceramides, and both type of ceramides that our skin barrier needs - hydrophilic as well as hydrophobic ones. So it gets absorbed into the deeper layers of the skin as well. The cream has a slightly thick and rich texture but it goes on the skin easily and does not feel greasy.
This is hydrating and lightweight enough for humid climates! One pump is enough. At night, I use two pumps and not use moisturizer and it seems to work for me. I would repurchase :)

reviewTitles: More Ceramides Than You Even Thought You Wanted
review: If you want the ceramide serum equivalent of Pokemon‚Äôs Gotta Catch ‚ÄòEm All, look no further than the Hanskin Seven Layer Ceramide Serum. This emulsion texture has seven ceramides (ergo the name), plus a ceramide precursor, panthenol, cholesterol, beta glucan, urea and panthenol, basically making it a one-stop shop for skin barrier support. The texture can feel a bit tacky at first, but it dries down easily. And the price! Ceramides are expensive to formulate with, but the price per mL is great on this. I‚Äôve got a lot of ceramide serums I love and while this one might not be the most elegant, I‚Äôll probably rebuy it.

FINALLY! I‚Äôve been looking for something that can sub in for Dr. Jart‚Äôs Ceramidin Liquid‚Äîand I finally found it!! Thanks for curating this because it‚Äôs hard enough to find ceramide serums. And this is equally as velvety smooth and fast absorbing as the Dr. Jart‚Äôs serum. We‚Äôre in the hot, humid June season but I can still use it. I love it in the morning right after my hydrating toner when I don‚Äôt want to use a moisturizer right away. Please keep this stocked on SOKO Glam!

productName: On Shea Butter and Olive Hand Cream
review: I wanted to love this, but it's just ok. It has a medicinal, herbal smell that some people might not care for, but I like it. It just did not provide the amount of hydration and protection I need. This is probably better for people in more humid climates. I will use it but won't repurchase.

productName: On Shea Butter and Olive Hand Cream
review: I love this hand cream. I have very dry hands and nothing short of a heavy cream will keep my hands soft and moisturized. I also wash a lot so I need a good cream that doesn't have a lot of perfumes. This cream is light but very hydrating. Leaves my skin really soft and has a natural light smell that doesn't overwhelm me or my dog. I love it! Will be buying more!

productName: On Shea Butter and Olive Hand Cream
review: Good cream. Moisturizes well. Leaves my hands soft. I like how it‚Äôs in a tube dispenser for hygiene. Smells good too!

productName: On Shea Butter and Olive Hand Cream
review: Nice thick cream to relieve the winter dryness. I also like that it fits in my purse or work jacket easily.

productName: On Shea Butter and Olive Hand Cream
review: Light herbal scent, nice consistency and dies a decent job of moisturizing my hands. This is a smaller tube that easily fits in a purse.
This hand cream was fine and not too greasy or sticky if you apply a small amount, but honestly nothing special. I've only used mine a few times, so I probably won't be repurchasing.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error and I‚Äôm sorry that this hand cream did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.
This was just okay. Too greasy for my liking. I will continue to use it until I ran out but won‚Äôt be buying again.
This is definitely a great sunscreen for everyday wear. I hardly feel anything on my face except smooth skin.

productName: On Skin Essentials Activating Treatment Lotion
review: This is a very hydrating product. My skin feels very moisturized when using this with the lotus water cream. As a person with dry skin, it is a nice ‚Äòtreatment lotion‚Äô. I was looking for a product with not much fragrance but just as effective as fenty‚Äôs fat water. I would recommend!

productName: On Skin Essentials Activating Treatment Lotion
review: A must have in your skincare routine!

productName: On Skin Essentials Activating Treatment Lotion
review: IAMKARENO brought me here from her korean skincare video. I just started doing skincare starting with the basics. this toner definitely does wonders with no downsides

productName: On Skin Essentials Activating Treatment Lotion
review: I had a mediocre experience with this essence. Yes, it is very hydrating- but that was it. I didn't experience or notice any other benefits of cell turnover or depuffing. Also when I finished the bottle, my skin wasn't craving it after a few days of not using it so I don't think it was the best fit for me.

productName: On Skin Essentials Activating Treatment Lotion
review: This essence treatment is really nice, leaves my skin feeling hydrated and it comes with a lot of product.

productName: On Skin Essentials Activating Treatment Lotion
review: I like using this as part of my daily skincare routine - 2x a day if I am feeling particularly dry. Typically once a day is enough for me and I also apply a thin layer on my lips underneath lip treatment masks too!

productName: On Skin Essentials Activating Treatment Lotion
reviewTitles: More "active" than I expected; slightly irritating
review: I was really impressed by the reviews, and was wanting something to give me moisture and glow. However, this made my skin break out in small, irritated bumps. I suspect maybe it's the niacinamide, which can be irritating, and isn't listed in the "ingredients we love" so I overlooked it. The formula is much more "active" than I anticipated. It felt more like a treatment than a soothing serum ( I get that maybe I misinterpreted the description!) I already use a lot of actives (alternating retinol and other acids, plus vitamin c) so I think this was just too much. The texture is amazing, but it wasn't right for me.

productName: On Skin Essentials Barrier Repair Face Oil
review: It was an unexpectedly good addition to daily skincare routine. Very hydrating and is a great finish to the rest of your skincare.

productName: On Skin Essentials Barrier Repair Face Oil
review: Incorporating a face oil into my routine has been a must since I suffer from dry skin. However, it has been a challenge since most face oils clog my pores and cause me to breakout severely. Not this product thought! I have finally found a face oil that works for my skin. This is a multi use oil where I can put it on my cuticles, hands and body and it works just as great. I recently started adding 1-2 drops into my foundation and absolutely love the skin like finish it gives. Definitely check it out!

productName: On Skin Essentials Barrier Repair Face Oil
review: I was told this oil would be great for barrier repair. It is very drying and to be honest if smells like my eucalyptus essential oil which seems to make my damaged moisture barrier worse. Because you can't return it I feel like I should give it a try for a while longer.

productName: On Skin Essentials Barrier Repair Face Oil
review: I love this product for my night skincare routine. It feels hydrating and my skin looks more even.

productName: On Skin Essentials Barrier Repair Face Oil
review: I put this moisturizing face oil over moisturizer to help hydrate my face. I usually use it at night, since it's a bit heavy for during the day. I have dry skin, so it's nice to wake up with smooth and hydrated feeling skin.

productName: On Skin Essentials Barrier Repair Face Oil
review: It feels light but hydrates well. Can feel greasy at first - after all it is oil - but absorbs well

productName: On Skin Essentials Barrier Repair Face Oil
review: I wasn‚Äôt sure this would live up to the hype, but it definitely did! I have extremely sensitive, delicate & reactive skin. A few drops of this oil is all I need to take away any irritation I might have. It also feels like it strengthens my skin barrier so it‚Äôs not as reactive. I love that it‚Äôs fast absorbing and not greasy. It even helps my hands recover faster after rock climbing! I‚Äôm not a huge fan of the pine scent, but for the benefits, I‚Äôll deal with it. So happy I found this product!

productName: On Skin Essentials Barrier Repair Face Oil
review: it doesn‚Äôt make your face greasy

productName: On Skin Essentials Barrier Repair Face Oil
review: I have really dry, sensitive, and acne prone skin. I really wanted an oil that felt moisturizing but also absorbed well and didn't irritate my skin. I usually prefer thicker oils since I do have very dry skin but getting into the warmer months, I didn't want anything too heavy during the days. This was perfect. Just enough moisture without feeling greasy. Not heavy enough for me to use as my night time oil, but great for daytime!

productName: On Skin Essentials Barrier Repair Face Oil
review: It absorbs well into my face and makes my skin very soft, but I don't know if I can get over the RANCID smell of it. I would say it smells like burning oil, but that's not quite right... more like some kind of mix of burning plastic and burning trash. I will not order again and am sad other oils were out of stock when I placed this order. :(

productName: On Skin Essentials Barrier Repair Face Oil
review: Thanks for your feedback!

reviewTitles: Caused me to breakout and have little bumps
review: I really wanted to like this because I thought the ingredients would work well on my skin and it was fairly cheap but I ended up breaking out and having lots of little bumps all over my skin. I have normal-dry skin and it doesn't take a lot for my skin to break out but something about this moisturizer didn't work well for my skin. I am now struggling with breakouts along my forehead and hairline area with little bumps all over my skin (maybe like clogged pores or something like that? just created more texture that I didn't have before). I followed what people said and only used 1 pump every time I used it but still didn't work.

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Lotion
review: I used to use it as my moisturizer for day and night but wanted to experiment on what was causing my breakout so I decided to just use it during the day-- see if using it less would help. When I started doing that, I realized that the breakout started calming down but, obviously, still there since I used it in the morning. I'm now looking for a different moisturizer for the winter time but if you decide to get it just be careful and to test it on your skin slowly!

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Lotion
review: I think I would like it better if it was like a gel moisturizer. I like the feel of it and it doesn‚Äôt feel sticky on my face. Great for sensitive skin.

I prefer Innisfree's green tea balancing emulsion and was hoping to find something comparable, hope this would be able to replace it, but again, it's a bit too dense, I had trouble getting it to fully soak into my skin, and my face felt heavy afterwards. I want to use it up, so maybe for a night treatment, but for during the day if you'll be sweating at all - not great.

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Lotion
review: Luv this formula! Great for my combination skin. Immediately feel perfectly hydrated.

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Lotion

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Lotion

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Steam Cream
review: Hands down my favorite moisturizer. You only need a few tiny dots for full coverage. It keeps my skin moisturized throughout the day, which has helped prevent my acne (I have combination oily/dry skin). My fiance even started using it every day, and he has never had any type of skincare routine.

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Steam Cream
reviewTitles: Very thick lotion, great for calming dry skin.
review: It's currently winter time where most moisturizers feel like they aren't doing enough. I got this one recently and it has been exactly what I was looking for. It's very thick and creamy, but it doesn't feel like it sits on the skin too long after applying like other thick moisturizers. I have extremely sensitive skin, and when I wake up in the morning after using this, it calms a lot of my breakouts and redness, and my skin doesn't have its winter dry patches anymore. Would definitely recommend for others who have dryer skin in the winter, and are looking for a thicker cream to help out. Only thing that wasn't my favorite is the size, it's quite small, but a little does go a very long way.

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Steam Cream

review: This was a great moisturizer while it lasted, I can't use it. This cream makes me breakout every time. I tried using it consecutively day and night. Just in the morning, just a night. Even in rotation and it STILL made me break out. This was all over the coarse of a year. I don't blame the product entirely though. Everything I have tried with snail mucin has made me break out. It just doesn't agree with my skin. I have acne prone combination skin and this was not it for me.

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Steam Cream
review: This cream is so thick that it leaves streaks on your face. I only used it at night because of that. Great for super dry skin! I didn't see any improvement from the snail bee stuff, but that might just be my skin.

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Steam Cream
review: Benton has a lot of great products but Im not a fan of this one. I would rate this one a 3/5 due to the fact that it is quite think and hard for the product to permeate my skin. I think the ingredients are really nice, but I didn't notice any difference after using the entire tube.

productName: On Snail Bee High Content Steam Cream

gute Produkte herzl. Dank

love this product so far. my skin is very dry and sensitive and so far, my skin has never felt more hydrated and bright than now. i can feel the difference.

reviewTitles: Using this for a month, love it!
review: I've recently started on a more serious skin regimen and have been using this as a part of it, and I enjoy it a lot! It's definitely noted a difference in skin texture, and has made a huge difference to my skin's condition.

If I could only pick one skin ingredient to use, it would be snail mucin. It is hydrating, and so comforting on my skin. I use it as a moisturizing serum, but it also helps with my skin texture as I am at the lucky age where I am fighting wrinkles AND breakouts. It provides a beautiful glow without getting sticky and layers well with others. I was using a different brand of snail mucin and when I went to restock it was sold out so I got this insead. This one is an even better price and my skin loves it. I use this daily - its very thin so it's suitable under heavier serums and moisturizers. I also love to put this on right after I use an exfoliating mask because it is so soothing and hydrating.
I wouldn‚Äôt say this is a fave for me but I do feel it‚Äôs kinda hydrating for my skin and it‚Äôs not irritating at all so that is nice

reviewTitles: My favorite pimple patches on the market
review: These work well. More importantly, the adhesive isn‚Äôt too strong where it hurts to remove the patch but strong enough to withstand water and sweat.

I never had acne as a teen. I just never did ‚Ä¶ but now at 49 (!) I find myself occasionally getting a pimple or two. (Why now??). I have purchased these a few times now. I really like them. They really work ‚Ä¶ and they are practically invisible. I actually forgot I was wearing one and actually went out in public. It just melted into my skin! I don‚Äôt think anyone noticed! I always like to keep a package on hand ‚Äújust in case‚Äù ‚Ä¶ and the price is very affordable.

I've tried several brands of pimple patches over the years (the same brands you're probably thinking of), but these are by far my favorite and most re-purchased. The beveled edges mean that they not only adhere to your skin better, but that they blend into any complexion or skin tone almost seamlessly. There are two different sized patches included, and the sheer number of patches (42 for just $6!) makes this product well worth your money; I use them liberally (as one should!) and don't feel guilty about it afterwards because they're so inexpensive. Using these patches at any and every stage of a pimple‚Äîwhen you first notice the blemish emerging, once you've picked at it, and once it has already started to scar‚Äîhas helped my skin heal and get back to normal so much quicker. I cannot recommend this product enough!!
Got these on a whim and I absolutely love the double edge design! These really pull the gunk out of your face.

These are great, everytime I remember to put them over emerging blemishes I wake up the next morning so grateful that I did. They‚Äôll take a pimple from whitehead for gone in 8 hours sometimes. And even when they don‚Äôt it‚Äôs helpful for healing and to avoid picking at pimples.
I love this bag, it's nice and roomy as well as great quality. It'll be nice to have for those short trips when I don't need to pack much

productName: On Soko Glam Logo Baseball Cap

review: Lightweight and breathable - totally love this cap to take with me when I go on hikes! It's really nice quality - maybe the one downside is I feel like it collects lint/hair fairly easily - but I do live with a cat :)

productName: On Some by Mi AHA-BHA-PHA 30 Days Miracle Truecica Clear Pad
review: I was a little nervous about how harsh these might be; however, they aren't harsh at all. In fact, my skin feels soft and and moist afterwards. These have also been great for my small breakouts. The next morning my blemishes are noticeably reduced.

productName: On Some by Mi AHA-BHA-PHA 30 Days Miracle Truecica Clear Pad
reviewTitles: This has all of my favorite things!
review: I am in love with a specific combination of ingredients for my combo/oily skin that has to go through a lot (like migraine injections every few weeks for one example): Cica + Houttuynia Cordata + Artemisia/Mugwort. Alone these ingredients are good but combined are a powerhouse for preventing or treating breakouts, maskne issues like irritation, and reducing redness and inflammation - all while making my skin feel nourished and not like it is covered in grease. Adding so much tea tree is such a bonus for me too as I'm immunocompromised and keep it in the house to add to practically everything anyway. Also the astringent properties of the Willow Bark is great for my pores on my nose and forehead, yet It isn't drying for my skin, and doesn't make me peel. If it came with the fliptop lid the MadeCera PinkAloe pads come in, or if that lid fits this jar? **chef's kiss**
The ampoule feels very soothing on my skin. I love how my skin feels after using this product. Helps calm my skin.
Really soothing and moisturizing, not sure if it made a difference with acne though but I think it did

I love Hanskin! I have yet to find one of their products that doesn't deliver beautiful results. This ampoule is so calming and melts so beautifully into the skin. I tend to use it in my night rotation on days when my skin is a little irritated or dull. I can't wait to try the essence from this line!

I love this cream so much more than I expected to. It has a soft, pillowy feel to it and feels so cooling and calming on the skin. It also smells amazing! My skin drank this up and it helped soothe my peeling skin from using tretinoin.

I‚Äôve been like Goldilocks searching for a face cream, and I‚Äôve found it. This Hanskin cream is super moisturizing without being sticky/greasy, absorbs well but doesn‚Äôt dry out completely, has just enough of a natural scent that it doesn‚Äôt smell too perfumey or too bland. After use, my skin feels comfortable and soothed until my next wash. It‚Äôs perfect! I‚Äôm almost done with my first tub and have two brand new ones on stand by.
Super gentle, super hydrating, I love that it feels weightless but really gets the job done.
I asked SG for recommendation to reduce rosacea and they recommended this. It works greatly on my skin, it's very light and moisturize my skin perfectly.

If you‚Äôre looking for a calming essence, this is the one for you. I use this when my skin is acting up and I need to bring it back to normal. I also use this with the calming ampoule (same product line). Very gentle but still hydrating.

So I've wrecked my skin trying to do too much too fast and ended up with a very unhappy skin barrier. Aside from taking easier now I incorporated this essence to my skin care and it helped soooo much! My skin stopped being so angry at me. Now that it's colder I started doing the 7 skin technique, thing, with this essence and boy, my skin glows and feels oh so good! Really happy I was recommended this by the sokoglam team.
Such a wonderful product that leaves my skin so moisturized. It doesn‚Äôt dry right. Absolutely a must for every K-skin care routine.

This goes on very nice, smooth and really absorbs well. I really like the bottle and the consistency of the product.
I liked this product but as soon as it got cold it wasn‚Äôt sufficient as a moisturizer for me. Better for summer months!
Worked great! Skin enjoyed it. However, I have other products I prefer more! Still good though.

However, I don‚Äôt think my dry skin friends will get away with using this as a moisturizer alone so i definitely recommend pairing it with a proper moisturizer :)))

I will say that since it is more on the lighter side those with dry skin might not be able to get away with using this as a moisturizer alone, so i would definitely look into pairing it with a proper moisturizer :))

This moisturizer used to be my favorite a few years ago! I loved the texture and how smooth it was to apply, as well as how it didn't break out my oily acne-prone teen skin. For some reason, after trying a different gel cream moisturizer which i love (Rovectin), I'm not a huge fan of how this one feels on my skin anymore. I currently have acne-prone, combination skin that can get sensitive/dehydrated and this lotion does work well to provide moisture and lock it in, but I feel that the texture on the skin feels a little thick for me. In my opinion, it's also more moisturizing (oil) than hydrating (water) and I'm looking for more hydration. The texture is lightweight and has a milky/buttery(?) creaminess, so it's great for locking in other skincare like toner/essence. If you're looking for a simple no-frills moisturizer I'd 100% give it a try!
This is perfect during the winter months and keeps my skin moisturized without feeling greasy.

I absolutely love this product. For someone who have dry skin, I find myself having extremely dry skin during the winter. This moisturizer leave my skin smooth and hydrate. I also have extremely sensitive skin, and it often react (it sting) to product but this leave a cooling and normal feeling (no sting).

It didn't work wonders on some eczema spots but it didn't specify treatment for eczema so I wasn't really expecting it to. Overall I really like this for the winter season as it relieved irritation. I will probably have to switch when the weather warms up. I recommend for dry skin but not sure about other skin types. Also, the dispenser is utterly terrible...

This barrier intensive cream works wonderfully on my skin and also at this price point perfect for slathering on. Have already repurchased several times!

Made my eczema flare up on my cheek and gave me a rash on my neck :/ really bummed because of all the positive reviews. Feels nice going on and has a good consistency though

reviewTitles: A great find for my combo skin
review: This toner has provided me with the hydration my skin always craves during the winter months. I use it after cleansing, and my skin always feels super soft, plump, and hydrated. I‚Äôve also noticed slight improvements in my overall skin tone. Someone even complimented me that my skin looked really clear a few days ago, and I had thought it wasn‚Äôt doing much at first. Previous toners I‚Äôd used always felt drying, but this is the exact opposite.

I truly feel like this toner saved my skin barrier. Since I started using it I cannot even put into words the difference it‚Äôs made in my skin. My redness is gone, I feel like some of my acne hyperpigmentation is fading, and when I wake up in the morning my skin feels normal instead of slick and greasy. A miracle in a bottle!

Made my skin much more hydrated, less dry, and more clear. I recommend for those with dry skin

reviewTitles: the best moisturizer ever! i don't know why this isn't more hyped up.
review: this is my new holy grail. i'm on tretinoin and the sides of my face are dry while my t-zone gets super oily throughout the day. this moisturizer is perfect for my crazy skin! it feels like an ointment but goes on smooth (leaves a sort of satin-y finish, like a primer). it's not wet or liquid-y at all but it is super moisturizing for every section of my face. it noticeably helps me control oil production around my nose and forehead. i do get hormonal acne and this doesn't agitate my skin or ever make me breakout; it's super gentle. i put this on right before i do my makeup and it helps my foundation go on beautifully. i wear makeup often and was looking for the right moisturizer to go underneath for so long. this is a great moisturizer and primer in one and can be used day and night. the only thing is that it's a bit pricey and the tube runs out fast if you use it every day. in my opinion, it's worth it!

I was looking for a moisturizer that could combat my dry skin, which is actually a new development for me. I used to have ‚Äònormal‚Äô skin, but I noticed it was feeling really dry suddenly. My skin does NOT absorb shea butter very well so was having a hard time finding a moisturizer for dry skin without that ingredient. Gave the Super Ceramide 100 Renewal Cream a try and YES MA‚ÄôAM it works!! And it‚Äôs not heavy feeling AT ALL, which is so surprising considering the thick texture. It isn‚Äôt clogging my pores or any negative impacts on the rest of my skincare routine. I am almost finished with my first tube after around 3 months of use and just bought a second one. My new go-to!

reviewTitles: Best moisturizer and make-up primer for sensitive skin
review: I have sensitive skin (eczema, highly prone to rashes) and this moisturizer is my go-to when I want to hydrate my skin. On the rare occasion that I end up wearing make-up, I always follow my cleanse routine and then use this moisturizer as a primer for a smooth and hydrating base to prevent any flaking for a smooth BB cream application. I don't use this moisturizer daily as it's relatively pricey for less than 2fl oz, but it's great for travel and whenever you feel the need to deeply hydrate. It doesn't leave your skin oily and absorbs quickly, but it does go on thicker than a daily facial lotion.
I like this moisturizer. It is heavier than I am used to but it absorbs fairly quickly and doesn‚Äôt leave my face feelings greasy or oily.

reviewTitles: Still new to using this product
review: I applied it to my face for the first time last night. It was VERY RICH and heavy imo. I am not sure if it is a good or bad thing yet as I would need more time to discern this, but for now, I think it feels too heavy to use during the day time if you're going out. If you're just going to stay home the whole day (or in my case work remotely), then I think it's fine to use it during the day too. But if you plan on heading out shortly after your facial routine, I personally wouldn't use this before an outing as it feels too rich. I will be back to update this after a few weeks/months to see if I see/feel any difference from using this cream.
So smooth and smells great. Nice thick cream and my skin feels so moisturized.

It is not only very light on the face, it has that really subtle "unscented lotion" smell and - I would say - has slightly less of an odour than the Eucerin, though neither are noticeable or offensive. It has taken care of the persistent dry spots that Eucerin had no impact on! If they ever stop making this, I will be so sad.

i'm really on the fence about this cream, on the one hand it is really hydrating for my skin and doesn't leave a greasy residue like other creams with oils in them (especially since i have oily skin) and i definitely think my face is a lot more clearer since i've been using it. however, it really smells like celery (it disappears in a few minutes) and whenever i use my sunscreen after (either a matte one or a water-based one) my skin begins to flake, as if the cream is causing the sunscreen to start peeling off my face. it makes my skin look like it's flaking :((
A little goes a long way and so far so good! Makes my skin look moisturized and hydrated, but I think I will try Madecera next time to compare which one I like best!

This was recommended by the "skin concierge" service. I do love how quickly it absorbs and that it's none greasy. However the texture issues I wanted to target have not improved. I have kept using it for about a year now because it smells good, it's refreshing, absorbs quickly, moisturises with out being sticky and I did not break out. I will continue using it.
I got this moisturizer on a whim, but it actually turned out to be my second fav to my main moisturizer. I like to use this one at night to let it sink in over night. A+

I wasn‚Äôt expecting much when I tried this product on a whim, but it quickly became the favorite out of my routine. I use it day or night, honestly whenever I feel like it. To me, the scent is kind of light and not overbearing. It‚Äôs more somehow more like cucumber than celery. I‚Äôd compare it to the Thayer‚Äôs cucumber toner. As someone with oily skin, I was truly amazed at how matte this leaves my skin. My skin felt moisturized and hydrated, but without that thick shine oilier products can leave. I do feel like when I use it under makeup, my skin overall looks smoother. If you have oily skin, the kind that super shiny and almost tacky throughout the day, I really recommend you give this a try!! It‚Äôs the kind of product that doesn‚Äôt amplify oily skin.
Very light and smooth!
This moisturizer is light and goes on great for day wear under makeup. Has a light and refreshing smell. My skin stays moisturized and not oily by end of the day.

I gave this to my sister and this is what she said: It is not enough for my dry skin but did help a little. Has a very strong scent of celery but disappears in minutes (smelt good for me but it depends on your preference) The cream helped minimize my chicken skin around my eyes.

I really wanted to love this moisturizer as I love the cocokind essence. I love this brand as well. However, this cream made my skin feel tight and was not moisturizing enough. I also could not stand the smell. It was just too much for me.

I enjoy the feel of the product going on, it absorbs quickly and does not leave my skin feeling greasy. A little goes a long way. My only complaint is that I don't love the smell. I find there is a distinct celery smell when applying. It doesn't linger beyond that and certainly isn't enough to deter me from using it as my go-to morning moisturizer.

This moisturizer is simply just good! It takes a few seconds for it to really soak into the skin but what I like about it is that a little goes a very long way so you don‚Äôt need that much. I am not a fan of the celery smell but it takes a few to get used to. It‚Äôs hydrating and definitely brings life back to the face but there is just something missing that makes it great. If you‚Äôre looking for something simple this is good but because of the texture this might not be good for very oily skin!

productName: On The Little Book of Jeong
review: Impressive

productName: On The Little Book of Jeong
review: My partner and I are both mixed race (he is mixed with Korean and I am mixed with black) and both of us often find ourselves feeling disconnected from our cultures. I got this book to read together and help us look into our relations, as well as developing more empathy for others. This book has also helped us learn more about his culture. I am really appreciative of that and being able to use this book to learn new things and bond with my partner. It‚Äôs greatly written and leaves you feeling positive and hopeful in a world that often leaves you disheartened. Thanks Charlotte Cho!

productName: On The Little Book of Jeong
review: A little heartwarming read that I enjoyed so much that I decided to get another one to gift to a friend.

productName: On The Little Book of Jeong
review: I read this book while I was having a reunion of sorts with family I hadn't seen in nearly 2 years. The idea that you can pick up right where you left off with someone, without a lot of explanation or feeling guilty because of the time lost, and all because of this hard to define connection really resonated:)

productName: On The Little Book of Jeong
review: I‚Äôm not very much of a reader. I‚Äôve been a fan of Charlotte for a while, but ever since I‚Äôve gotten so involved in Korean skincare and entertainment, this book and the idea of Jeong always intrigued me. So I purchased it from audible. I had no idea what this meant and now I‚Äôve learnt to appreciate these feelings of sentiments, attachment, bonds and affection much more than I ever did before. It definitely reminds you to live with purpose. It helped me to remember all the Jeong and connection I‚Äôve made/experienced at several moments in my own life. Not only that, but I think the author gave some really good advice of not feeling manipulated by Jeong in a way in which you feel indebted / pressured but instead to stay firm by setting certain limits. All I want to say is thank you to Charlotte opening this window to Jeong for me! :) Your journey is very inspiring! x

productName: On The Little Book of Skin Care
review: I read this book about 4 years ago and since applying what I‚Äôve learned to my skin care routine, I‚Äôve never looked back! My skin has never been better in my whole life! This book is a must for anyone interested in learning about skin care!

review: I'm surprised by how much I'm enjoying this book. I thought it would be useful but didn't anticipate it being fun to read. The description in the book is clear and honest and immersive - it almost has an erotic quality. Definitely has motivated me to make taking care of my skin a priority.

productName: On The Little Book of Skin Care
review: A good start and good read to skincare, very informative.

productName: On The Little Book of Skin Care

This is an INCREDIBLE product--and the first one I have ever used that had made a visible difference hours after application!! I was really, REALLY apprehensive trying retinol, as I have read many horror stories (it took me almost a month to try it!), but with the lack of sleep I have been experiencing lately, I wanted to give it a try. WOWWWW!!! This morning my face was smooth and my enlarged pores had shrunk! I looked at the areas where I had placed the product, and the wrinkles were replaced with smooth skin! When I applied my makeup, it looked flawless!! I am definitely going to keep using this--and purchasing more!! AH-MAY-ZING!!!!

Following the instructions, this is making a lovely difference in my skin. I haven‚Äôt used retinol years and stayed with other moisturizing and firming products. I am so glad I tried this! I use at nights on Sundays and Thursdays so my skin feels best on Mondays and Fridays, which gives me a great mental boost. I‚Äôm not dried out and not reacting to this product at all. I‚Äôm a CosRX convert!

In my mid 30s and I've been noticing more deep fine lines ever since I came back from a trip from Korea. Maybe it's the air or the change in water that's been making it more visible or I'm just aging really fast in a short amount of time. I didn't want to use retinol but after seeing how my fine lines have been becoming more visible, I gave in and purchased.

After first use, I noticed that my skin felt very hydrated the next day and it felt so soft. I've been using it for more than a week now and I haven't been experiencing any dryness. I've been using it 3 times a week. My fine lines are still visible but not as much as before. I have avoided any oil products for my skin because I noticed that my skin does not like them, sometimes making my face dry or causing redness. Surprisingly I've had no issues with this.
