review: I bought the charcoal & organic cotton pads. I love using the charcoal option with my oil based cleanser for gentle makeup removal whereas I use the white pads for lightweight toners, essence and cleansing waters. The pads are thin, but that‚Äôs perfect for what I need them for!

productName: On The Sustainable Cleansing Pad Set
review: To be honest, not what I was expecting, these pads are two layer thin, soft knit material, I have glow recipe‚Äôs reusable cotton pads and they are thicker, but both tend to bunch up in the mesh bag when going in the washing machine and dryer, mine did not have a black edge , too soft and absorbent for toner or essence application, all for sustainability, but not with these

productName: On The Sustainable Cleansing Pad Set
reviewTitles: Is what it says on the tin
review: These are okay cotton pads. Smoother than the texture you would get with disposables, if you prefer the light exfoliation. After one wash they already got a little wavy, and the tags stick out, but still function well. I used the net bag they came in to wash them as well, and about half of them escaped during wash, hahaha. So I will have to use one with a zipper. Unsure if worth the price, but I am always glad to add a reusable item to my drawer.

productName: On The Sustainable Cleansing Pad Set
review: I wanted to find washable, reusable pads with a laundry bag that would help with the application of my AM cleanse (micellar water). It helps distribute the product and cleanse my face and stays super soft after washes. I personally wouldn't use this for toner, but feel that it helps with my mess-free cleansing.

productName: On The Sustainable Cleansing Pad Set
review: I bought these on a whim because I was out of cotton pads. I don't mind them so far. I don't have sensitive skin, but I could see how these might feel a little rough for someone who does. Although, I personally like the extra exfoliation. The mesh storage and washing bag will shrink significantly if you dry it.

productName: On The Sustainable Cleansing Pad Set
review: and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

reviewTitles: Best Affordable Vitamin C Serum I've tried so far
review: First, the cons: it smells like hot dog water and feels a little oily at first. It has both these things in common with a super expensive and popular vitamin C serum that my dermatologist sells. However, like that one, I can also use it without aggravating my rosacea and it seems to be effective so far.
The smell is short-lived and the oily feeling goes away pretty quickly, too. At this price point, I'm happy to keep using it.
The smell wasn't pleasant but I didn't mind it. I was so excited to try this as part of my night time routine but when I applied it on my face it started stinging and broke out my face. So sad :(

reviewTitles: Results in the matter of weeks
review: I am so glad that this is back‚Ä¶ It brightened up my skin and i am so happy with results. Already purchased another bottle, highly recommended!

I added this serum to my routine to see if it'll improve a few dark spots, and I started seeing results after 2 weeks of regular use! My dark spots are clearing up and blending with my face more and more everyday.

I was really excited for this because I haven‚Äôt really met a Cosrx product my skin doesn‚Äôt like but every time I tried to incorporate this into my routine, it left me waking with new blemishes/spots. There are a lot better vitamin c products for cheaper
with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

This was very good for my skin, but it left a tacky residue on my hands for a long time (too much glycerin?). Nonetheless, left my hands soft afterward. I just wished the gloves would be biodegradable!
I got these as a gift after my mother saw me using a set. Going to be part of her Valentine‚Äôs gift this year.
My hands are the driest they have ever been. This mask helped so much and there is a definite difference. Thank you !!!!
These masks are the real deal, super moisturizing, and keeps your hands looking great! Great scent!

These are great before bed, I often have trouble sleeping because of dry hands but this really locked moisture in and it‚Äôs a relaxing spa routine to keep these gloves on for a half an hour. I put hand lotion on after and it worked well for me.

productName: On Time Is Running Out Mist
review: The scent is light and dissipates quickly. Feels good and moisturizing on the face. Despite sensitive skin, no break outs. Also combination skin, but it does not make my oily sections oily. Just a good balance!

productName: On Time Is Running Out Mist
review: After I wash my face in the morning I pat my skin dry (but still a tiny bit dampish), then spray this all over my face probably three quick passes. I LOVE IT. I really think this gets my skin ready for my serums, moisturizer and SPF. I use this basically as a toner and have noticed subtle changes. It has a very nature scent to it which keeps me coming back to it. I do not however suggest using this for moister during the day because it can look too shiny.

productName: On Time Is Running Out Mist
review: Listen, some nights I just feel way to lazy to do my full 7 step skincare routine, so on those nights, I cleanse, spray this, and have great skin still! Love the scent it has as well.

productName: On Time Is Running Out Mist
review: I'm loving this mist!! It's so perfect for the cold weather. It's super hydrating, leaves this beautiful glow and the hydration feel lasts a while. I've become sensitive to scents as I've gotten older but love the citrus scent this has, and it doesn't linger for long. I've bought two full sizes during the sale and a mini travel one from another site since Soko doesn't carry it. I'm so happy I tired this mist, such a plus that this Sioris line is organic as well! A must try!

productName: On Time Is Running Out Mist
reviewTitles: This has been one of my favorites I've added to my routine!
review: I needed a new mist and was looking around, saw this and decided to pick it up. I know it seems a little counterproductive to add oil to your routine if you're oily but this is a good way to do so. This has help keep my face hydrated throughout the day that I was never an oil slick at the end of the day. Also the product is very light even the mist is super fine that it is refreshing. Would definitely recommend this to anyone.

productName: On Time Revolution Artemisia Pack Foam Cleanser
review: My face feels so clean after I use this foam cleanser. I‚Äôm outside with my kids this summer and this cleaner gets all that dirt out. I have dry skin and this cleaner does both tough jobs of getting my skin clean and not dry.

productName: On Time Revolution Artemisia Pack Foam Cleanser
review: A+

productName: On Time Revolution Artemisia Pack Foam Cleanser
reviewTitles: Great Cleanser but A Mini Caveat
review: So I think this is a great cleanser, it makes my face feel clean but not in a stripped sense. However, it might just be me and my skin type, but I question if this is for everyday use. By my third night using it (I personally use it day + night) I think it really threw my skin into a frenzy and this has caused my skin's ph to be thrown off wack so maybe this can be just a night cleanser or a 2x a week cleanser.

productName: On Time Revolution Artemisia Treatment Essence
review: Bought this for my sister who is acne prone and struggles with rocesea. She loves it. Her skin looks clearer and calmer when she uses it. We use the 7 skin layer method, patting in the essence up to 7x and it works

productName: On Time Revolution Artemisia Treatment Essence
reviewTitles: Great product but ingredient list is wrong
review: I love, love this essence and want to reorder but just a heads up that it is NOT just artemisia extract. Soko Glam, please update your page! Full ingredient list: Water, Dipropylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Propanediol, Artemisia Annua Extract

productName: On Time Revolution Artemisia Treatment Essence
reviewTitles: Lovely product though unsure how it will change ny skin
review: I am soooo glad I was able to get this for free bua my rewards points because lord the PRICE! Beautiful bottle, smells nice (don't think there's added fragrance) and great size (thought i would get a sample but thanks for the full size soko glam!) I really like using it; I'm into antioxidant rich toners which I believe this counts, and yes I said its a toner I'm sorry but essences are fancy synonyms for toners I said what I said. Don't know if I see a difference in my acne oily combo skin but it's a great way to wipe off excess dirt and makeup without stripping the skin. Unsure if I would purchase though.

productName: On Time Revolution Artemisia Treatment Essence
review: I'll start off by saying this is by far the most expensive product in my skincare line at $55. I first bought this for $30 at TJ Maxx and even then thought.... wow this is a lot (separately, would recommend checking your local TJ Maxx/Marshalls for Korean skicare b/c I've seen some Cosrx and Missha products among others pop up in the last year!). I could say unfortunatley I fell in love with it because now I'm shelling out the $$ haha :) One bottle lasts me 7 months though, so if you wait for sales or stock up your points to redeem for this product it really isn't that expensive to only spend it twice a year! This is a super lightweight essence (more akin to a toner I suppose). I use it as my first step in my morning routine. I've come to love the earthy smell - and of course I just immediately fell in love with the packaging itself! Wow it just feels so classy with the brown frosted glass packaging (the glass is, I suspect, the main reason for the high price). The ingredient is almost 100% mugwort extract, which I didn't know what it was until looking into it and I'm glad I purchased and discovered this ingredient! I think it's really helped clear any acne from my skin and combat the small breakouts I do infrequently get. Again, I know it's pricey but the ingredient is one you should include in your skincare (from Missha or elsewhere), and one bottle lasts about 6-7 months! I would recommed you at least try a bottle and see if your skin benefits :)

productName: On Time Revolution Artemisia Treatment Essence
review: My husband and I both love this so much. We both have sensitive skin. My husband used this after being on accutane. Super hydrating and calming. I use this everyday, twice a day and as a great base for my makeup routine.

productName: On Time Revolution Artemisia Treatment Essence [Mist Type]
review: I've been using this product for many years. It is just as good as the non-spray version. This spray version is very convenient for a quick daily routine. My skin feels great after every use.

productName: On Time Revolution Artemisia Treatment Essence [Mist Type]
review: Love this mist! Easy to apply under or over make-up and super hydrating. My dry skin loves it!

productName: On Time Revolution Artemisia Treatment Essence [Mist Type]
review: Been looking for a mist that works well in ALL SEASONS. Other mists I have had in the past didn't feel as moisturizing as this one. Happy to have this on my shelf.

productName: On Time Revolution Artemisia Treatment Essence [Mist Type]
reviewTitles: Mugwort is the best, so is this mist
review: I became obsessed with mugwort when I visited a spa that had a bath solely with mugwort and other herbs. It's incredibly refreshing, makes your skin and hair feel rejuvenated, and helps soothe the skin. I use this after an exfoliating toner and must have it around at all times!

productName: On Time Revolution Artemisia Treatment Essence [Mist Type]
review: Since I‚Äôve started using this my acne has just gotten so much better. And I love the spray and go aspect of this product.

productName: On Time Revolution Night Repair Ampoule 5X
review: Love this serum! Have been using it for years. Always my go to when I‚Äôm not trying something new or when my skin is in trouble. My husband always comments that my skin is glowing when I use missha time revolution serum.

productName: On Time Revolution Night Repair Ampoule 5X
review: This is one of those holy grail products. I naturally have combination skin but my moisture barrier is completely wrecked right now so I needed some thing that could improve things without being too harsh or too greasy. This completely addressed my texture problems and eliminated my fine lines all without not being too greasy. This stuff is liquid gold.

productName: On Time Revolution Night Repair Ampoule 5X
review: Feels good on the skin. A little goes a long way.

productName: On Time Revolution Night Repair Ampoule 5X
review: In the past months I've become a chronic skin picker and THIS have absolutely saved my skin. I have pretty sensitive skin so I don't like to splurge on a product in case it irritates my skin, but this recent black friday I was running out of my hyaluronic acid serum and decided to purchase this as a replacement. Each day my skin looks clearer, less red, and has less scars than the day before. I have dry-combo skin so I will add this isn't as moisturizing as I thought, so for dry skin I would recommend pairing this with a moisturizing essence.

productName: On Time Revolution The First Essence 5x
review: I have very reactive, sensitive skin along with melasma. I‚Äôve been using this daily for two weeks. I now add it to my d√©collet√© after my showers. I love this stuff. I‚Äôm already addicted.

productName: On Time Revolution The First Essence 5x
review: I really like this essence. It absorbs well and my skin feels a more moisturized after using it.

productName: On Time Revolution The First Essence 5x
review: I've been wanting to try this for awhile, and I'm so glad I finally got it! I only wish I started using it sooner. I feel like even with my acne scars that are taking a long time to fade, my skin still somehow is just so healthy looking since I've started using it. The bottle itself is so lovely to hold, I feel so fancy when I use it. Such a treat!

productName: On Time Revolution The First Essence 5x
review: This made a noticeable difference in my acneic skin in a short amount of time, and it feels so luxurious. Fast absorbing, so that makes it easy to layer quickly under moisturizer or SPF. Love this stuff!
Love this ampoule that makes my skin feel so tight and elastic!
This is my staple and I buy several bottles at once. Makes a visible difference in my skin.
Moisturizing and dried quick on the skin. I‚Äôm not sure if it‚Äôs worth the price though so I have yet to repurchase and probably would not be repurchasing.

productName: On Time Stop Peptide Eye Cream For Face
review: My dark circles have mostly disappeared and my eyes are looking so much tighter in the areas I use it on. I'm not sure how to describe it but it really leave the eyes looking youthful and tight on the skin.

productName: On Time Stop Peptide Eye Cream For Face
review: This eye cream is very rich and keeps my eye area VERY hydrated. It doesn't really help that my skin is oily and I don't really have any dryness concerns around the eyes, so it can get a bit 'greasy' in appearance. I still do like and recommend this eye cream, but to those that have very dry under eye areas. I will keep using this product, along with applying it to my face and neck...why not? It's great to also apply in these areas.

productName: On Time Stop Peptide Eye Cream For Face
review: This eye cream is just okay ‚Äî it‚Äôs not that hydrating and had a gel like, watery texture. Would prefer something thicker
Loving this serum. After applying my skin is glowing. I've been applying at night after cleansing and toning. Makes my skin feel soft and is not sticky. will continue using.

reviewTitles: Not sure how much it does, but it feels good
review: Feels great going on and soaks in immediately! I haven‚Äôt noticed any brightening (which is what I bought it for) but that may be a more long-term result. It‚Äôs really expensive but didn‚Äôt break me out. Definitely hydrating and I love the way the little beads dissolve. Just way too expensive for what it is. But I‚Äôm reordering to see if it has a more noticeable effect after another few months.

I have combination/sensitive skin that loves all the things this product is supposed to deliver however it just left me with tiny whiteheads every time I used it. I will say the texture is a bit thicker than water and it did leave my skin feeling hydrated

productName: On Toner Mate 2 in 1 Cotton Pad
review: These are the only ones I use. I love how there's two textures to fit your routine.

productName: On Toner Mate 2 in 1 Cotton Pad
review: I‚Äôm a repeat customer of this product. I just loved how effective and efficient it is when it comes to cleansing my sensitive skin.

productName: On Toner Mate 2 in 1 Cotton Pad
review: Super soft and thick!

productName: On Toner Mate 2 in 1 Cotton Pad
review: Love the two types of cotton pads you get. One I use to wipe things off my face and the other to use with my toner, which makes me use less product too. I always have a backup box.

productName: On Toner Mate 2 in 1 Cotton Pad
review: Not sure how they came up with these but they‚Äôre amazing! They hold the perfect amount of toner and essence so that just a few drops can be applied to your whole face. My product is distributed just as evenly (if not more) than regular cotton pads, but I‚Äôm using significantly more product. I‚Äôll never use other cotton pads again

productName: On Toner Mate 2 in 1 Cotton Pad
review: I love the sponge ones for depositing my toner without absorbing it. Makes it so easy to spread. The traditional pads I use for areas I feel are more ‚Äúdirty‚Äù like my neck to remove SPF and makeup when I‚Äôm not hopping in the shower in my night routine. They‚Äôre sooo good!

productName: On Toner Mate 2 in 1 Cotton Pad
review: i love these cotton pads. doesn't leave fuzzies and also doesn't just suck up all of your product leaving you with less product for your face. i used it with some aloe vera to wipe away my hair from my face after plucking and it picked up all of the hair. this lasted me so long too

productName: On Toner Mate 2 in 1 Cotton Pad
review: The pressed pad is great for toners sweeping across skin, the fluffy pad is good for pressing essence into skin, my favorite pads, don‚Äôt leave fuzz and is stiff enough to sweep, no shredding doesn‚Äôt soak up too much product being wasteful, can‚Äôt beat the price

productName: On Toner Mate 2 in 1 Cotton Pad
review: I have enjoyed the compressed cotton pad SO much, I use it to apply my toner and I find I use an optimal amount of product and less waste. I have been using these pads for about a month now

productName: On Toner Mate 2 in 1 Cotton Pad
review: I purchased these toner pads after reading a blog post about them on The Klog. They are absolutely amazing and do everything they claim to do! The box comes with over 100 toner pads. Half of the pads are thin with a durable consistency, almost like stock paper. When I apply my cleansing toner to this pad it does what it's meant to do, cleanses by wiping away any cleanser or dirt/makeup you may have missed during cleansing.

This essence is super hydrating and it leaves my skin feeling plump and soft. At nighttime I like to layer it 3x. I also keep the bottle in my skincare fridge so when I splash it on my face and neck it feels amazing. I have normal skin so this works perfect for me.

reviewTitles: Good Pick for A Minimalist Routine that wants Galactomyces
review: I got interested in this after Kelly Driscoll mentioned it -- I swear by galactomyces in my routine because it really helps with my pore size and skin brightness. I've been using this, functionally, as a first treatment essence (think Missha, SK-II etc). It's a bit heavy for that, frankly, but layers beautifully. I appreciate that it adds other ferments, niacinamide and sea buckthorn extract, too, because this makes it a go-to on days when I'm feeling a shorter routine.
Hydrate et pr√©pare bien ma peau √† mes s√©rums
I usually skip the toner when I double cleanse and go straight to this essence. It is very hydrating and does not leave a sticky residue that interferes with your serums or creams.

I was hesitant to purchase this as it is a bit pricey for me, but there is a lot of product in the bottle! My skin breaks out easily and is on the dryer side. This was very moisturizing and smoothing and didn't leave a sticky film! I typically don't like the way toners feel but this one is amazing! I definitely felt like this made my skin more smooth and healthy. Once the bottle was gone I noticed that my skin wasn't as bright. Worth repurchasing!
Bottle is small but for the price it makes sense. I like it very light scent and doesn‚Äôt make my scalp as itchy as a few others
I hope this come with a bigger bottle. It does calm my SB a bit.

reviewTitles: This + Tea Tree Scalp Pack = No Dandruff
review: I have been struggling with dandruff caused by eczema for a couple of years now. At one point it was so bad that even if I put my hair up, flakes would rain down during the day. I had scabs on the back of my scalp that were eczema build-ups. I was so embarrassed. On a whim, I got this and the Tea Tree Scalp Pack (also sold here and made by the same company) and it has been such a game-changer. I have ZERO flakiness and no more itchy, irritated scalp or eczema a build-up. It is literally so amazing! It very gently suds but still cleans all my hair care products out effectively. For me, with short hair, a little goes a long way. I have about a third of the bottle left and that has taken me 3 months of every-other-day use to get down that low. I am buying more in anticipation of running out because I do not want to be without this combo. I really hope they sell a larger size soon!! It should also be noted I use a scalp massager (I bought it at TJ Maxx for 4 bucks) to go with this since my long nails were sometimes scratching my scalp too hard. Would also totally recommend one of those because it gently exfoliates your scalp and prevents flaky build-up!

reviewTitles: Would honestly buy if it was bigger
review: This was really nice to use. I used it both with mid-back length, thick hair and after a big haircut that left it jawline short. Both cases, double wash as recommended was always needed because the first would never lather and the amt of product you go through to get a decent lather or remove products with certainty was a little too annoying. It's a very small bottle (for those of us who grew up with costco-sized pantene, this looks like shampoo for a doll), but I'd honestly buy more if the option for larger bottles or 36oz pumps was offered. The smell was also really nice and soothing for a shower.

After I started using this shampoo and conditioner, I began to experience major hair loss. Initially, I thought it was from stress, but once I stopped using it, hair loss was extremely less. This was just my own experience. I believe this product is made with sulfates. I would not recommend this product.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error and I‚Äôm sorry that this shampoo did not work for you, and that you experienced hair loss. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences:)

It's a very small bottle (for those of us who grew up with costco-sized pantene, this looks like shampoo for a doll), but I'd honestly buy more if the option for larger bottles or 36oz pumps was offered. The smell was also really nice and soothing for a shower.
I‚Äôm so happy I got this. My scalp is so happy. Normally shampoo gives me blisters. Great stuff!

At first, I thought it was just an alright shampoo, like many others, I noticed little to no fragrance and not very sudsy; my hair felt clean but not exceptional. Then the next day, I went to put my super fine hair, which is normally a grease pot about 12 hours after shampooing, into a ponytail and was shocked to find my hair still looked freshly washed. My sensitive scalp felt better, my hair was soft and shiny. This shampoo isn‚Äôt flashy, it‚Äôs just essentially good. It will quietly and efficiently make your hair look and feel naturally beautiful. And it‚Äôs a great price.
It's ok.

reviewTitles: The only shampoo I'll use now
review: I've experienced a ton of stress-related hair loss + dandruff the previous few months and this shampoo soothes it all. I have barely any flakes after using it for a month and I think it has also improved my hair follicle health! Very happy, buying my second bottle right now :)
It keeps my hair and scalp healthy.

A fabulous shampoo that weightlessly hydrated and leaves you scalp feeling nice and clean. I also really enjoy the tumeric in this as I can tell a difference in my hair and scalp.

reviewTitles: I FINALLY GOT RID OF MY ITCHY SCALP
review: Cleans without drying out your scalp.

reviewTitles: Great for what they're supposed to do
review: Definitely serves its purpose. I like to even use the pads to wipe areas I want to apply pimple patches to.

If i could give this product a 6//5 I would! I get regular hormonal, cystic pimples that I cannot pop but hurt (usually around my ears, jawline, and nose). They are the worst but these patches have been the only thing to quickly clear them up. I adore these patches so much. I have found that, for the really bad cystic pimples, they reduce them significantly and, for the average pimples, they clear up them up entirely. If I have a really gnarly one, I will use the cleaning wipe to clean the area after double cleansing then I will put a tiny drop of salicylic acid, which I let dry, then i put the patch over and it works like a charm. AMAZING!
these honestly work so much better than i ever expected. they really help to get rid of blemishes overnight.

These patches are INCREDIBLE. They're a bit expensive, so I save them for when they're really needed, but I love them. They're the only thing that I've used that really get at the deeper, cystic-type acne.

reviewTitles: Not as good as ZitSticka, but still works
review: I tackle my cystic acne with microdart patches and love the results. These patches are effective, but not as effectiveas ZitSticka patches. These have smaller microdarts.

productName: On True Water Deep Moisture Cream EX
review: This product is definitely not worth the price tag. I really liked their gel mask as an overnight mask which works wonderfully so I gave this a try. So disappointed. Even though it's winter, other products I've used as my last step have held up well for most of the day. With this, I'm lucky if I get two hours before my skin feels like paper.

productName: On True Water Deep Moisture Cream EX
review: Thanks for your feedback!

I purchased this stick because I had a bad break out from a cosmetic product that I used and the pimples left dark spots on my forehead. I have used this stick day and night for the suggested 20 mins, and have seen a noticeable difference in the fading of my dark spots. It always helps with spot treatment for pimples. I‚Äôm going to stick up on this !

I got this mostly as an easy way to bring a face mask once travelling again. Glad I did, because it turns out it makes a great spot treatment for me! Non-drying, no breakouts - does bring some stuff to the surface obviously, but for me it then disappears within a day- and the easiest mask you will ever apply. It is very yellow when you put it on, but it comes off with a damp cotton ball or cotton pad. Do note that it will stain reusable cotton rounds.
does as advertised, really good

reviewTitles: Requires washing off, but seems to work
review: I agree with other reviewers that this stick mask definitely turns your face turmeric colored. That said, I used a gentle cleanser‚Äîtwo times‚Äîto wash off the mask and was good to go with no yellow residue.

As someone who studied Ayurveda, I appreciate the known efficacy of turmeric, and the stick does make the application less messy and stain-prone. So overall, I‚Äôm happy with the purchase, because I knew what I was getting into with turmeric.
It doesn't work fast, so multiple uses are needed. I DOES however keep you looking like you have patchy jaundice. i'm not a fan and regret the purchase, but hey, I use what I buy. Three stars.
Love the ingredients.

Purchased this for my mom and she didn't really see any changes in her skin after finishing the bottle. Her skin is slightly more nourished but there wasn't a brightening or smoothing effect seen. Maybe this is better for the younger folks, whose wrinkles or spots haven't been around for too long.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I‚Äôm sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

reviewTitles: Different than anything I‚Äôve ever tried
review: The texture is the most interesting thing. It‚Äôs so smooth and moisturizing. It‚Äôs kind of drippy like cheese on a pizza so be careful when you scoop it out! My skin is very happy with the product
Very hydrating and perfect for dry skin and upcoming winter weather. Smells nice, light and not too perfume-y

One of my favorite products that I ordered from Soko Glam. It has improved the quakity and apperance of my skin. I have very dry skin and am reaching my late 20s now, so I'm concerned with aging. This moisturizer helped to both soften my skin without causing irritation or breakouts.
This is the best moisturizer I have ever used.
I love this product! It's a rich luxurious cream. The consistency is thick and melts into your skin.
Perfect for my semi-oily skin, it feels moisturized without being too shiny
I have combination skin type, I like this emulsion but my skin still feels like it needs more hydration after application. It glides on smooth and absorbs quickly into skin.

It‚Äôs thicker than the Dr.Oracle emulsion which is ok... but I like the thin consistency on dr. Oracle. I have sensitive/combo skin and sometimes it comes with hormonal acne but other than that this is a really good emulsion. If another emulsion comes out that I know i won‚Äôt be a fan of then I‚Äôll probably just keep using this one for my T-zone ( I use the skin rxlab pink tube moisturizer for my inflamed cheeks)
Too heavy for my skin in summer
It wasn‚Äôt haydating enough for my skin which has become very dehydrated but I would say it‚Äôs still a great daytime cream for oily skins types.

I was hesitant to switch lotions as I had one that worked okay, but was a tad greasy. After lots of research on Soko Glam, decided to try the Dewytree emulsion lotion. Love that you don't need a lot of this product, it doesn't feel greasy, doesn't cause breakouts, and leaves my skin with a dewy look/feel which I have never been able to achieve before. Still a work in progress, but this lotion helps a lot along with the whole routine.

Perfect for combo skin. I do not have increased breakouts with this lotion, feels lightweight, works great under sunscreen and makeup (when I wear it). Also works well with sensitive skin and dry patches. I've never had redness with this product, and on a recent trip I really missed using this! The bottle is nice, stores easily and only pumps out enough lotion for your needs so you aren't wasting any product. As I always say...wish there was a travel size option available but I'll be repacking this one into a tinier bottle in the future if I ever need to do so.

Product is more expensive, however the bottle is 5 oz and like I said above, you don't need a lot so I can see this lasting a long time. Also ideal for desert climate, however, I would use this in any climate with my skin for such positive results.

productName: On Ultra Vitalizing Snail Essence Water
review: I have normal sensitive skin and this essence works well with my skin. It did not clog my pores and absorbs quickly! It also did not break me out which sometimes happens with snail products! This is my second bottle.

productName: On Ultra Vitalizing Snail Essence Water
review: So far so good. Hasn't WOWed me in particular. I feel like there may be better out there? Also, the fragrance is very much there. It's not a bad scent but I wasn't expecting it. Over all its ok!

productName: On Ultra Vitalizing Snail Essence Water
review: with your order number and we will be happy to get you all sorted!

productName: On Ultra Vitalizing Snail Essence Water
review: I really love this essence. As a person with dehydrated oily skin, this has worked wonders. My skin feels and looks so good when I use this, especially in the winter months. I cannot recommend enough!

productName: On Ultra Vitalizing Snail Essence Water
reviewTitles: Great first step in my routine
review: I was looking for a snail essence and this one was highly rated everywhere. I love how soft it's made my skin especially since I use it as my 1st step after cleansing. It reminds me of Nature Republic's skin booster & emulsion, but 1000x better. As a licensed esthetician, I approve!

productName: On Ultra Vitalizing Snail Essence Water
review: I really like how this makes my skin feel afterwards.

productName: On Ultra Vitalizing Snail Essence Water
review: I use this morning and evening on a cotton round in lieu of an eye cream (my oily skin can't handle eye creams). It's incredibly hydrating and is doing wonders for keeping ageing at bay. There is fragrance, but it's very subtle and goes away almost immediately. IMO, better than CosRX's similar product. I absolutely love this product and will absolutely continue to repurchase.

productName: On Ultra Vitalizing Snail Essence Water

productName: On Ultra Vitalizing Snail Essence Water
review: I love this stuff. I'm on my 5 or 6 bottle.

I have combination skin, leaning more towards oily skin and this essence always leaves me feeling clean and fresh.

productName: On Ultra Vitalizing Snail Essence Water
review: So far, I‚Äôve had a good experience with this product. The product goes on well, is absorbed well, but it does have a strong scent. I personally love the scent‚Ä¶it‚Äôs earthy, like a cologne and it doesn‚Äôt linger too long.

productName: On Ultra Vitalizing Snail Essence Water

Love, love, love this! My skin is so soft and it smells amazing!!

productName: On UV Defense Sun Protector EX SPF 39
review: I'm super picky about the face sunscreens I use (mainly stick with EltaMd UV Clear with Supergoop unseen sunscreen as a runner-up), so I was surprised to find that I really enjoy this one! It comes out white but doesn't leave a white cast. It doesn't have the gross sunscreen smell I hate and it goes on light and leaves this beautiful glow--not oily or greasy at all! For reference, I have combination skin that leans dry + acne prone. Definitely recommend this one!

productName: On UV Defense Sun Protector EX SPF 39
review: Wow, this product is absolutely amazing! Not only is it incredibly effective at what it does, but it's also super lightweight and absorbs into my skin in no time at all. Plus, it's so sheer on my skin that there's no residue or cast left behind. I absolutely cannot recommend this product enough ‚Äì it's an absolute must-have!

productName: On UV Defense Sun Protector EX SPF 39
review: I love how it‚Äôs a lightweight sunscreen and has a nice smell.

productName: On UV Defense Sun Protector EX SPF 39
review: This product is great. It‚Äôs not fragranced at all and has absolutely zero cast. I apply using the 2 finger rule so using a liberal amount of product and even before it‚Äôs fully absorbed I knew there‚Äôd be no case on my dark brown skin (think the great Coco Jones‚Äô skin tone) so that‚Äôs saying a lot.

This seems good, and definitely was more hydrating than my normal cream. I have tried a few eye creams and have never really been impressed by them or noticed much of a difference. Still using it - the bottle is so huge and definitely lasts a long time. Will probably try something different next.

A decent thick and hydrating eye cream. Feels nice, no bad smell. I just have to be careful not to get milia since it's thick. I noticed a few bumps develop under one eye, but should be okay if used in very small amounts. Not that I ever used that much! But something to note. Really the tiniest amount is enough if you're like me. I have sensitive skin, though.
Worth it for the price if you catch it on sale.
I have sensitive skin and this eye cream does not irritate my eyes at all. I love how moisturizing this is, it's even easy to layer in the morning- not just for my night routine!
Amazing

reviewTitles: Decent moisturizer. Not a fan of the stick in it
review: The moisturizer I would say is good for autumn. For the winter, you might need some extra layers (ie. Essence etc). The jar is more on the tall cylinder side. It has an interesting stick to grab the moisturizer but it's harder to grab enough in one go. (Or maybe I am supposed to use my fingers and use the stick when the cream is running low).

Great product! I live in a desert, work in a kitchen and have dry skin and this moisturizer saved my skin. I noticed a difference right away and continued to notice a difference until the end of the container. I will definitely order again.
Been using this for 3 weeks, haven't seen any changes. It actually seems to be very drying

reviewTitles: One of my top favorite vitamin c serum
review: I love this Vitamin C serum. It kept my skin hydrated and bright during the winter. Cannot wait to purchase this again.

I love the texture of this serum and how it made my skin feel. It is super silky and is really enjoyable to put on. I'm not sure if it has had any long term or super drastic effects after finishing a bottle, but it gives a great glow to the skin. It also looks great under any makeup!

reviewTitles: Pretty good but not the best
review: Definitely noticed some brightening and hydrating effects of this serum, but not so much on skin elasticity. It is pretty good and I will probably get through the whole bottle, but didn't have the most visible effects.
I love this product. I have been using it daily for a month now, and it leaves my skin smooth and soft. I ended up ordering another just in case I ran out.

Naturium is my new favorite brand in recent month; however, I had a bad breakout with this one. I have very sensitive, easily irritated skin that is highly reactive unfortunately. It might be the sunflower oil or possibly the lactic acid might be too strong yet difficult to pinpoint.
This cream has been perfect for cold and dry winter weather! It has a slight thicker consistency but it does not feel heavy or clogs my skin. I love it

Great moisturizing cream that goes on smoothly. It's a bit heavy to use during the day, but I use it as a night cream and wake up with my skin soft and smooth. I love the scent and it feels truly luxurious!
My go to moisturizer! It leaves my skin feeling so hydrated & bright! It also helps fill in the little smile lines I have. Definitely recommend üôåüèº

i wanted a rich moisturizer for the colder weather and while i do like the product, it might be too rich for my combination skin. it feels sticky for a few hours after applying. i expected it to smell sour because of the name but it has a faint sweet scent that is very nice.

Decided to try this moisturizer and found it to be perfect for my skin. I‚Äôm oily most days and found that only natural products can help the oil in check. This one is silky smooth and feels decadent without overwhelming my skin. Def worth a try!

I have been using this product basically everyday for 3 weeks now and since week one I noticed a big change on my skin. Its feels smooth hydrated and its really been helpful to control and prevent acne breakouts! I only skip it when using AHA once or twice a week and it has not dryed or irritated my skin.
Refreshing, works well for my combination sensitive skin
got this as a sample and used the whole bottle! i need to get another full sized one

I love this toner. I believe I received it the 2020 Advent calender and have been waiting to buy the big bottle since then. So glad the day finally arrived. This toner leaves my face feeling clean, it seems like it evens out my combination skin. My face just signs with relief after using. I follow it up with an essence. Love it.

reviewTitles: The best my skin has looked
review: I got the mini size in the advent calendar. I was traveling so I brought this and I started using this in place of my regular chemical exfoliant for a week. This is the best my skin has looked in years.

productName: On Vita C Plus Brightening Toner
review: There‚Äôs a reason why it‚Äôs sold out. It truly brightened my complexion and even my skin tone. Definitely a must have in your beauty regimen and a repurchase.

productName: On Vita C Plus Brightening Toner
review: Great product, but not AMAZING. I think for my skin type i need something a little more effective but still a great product that a lot of people's skin type would work well with imo

productName: On Vita C Plus Brightening Toner
review: My skin seems to be doing well with this product. Love the vitamin c component and great price point!

productName: On Vita C Plus Brightening Toner
review: I've been using this for a little over a month, and so far it's wonderful. I've noticed that my skin looks brighter and feels more plump. I think the Vitamin C helps with my skin cell turnover. I turned 30 last year and have noticed a subtle change in my skin. I purchased this to add a functional, easy Vitamin C product to my routine every day, and so far it's been great.

productName: On Vita C Plus Brightening Toner
review: I've only been using this a little over a month, but so far I love it! It smells nice but not too strong, doesn't feel sticky on my skin and I do feel like it has made my skin brighter. I've been having fewer issues with hyperpigmentation, which is a huge plus! Would recommend to a friend.

productName: On Vita C Plus Spot Correcting & Firming Ampoule
review: Noticed a difference just after two weeks ! Will definitely buy again !!

productName: On Vita C Plus Spot Correcting & Firming Ampoule
review: Si por la noche tuviera un brote o parche seco, √©sta ampolla soluciona el problema, se absorbe con facilidad y hace que mi humectante se deslice de una manera magn√≠fica, apenas tengo una semana us√°ndola y ya he visto cambios en mi carita ‚ò∫

productName: On Vita C Plus Spot Correcting & Firming Ampoule
review: This is my new favorite Vitamin C serum. It's multifunctional and my skin is glowing! It feels a littler firmer and my skin is more even. I've been using a vitamin C serum for close to 10 years and I've tried quite a few. I have sensitive, combination skin in the summer and I'm drier in the winter, just for context.

productName: On Vita C Plus Spot Correcting & Firming Ampoule
review: I‚Äôm liking it so far. It‚Äôs more lightweight. Doesn‚Äôt have a sticky feeling and smells decent. I haven‚Äôt broken out or anything yet. I‚Äôm hoping it helps with old scars on my face. I have the Klairs Vitamin C and enjoy it so far.

productName: On Vita C Plus Spot Correcting & Firming Ampoule

review: I am 63 with sensitive skin. I always use Vitamin C, I have tried Skin Ceuticals which is very expensive. I thought I would give this potent serum a try. It has not caused any trouble with my skin. It is on the thick side, not thin and watery like SC. I hope it does as good of a job. So far so good.

productName: On Vita C Plus Spot Correcting & Firming Ampoule
review: Just got this and have been using for a week! It‚Äôs a little thick in consistency but goes on very smoothly. It has a citrusy scent which I don‚Äôt mind. I like it so far!

productName: On Vita C Plus Spot Correcting & Firming Ampoule
review: Product absorbs easily and doesn‚Äôt feel sticky. It had lightened up some discoloration on my face. I highly recommend it. It was recommended to me by the Soko aesthetician.

productName: On Vita C Plus Spot Correcting & Firming Ampoule
review: I am using it for a month now. Observing that my dark spots are fading. Will keep using it. Leaves the skin very soft

productName: On Vita C Plus Spot Correcting & Firming Ampoule
review: Really enjoy this serum, my skin feels firmer and brighter

productName: On Vita C Plus Spot Correcting & Firming Ampoule
review: She says it makes her feel young and I've seen some difference in her face so far.

productName: On Vita Duo Cream Joan Day Joan Night
review: Can‚Äôt say enough good things about this day and night moisturizer. I got it while pregnant as a nontoxic way to keep my skin healthy and it was incredible.

productName: On Vita Duo Cream Joan Day Joan Night
review: I've been a diehard Cetaphil user for years but I think this product is even better, really leaving my skin feeling light, tight, and glowing. Very convenient to have the day and night in the same bottle but thoughtfully separated so nothing spills over. I've used it for a few days and I can already feel a real difference in my skin clarity.

productName: On Vita Duo Cream Joan Day Joan Night
review: Love the way this makes my skin feel hydrated and smooth. The night cream tingles a little making me feel like it‚Äôs working to heal small blemishes.

productName: On Vita Duo Cream Joan Day Joan Night
review: I bought this a year ago and still have plenty left! You don‚Äôt need much. The day cream is nice and light and not grease once absorbed. The night gel is cool and calming, not greasy at all. Both leave my skin feeling soft and refreshed.

productName: On Vita Duo Cream Joan Day Joan Night
review: No words for this. On my 3rd one and absolutely in love with how it makes my skin feel!
This moisturizer Brightens up my skin giving me a radiate look.
This has been my daily moisturizer for the last year! It's great to put on skin right before makeup and hydrating enough to put on before bed. Creamy texture and neutral smell. I love the refill too!

I tried this when my previous moisturizer ran out and it was out of stock, but now I can't possibly go back. I use it day & night and my sensitive combination skin loves it! I also really like that the packaging has refills, it feels way less wasteful than other moisturizers I've tried. Neogen really knocked it out of the park with this one!
Makes my skin feel like velvet
I have been bouncing around moisturizers for some time now, and this one just was not it. It moisturized my skin but was nothing spectacular. Probably would not revisit this one.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I‚Äôm sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

I've been purchasing my skincare products exclusively from Soko for close to 4 years now and I'm a little ashamed to admit that I think this might be the first review I have written. I CANNOT live without this product. I use it mostly as a spot treatment but will occasionally use it all over my face. I feel like it's most effective as a spot treatment. I experience hormonal breakouts and will sometimes have a really deep cystic spot beginning to form. When that happens I will spot treat the area with this at night. If I can tell the breakout has extra potential, I'll use a tiny dab of it in the morning. This product makes my breakout completely disappear, and quickly. I have never used a product that works this well. 10000/10
Works well against acne and other irregularities on the face but against fine wrinkles or stronger, it doesn't work. Tretinoin is much better choice.
Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I‚Äôm sorry that this product did not work for you.

Great eye cream with good spreadability. I was afraid of retinol being too strong and irritating but I experienced no stinging. I was careful to not get too close to the eyes because I didn't want to risk getting some in my eye. I recommend it for anyone who is concerned with fine lines around the eye area. I also used it on my smile lines. :)

I have been using this eye cream at night for a little less than a month. When I wake, my under eyes are supple and fine lines are less visible. I did use it one morning, just to try it for day, and it did not work well under my concealer, which is the only makeup I consistently wear. I have a feeling this will become my favorite eye cream quickly.

I like this eye cream, however, the difference around the eyes are not as dramatic as what the facial version of this product does to my face. It's a little greasy but bearable. I'll keep on using the rest of the tube to see if the improvement is noticeable.

I love this eye and neck cream. I've been using it at night for over a week now and seeing visible results in the fine lines under my eyes. I also use on my neck as well. It feels very hydrating for a retinol product. This will be a definite must have for me.

I am almost 35 and Korean w few wrinkles as of yet. Lately, I started to feel like my skin was sagging round eyelids and on neck. It was a stressful year and it shows in ways it never has before. I decided to try this cream in an attempt to delay further sagging and tighten up my skin. I previously used very basic eye creams but nothing specifically like this or this expensive. I think the size of the tube is good ‚Äîalthough not sure how much I can use on my neck. It does burn a bit when I get it in my eyes and makes them tear. Wrinkles seem lighter but I‚Äôve also changed face washes, toner, and serum (all from SOKO!) so it might be a combo of revamping my skin care which I do every 6 months. I‚Äôll update in a few weeks once I have consistently used!
Love the texture. Great for night time! Feel like I‚Äôm getting results quickly.

This has been the best gamble I‚Äôve taken. Love it for my undereyes which are becoming brighter and more even. My necks is more supple and I wake up with a beautiful glow. Retinol burns my skin so I‚Äôm so happy to have found a better - and natural - alternative!
I‚Äôve tried this for a little over two weeks mostly on my neck.

This eye cream feels so rich and hydrates the skin under my eyes beautifully. There is a noticeable reduction of fine lines around my eyes. I‚Äôve been using this on my neck area and the deep lines look so much lighter and less noticeable. I‚Äôm very happy with this product. Thank you, SOKO!
I luv it my eyes are not dark or looks tired any more and my neck area is more firm i like it better than the acwell eye cream it does make a difference

Tried it for several days and never left any irritation. Left my under-eyes area soft and moisturized.

I‚Äôve noticed my dark spots are getting lighter. I enjoy this

Enjoying this far. Have used quite a few different vitamin c serums over the years but am enjoying this one so far. Does leave a sticky feeling on the skin but isn‚Äôt an issue when followed up with a moisturizer

I have never used this brand aside from their Vitamin C serum. It‚Äôs very light weight and almost feels like a gel. It didn‚Äôt irritate my skin and pairs well with a light weight moisturizer and SPF.
I love that this vitamin c is not heavy or sticky. I noticed a difference in how even my skin tone was. Nice, not overwhelming/ fake smell.

I love to combine vitaminc C and E in my morning routine and this one has both! Application on skin is smooth, has a natural finish, and plays well with my moisturizer and spf. Can get sticky if you pat it in for far too long so no need to over-pat ;)
Another hit from Naturium. This is a great serum.
My skin glows after using this! This is my new daily serum

Beautiful vitamin C which helps to brighten my skin and work with my spf against free radicals. Naturium is now available in the UK through Space NK but will still be using Soko Glam due to not all products have been released to the UK yet

productName: On Vitamin C Glow Capsule Lotion
review: Received a sample of this product with one of my orders. Felt my skin get softer over a few days. Need to purchase a full bottle of this stuff. It's the best!

productName: On Vitamin C Glow Capsule Lotion
review: I started with the sample and went from there. No breakouts and I've notice the difference with my dark spots. Thanks!

productName: On Vitamin C Glow Capsule Lotion
review: This has been one of my favorite moisturizers! It really went far and felt smooth with no residue! I love the ingredients and the vitamin C capsules!just an overall very well formulated moisturizer!

productName: On Vitamin C Glow Capsule Lotion
reviewTitles: Great lightweight face lotion for the summer
review: It's a great lightweight face lotion for the summertime but a little too lightweight for cold winter.

productName: On Vitamin C Glow Capsule Lotion
review: This feels like a light moisturizer. Application was great but after a while, my face feels tight. I would layer another light moisturizer on top of this. Great packaging though!
I use it daily and love the texture.
Got this for my boyfriend as part of a "beginner" skincare routine. He liked that you could use it as a mask or a cleanser!

I didn‚Äôt feel like it did much, it didn‚Äôt damage my skin but I also didn‚Äôt feel like it benefited from it. I‚Äôve used other clay masks that either did a good job clearing out clogged pores or hydrating the skin, I feel like this mask is trying to do both and didn‚Äôt do either that well.

productName: On Vitamin C Glow Powder Cleanser
review: New favorite. Love the formulation, my face GLOWS after use. I have gifted this to friends who are equally obsessed. I have acne prone skin and any bumps/clogged pores disappear,‚Äù. My skin texture becomes radiant.

productName: On Vitamin C Glow Powder Cleanser
review: I love this cleanser, it is gentle and doesn't dry out my skin, but leaves it supple and soft after cleansing. I love to use it in the morning, and sometimes don't mix it completely in my hands before using so I get a little exfoliation. I've noticed my skin is brighter and more even toned. Love it!

productName: On Vitamin C Glow Powder Cleanser
review: I got a free sample of this from one of my orders and decided to try it out since I was looking for an exfoliating cleanser that's gentle and doesn't irritate my skin. I was a little skeptical if it would work for me since I haven't used a powdered formula for a cleanser so this is just something new. It lathers really well when you put some water on it and I like how it feels on my face. I didn't have any reactions and my face felt clean and bright after using it. I use this every other day after my regular facial cleanser and my face doesn't feel dry and tight after. I have been using this for almost a year now and I still have some left so definitely worth it!

productName: On Vitamin C Glow Powder Cleanser
review: I LOVE this cleanser, it deep cleans without drying and lasts a long time. I have seen a change in my skins brightness and radiance since using.

productName: On Vitamin C Glow Powder Cleanser
review: When I first tapped out the dry grains of this cleansing powder from the sample, I was prepared to hate it! It reminded me of the dry powder we used to wash our hands with at school when I was a kid. But I was WRONG! When I applied the moistened powder, it lathered into a gentle, creamy foam that cleaned my skin thoroughly. It rinsed easily, leaving my skin soft, moist and so clean. I absolutely love this cleanser!

productName: On Vitamin Tree Water Gel Cream
review: I‚Äôm obsessed with this water gel. I‚Äôm picky with moisturizer and now I‚Äôve found the right one. It‚Äôs not heavy and it‚Äôs not liquidy, hence the name ‚Äúgel cream.‚Äù I‚Äôve been doing the ‚Äúslugging‚Äù technique with this at nighttime and on my days off. I slather it on and my skin just drinks it in. There‚Äôs no fragrance but it just feels so good, clean and luxurious on my skin.

productName: On Vitamin Tree Water Gel Cream
review: I absolutely love this moisturizer. It is so hydrating and a little goes a long way. I also mix this with my foundation, and my face does not cake up at all. It doesn't have a smell, which I love for my sensitive skin. I will repurchase this forever because it is amazing.

productName: On Vitamin Tree Water Gel Cream
review: I really love this Gel cream! its super light, glides on smoothly and leave my skin feeling moist and fresh without any oil residue. its very cooling ; i used it while on vacation and it was perfect after long days in the sun. I alos love to pair this with Misha snail night mask. wake up to dewy relaxed skin next day. easily a fav. highly recomend.

productName: On Vitamin Tree Water Gel Cream
review: Super light, no fragrance, makes your skin feel soft! I am very happy with this product.

productName: On Vitamin Tree Water Gel Cream
review: A nice product for the summer or if you're extremely oily then it can be used year-round. if you have very dry skin I would not recommend as it might be too light.

productName: On Vitamin Tree Water Gel Cream
review: I a big fan of using gels along with other moisturizers, and this was a nice one! Absorbed quickly, it was gentle on my skin and very soothing. A good addition to your line up!

productName: On Vitamin Tree Water Gel Cream
review: I have only been using this product for a few days, so my opinion is still fairly undeveloped but I don‚Äôt love this product personally. I do enjoy it though. It‚Äôs unscented, applies as a thin gel that dries down quickly, and has not irritated my sensitive skin. What it lacks is moisturizing power. I have very dry skin and this product is just not enough to leave my face feeling fully hydrated. That being said, I will definitely continue to use it as a layer because I think it does have a bit of brightening power and it is a decent moisturizer as part of a full routine. Would probably be perfect for someone with oily skin because it dries quickly and doesn‚Äôt leave much residue but for dry skin in cold weather, you‚Äôll definitely need something more than just this to keep your skin refreshed.

productName: On W.H.P Brightening & Hydrating Charcoal Sheet Mask
review: So far I‚Äôve tried 3 of the 5 and I can say afterwards my face is very hydrated. I haven‚Äôt noticed an increase in brightness yet but it does mention to wait until skin cell turnover by using 2-3 times a week for 4 weeks. I can‚Äôt wait to see the results.

productName: On W.H.P Brightening & Hydrating Charcoal Sheet Mask
review: These mask are great. The material is soft and comfortable. The mask for my face well. Lots of serum. Skin looks bright and glowing after using. Will definitely repurchase.

productName: On W.H.P Brightening & Hydrating Charcoal Sheet Mask
reviewTitles: Love these for prepping my skin
review: If I have time before I head out, I like to use these to prep my skin. They make me a little brighter and provide adequate moisture. I definitely little or no dry spots after a long day, when I usually would have some had I not used this mask.

productName: On W.H.P Brightening & Hydrating Charcoal Sheet Mask
review: I love how my skin feels after using these sheet masks and the feeling would be even better if you put it a little bit in the refrigerator before using.

productName: On Wash All Barrier Relief Cleanser
review: I like this product ‚Äî wash all barrier relief cleanser. It has a little bit of a fragrance that did not bother my sinuses. I like the dispenser, makes it easy to pour out a small amount ‚Äî that‚Äôs all you need to use to cleanse your face. Does not leave my skin red or feeling tight. Did not make me break out ‚Äî so it passes that test

productName: On Wash All Barrier Relief Cleanser
review: Upon first use I was shocked at how soft my skin felt. After 2 days I was getting compliments on how bright my skin looked. Does the trick to get off my sunscreen and tinted moisturizer but not tough enough for eye makeup. I use dry as I think it‚Äôs a little drying when used wet.

productName: On Wash All Barrier Relief Cleanser
review: This is described as being able to use as a oil cleanser on dry skin first, then adding water to lather but IMO it doesn‚Äôt spread well on dry skin. But that being said, I‚Äôve never had a water based cleanser take makeup off so easily. And I have the good stubborn waterproof stuff. I double cleanse with this but with water both times and it has never dried my skin out. :woman-shrugging: I love it.

productName: On Wash All Barrier Relief Cleanser
review: A smooth cleanse that leaves my face feeling refreshed rather than stripped and dry.

productName: On Wash All Barrier Relief Cleanser
review: I have VERY dry and acne prone skin, I‚Äôve been using this product for about a week and already see an improvement. It feels very light and watery‚Ä¶which usually makes me feel like it‚Äôs not doing anything‚Ä¶ but this product makes my skin feel very fresh, clean and hydrated!

productName: On Wash All Barrier Relief Cleanser
review: I purchased this months ago and after using it every night and nearly every morning there‚Äôs still so much left in the bottle! A little goes such a long way if you lather it with water. When I feel like I need a deeper cleanse, I‚Äôll use more and rub the oil in before lathering. It never dries my skin out, has a subtle, clean scent that I honestly love, and the packaging is great - you don‚Äôt have to worry about squeezing out too much accidentally!

productName: On Wash All Barrier Relief Cleanser
review: I figured this‚Äôd be a one-off purchase due how much you get for the price, but with how long a bottle lasts and how consistently clear my skin has been I see myself purchasing this again and again.

productName: On Wash All Barrier Relief Cleanser
review: Love this cleanser! It works so well to take off all my makeup - including my mascara! Love how it turns from an oil to a bubbly cleanser with water. Leaves my face super clean but not stripped of moisture

productName: On Wash All Barrier Relief Cleanser
reviewTitles: Good Hydrating Cleanser for lazy double cleanse
review: I haven't cared about a facial cleanser this much since the sum:37 miracle rose cleansing stick. (RIP to a great one. It was discontinued five years ago and I'm still in mourning.) Every other cleanser has just been... there. Fine. I'd notice a bad one, but never found any that were particularly good. Until this one. I love the way my skin feels after using this. It's noticeable every single time. It feels clean and smooth and soft without feeling like there's residue left behind. I love the bottle. It's easy to dispense and allows for more control than a pump. I also just really like the aesthetic of this plain grey bottle for reasons that I don't entirely understand.
It doesn't dry my skin out, so that's nice! But the scent sort of just reminds me of a citrus-y dish soap? Not necessarily a bad thing.
Cleanses my face especially after working a 12-hr shift or to simply remove the make up off my face

I used the entire jar of this product and enjoyed it! After using it my skin felt so clean. I will advise though that due to its exfoliating power using it twice a day may be too much for sensitive/dry skin. I did not repurchase because at the time my acne was very inflamed and I wanted to focus on calming. However, now that it‚Äôs been a while and my skin is under control I will be repurchasing in the future!
Love this face cleanser! It's not super greasy, it's perfect to use as a double cleanse or just getting everything off your skin except moisturizer! Amazing, will definitely buy again!

I bought this to help with the redness on my face. So far it really seems to have calmed down my face. Some other cleansers can be too harsh on me. I'm also super glad that it doesn't have any harsh scents like some other cleansers.

I am a licensed esthetician. Korean and Japanese skincare never cease to amaze me. This moisturizer can be used on all skin types. It does an impeccable job at keeping hydration from serums and essences locked in for a long period of time. I used it AM and PM and it lasted me a little longer than 2 months.
I bought this as I love the facial scrub from this company and I wanted to try out other moisturizers.

review: I love the Saturday Skin vitamin C yuzu mask so much I thought I would give this a try. However, for me it peels and is a bit sticky and does not really hydrate my skin.

Thanks for your feedback! We understand that skincare is all about trial and error, and I‚Äôm sorry that this product did not work for you. Please know that our team is always available to offer alternative recommendations, suitable to your skin type & preferences.

This is a good, light moisturizer for your evening routine. It is on the more watery side which some people prefer but I prefer a more creamy moisturizer. My only complaint is that it doesn't last super long, especially not for the price point.
I have dry skin but don‚Äôt like using heavy/oily/sticky lotions as they tend to clog my pores. This cream is amazing because it‚Äôs hydrating during cooler months but doesn‚Äôt feel sticky.

Truly, I love this product. It‚Äôs not a super thick, opaque moisturizer. It‚Äôs not too thin either, but the perfect in between texture that I, as someone with super oily skin, appreciate. It doesn‚Äôt leave my skin seeming shiny or full of product, so it works well in the morning and under makeup or at night before bed. I also am prone to breakouts and haven‚Äôt had to worry about this causing any. I use a whole bunch of products, so I can‚Äôt say specifically if I‚Äôve noticed a huge change in my skin from this one, but I really enjoy using it as just a general moisturizer. I do also appreciate that it‚Äôs not full of heavy perfumes and oils which was what drew me to it. I will be purchasing again when I run out and would for sure recommend this.

I live in Alaska and during the winter my skin can get tight and a little bit flaky around the eyes, but since I have both sensitive and combination skin I don't want an oily moisturizer. This goes on smoothly and feels moist without being heavy or oily, it's become my favorite moisturizer.

This is very calming and soothing, not a rich moisturizer for very dry skin but it is hydrating if you just want to use it as a final step in a routine over a serum. I like it when my skin is irritated from a chemical peel or similar, it soothes and calms well. Kind of between a gel and a cream.

productName: On Waterfall Moist Balanced Hyaluronic Acid 100
review: Part of my daily routine and I have to have it! I noticed a huge difference when I run out my skin starts to flake and breakout.

productName: On Waterfall Moist Balanced Hyaluronic Acid 100
review: I use this all year round before my gel moisturizer

productName: On Waterfall Moist Balanced Hyaluronic Acid 100
review: This product is added to my repeat purchase list!

productName: On Waterfall Moist Balanced Hyaluronic Acid 100
review: I was excited to try this product as I tried another one of their products before. Unfortunately, it is super sticky and it's not very effective for me.

productName: On Waterfall Moist Balanced Hyaluronic Acid 100
review: I've been using this for the last three months, and I have to say if you have extremely dry skin and you're in need of something to help with hydration, this is it. When I first read the reviews, I kind of rolled my eyes and thought, yeah, right. It seems a bit too good to be true. I suffer from extremely dry skin, so bad that it will flake off. I have to exfoliate daily. I have a makeup table full of moisturizers and exfoliators to try and tame it. When I took the chance on this one, I didn't believe that it would do much good, but I was wrong. In the last three months, I have been able to cut down to exfoliating my face from daily to once a week, and I've gone down to one good moisturizer that I know works well with my skin. My skin not only feels hydrated, but it looks hydrated as well. The firmness and elasticity in my skin have improved as well. I don't have a lot of wrinkles; however, the ones that I do have, are visibly reduced. Overall, this has been a really great purchase for me so I will continue to use it going forward.

productName: On Waterfall Moist Balanced Hyaluronic Acid 100
review: I cannot live without it I use after my double cleanse, toner, essence and under my water gel moisturizer.

productName: On Waterfall Moist Balanced Hyaluronic Acid 100
review: This is a must have product for my skin care routine. I don‚Äôt know how I managed prior without it this product and I honestly do not know what I would do without it ever again. It is a clear night and day difference in hydration for my skin and I‚Äôm obsessed.

productName: On Waterfall Moist Balanced Hyaluronic Acid 100
review: i have repurchased this product so many times. been using this HA for two years and cannot live without it. nothing else compares in quality or ingredients. its amazing. i purchase 4 bottles at a time to ensure I don't run out, that's how much I love this stuff. if they ever stop making it I will bury myself in a hole.

productName: On Waterfall Moist Balanced Hyaluronic Acid 100
review: Annoy live without

productName: On Watermelon Dew All Over Serum
review: Originally purchased as a facial serum but started using it on my pregnant belly. I found with the moisturizer and oil I was using still left my skin dry but when I added the serum as a step 1, no more itchy belly! You really cant beat this for the price and quality. Such a nice product.

productName: On Watermelon Dew All Over Serum
review: It's lightweight, has a pleasant watermelon smell, doesn't leave my face feeling sticky or tacky, and is just a wonderful product.

productName: On Watermelon Dew All Over Serum
review: As a girl with psoriasis, I really like this stuff. It keeps me from getting patchy and dehydrated. Really good stuff!

productName: On Watermelon Dew All Over Serum
review: Ive been using this every other day and a little really goes a long way. it leaves my skin feeling very moisturized without being sticky or leaving any residue.

productName: On Watermelon Dew All Over Serum
review: The best part of this for me is the smell. it smells sooo good and kind of like that l‚Äôor√©al kids shampoo lol so it gives you that nostalgia feeling. It absorbs really quickly so if you don‚Äôt like the feeling of lotion on your skin, this is it. I use it on its own on my whole body or layer it with a thicker moisturizer when I need extra, but I really love this cream. The packaging is so cute on your counter or bedside table too :)

love the brush on this liner, it is so controllable, since i like a fine line. However, even though it‚Äôs waterproof, it still fades over the course of a few hours, and needs to be re-applied. Unfortunately, I rarely get the opportunity to do that.

this was fine the first few uses, but sooner or later it doesn't come off as completely black. in fact, you can see streak marks where it's drawn on because the product isn't opaque at all. it's also prone to smearing throughout the day, which isn't ideal for those with monolids or asian eyes in general.

I really like the Clio Pen Liner, but I wouldn't exactly call it waterproof -- for me it has definitely worn off if accidentally rubbed or if I teared up. Otherwise it is one of my favorite liners and would definitely recommend.

Holy, I was not expecting this to be as nice as it is! I wear it all day (roughly 16 hours) and it has not budged once. I frequently have been out in the rain for decent amounts of time and it still doesn't bleed or chunk off at all. I will definitely be rebuying this!

I‚Äôve tried it all. Any and every ink/tattoo liner and this one blows all of them out of the water. This stayed on through an entire night of dancing and did not budge!! I was so tired of wiping my eyelids with the transfer and smudge of other liners but this stayed on and did not smudge or budge or transfer. Absolutely loved it!!!!
I only use waterproof eyeliners, and this is one of my favorites. It doesn‚Äôt smudge and stays put. I like the pen tip that makes it easy to apply.

productName: On We Come in Peace Microbiome Serum
review: This is probably the best serum I have bought from this site (and I buy many). My skin is normally dry, sensitive and I have rosacea so my skin was almost flaky when I bought this. Thankfully I put this on and it was like it quenched my skin and protected it. I use it every other day and I honestly can‚Äôt get enough. Please add more products from this company!!

productName: On We Come in Peace Microbiome Serum
review: I‚Äôve been using this a week and I can tell the difference in my skin! Consistency is nice and it left my skin so soft and glowing. It‚Äôs also gentle and it doesn‚Äôt break me out which I was worried about. The redness in my face has gone down slightly. Something I will purchase again!

productName: On We Come in Peace Microbiome Serum
review: Left skin soft

productName: On We Come in Peace Microbiome Serum

I feel like it‚Äôs done a great job at balancing my skin out and I find that I‚Äôm a lot less oily or red now that I‚Äôve been using it for a while. I really enjoy this product.

review: If I can say one thing about this is that you need this product in your skincare routine. Probiotics I think yes! My skin eats this up and for good reason. productName: On We Come in Peace Microbiome Serum
review: This serum is lightly scented and very gentle. I'm sensitive to smells and this doesn't bother me at all. I've only been using it after weeks but already see a difference in my skin.

productName: On We Come in Peace Microbiome Serum
review: This was recommended to me during my skin consultation with Emily. I use this in my night routine. I am so happy I tried this product. I have been looking for the perfect serum for a long time. This seems to be perfect for me in so many ways after learning about this product. I am using this because it has Bakucihol, a natural retinol alternative (I tried retinol in the past and didn't like it. My skin became irritated). This helps with strengthening the skin barrier, stimulating cell turnover, and targeting hyperpigmentation. I've also seen a difference in how hydrated my skin looks. It also plumps skin for a more youthful complexion, something I appreciate. I also have redness in my skin and this has carrot, morringa seed, and blue tansy oils to help bring relief to redness and irritation. This product has so many benefits and is everything I've been looking for and more. I would never have chosen it without the recommendation.

productName: On We Come in Peace Microbiome Serum
review: I love this! The consistency, texture, feeling, effectiveness! Everything. I love a good serum that benefits my skin barrier and this serum is definitely worth a try for anyone who wants to improve their skin barrier and skin health! Loved this so much I just had to restock and it has been in my skincare routine rotation ever since.

productName: On We Come in Peace Microbiome Serum

this does wonderful things for my long breakage prone hair. What I really love about this product is that it can be used in a variety of ways successfully. First can be used as a deep conditioning treatment after shampooing with a clarifying shampoo and left on for a length of time and rinsed out. Second it can be used as a regular conditioner left on after shampooing for however long you leave on your conditioner in the shower and then rinse out. Lastly it can be used as a leave in conditioner now this is where it gets really special- on wet hair or on dry as a smoothing balm. I tried to extend the life of my blown out hair and by Day four, My hair is screaming for more moisture. To survive that fourth day I will put some of this balm in- sometimes with a little water sometimes without. What can I say I‚Äôm a mad scientist.

review: This is my first time trying this toner and so far it has made my skin feel very smooth, moisturized, and not overly sensitive. I have been using it with a cotton pad and swiping away any leftover dirt or impurities but some days I pat into my skin so it'll absorb it and both ways have been great so far. reviewTitles: What did I just put on my face?!!!
review: I normally don‚Äôt write reviews after a couple uses (or at all), but I had to share this! The bottle really is huge so the price point is great. I used to use Good Light Moon Glow (which I loved) but I started using prescription Retinol (tret) a month ago so I‚Äôm taking taking a break from AHAs and BHAs. Since starting the tret my skin got dryer and more sensitive (as expected), but after just one use this toner made my skin feel hydrated, smooth and bouncy. I had no idea what ‚Äúbouncy‚Äù skin was before trying this! It‚Äôs not sticky or tacky and dries quickly and feels cool. You can layer this multiple times depending on your moisturizing needs and it sits really well with makeup. More oily skin types may not even need to use any other moisturizer with this product. There was a subtle, but noticeable difference in redness as well. I personally don‚Äôt notice much of a fragrance but there is a light clean/citrus scent if I sniff the bottle, it does have EOs if you‚Äôre sensitive to them. I‚Äôm really glad I purchased this, especially living in a climate where it‚Äôs about to get cold and dry soon. I highly recommend this if you‚Äôre looking for something to smooth out and negate dry skin.

This toner leaves your skin so soft and supple! Light scent, does not irritate my skin which tends to be sensitive. If you are suuuuper sensitive to fragrance, maybe it can be irritating. Great as that first layer of moisture that you follow up with a moisturizer to really lock in. The bottle is so big as well, this is lasting me a very long time! I even sometimes use it on my body before lotion. Great product, no complaints here. :)

i used to use the rice toner from tonymoly before this and i loved it but decided to try this one after running out of the rice one, and i love it so much!! the consistency is kind of like thick water? lol but it‚Äôs soo hydrating but not greasy as i have oily skin. it makes my skin feel so smooth after it dries down! i also have a lot of redness and this toner helps to calm it down, i love it so much i‚Äôm definitely going to keep rebuying it! plus the bottle is literally huge so i know it‚Äôs going to last me so long. would definitely recommend this toner! :)

My skin barrier was damaged and very red due to using retinol. I used this and within 2 days my complexion was way more even and my redness was gone. This is a miracle worker. Such an easy to use and gentle product that will do wonders for you skin!! Just do your self a favor and try it.

review: I've been DYING to try this product for months and now that i finally am it is sooo wonderful. I love sleep masks because of the drying prescription acne medication I need to take at night, so korean sleep masks/packs have been such a lifesaver. This one in particular has such a lovely light citrus scent and dries down in a way that doesn't leave grime on my pillow. My skin bounces in the morning when I rinse it off! Remember, a little does go a long way :)

productName: On Yuzu Vitamin C Sleep Mask
review: love the bright yuzu scent of this. a little goes a long way and probably don't wear when sleeping on a pillow case you're worried about getting anything on.

productName: On Yuzu Vitamin C Sleep Mask
